96b8(rgyud 'grel): khyod mi gnas// mgon po rtag tu dbu ma mchog/ yang dag brnyes pa ma lags sam// chu dang bcas pa'i snod rnams su// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar bltar// gcig tu gdul bya g.yo ba'i yid// rnam pa mang po 'dra ba'i mtshan// nyid kyi bag chags 
97a1(rgyud 'grel): yid cig na// ye shes grub pa'iri gas la gyur ba// bka' drin don gnyer tshul byas ni// chags pas khyod kyi zhabs drung srung // khyod kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'i cha// phyogs kyi khong du rnam smos pa// zla ba'i 'od zer gang gyur mnyam// byis pa'i 
97a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can mdzes pa 'di// chos gcig zla bltar mnyan pa// khyod kyi spyad pa bzlog dka' bas// bdud kyi mthun la 'jams pas rtse// byad kyi mtshan tsamadran pas ni// dmyal ba pa'i khrag dang zhag/ med par bskams par nga myal ba pa'i// 
97a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phro de dag zhi bar 'gyur// shes rab bral bas mdun du khyod// bran pa'i yul du gyur pas kyang // mkhas pa rnams kyang the tshom gyis// mdud pa dam por mchings par byed// thams cad lta zhog skad cig tu// khyod kyi spyan zur gyis gzigs 
97a4(rgyud 'grel): nas// rnga yab g.yo ba'i bzhad gad kyis// bsten pa'i dpal ldan nyid bdag gis// gdul bya pad mo'i snod rnams la// 'od zer dra bas kha' byed pas// mgon po sngon med nyi ma'i// ral pas nyin mtshan snang bar mdzad// don gsal mdzad 
97a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsung gis ni// gzung dang 'dzin par rnam par spangs// stong pa nyid ni mngon su bstar// gsung gi dbang phyug ston par mdzad// rnam par rtag las ma gtogs pa// 'khor ba zhes bya ci'ang med// rnam rtog de dang bral bas na// khyod na 
97a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu byung ngan 'das// khyod kyi yon tan cha brjod las// byung bas bsod nams 'phel ba'i// 'gro ba rnams ni khyod brjod pas// phun sum tshogs pal gnas shog/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi bstod pa/ rtog ge ba rnams kyi 
97a7(rgyud 'grel): gtsug gi nor bu/ slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya ga gyi mkhan po shrad+d+ha kar warma dang / zhu chen gyi la tsho ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gzhan la phab pa'o// 5// yang na yums sa/ 
97a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyagar skad du/ a ra ba tsan sA d+ha nA bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ a ra pa tsana'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga/ 'jam dpal gzhan nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnal 'byor pas dang por gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas la/ bsam gtan gyi khang pa dri dang byug pa 
97b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas byug la/ stan 'jom po la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bsgom par byas la/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+harmA swa b+ha ba shud d+ho haM zhes brjod la/ bdag dang gzhan
97b2(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko he/ de nas rang gi lus kyi mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par dang ba'i shel sgong lta bur dri ma med par bsam mo// de nas rang gi snying kha'i nam mkha' la a las zla ba'i dkyil
97b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi steng du d+hI bston kha'i zla ba'i mdag 'dra 'od tshogs 'gro bar bsams la/ de yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi ral gri bsams te/ de yongs su gyur pa las 'jam pa'i rdo rje rabadag nyid bsab par bya ste/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ 
97b4(rgyud 'grel): ston bye ba dang 'dra bar snang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bsam gtan gyis 'dzums pa'i spyan can/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas kyis shes rab kyi 'gri 'byur ba/ g.yon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ta 
97b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs khar 'dzin pa/ zhal cung zad bzhad pa/ de'i thugs kha'i nam mkha' la a yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ de'i steng du de'i sa bon gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zla ba de la bla ma'i mnangag gi yi ge lnga bsam par bya'o// 
97b6(rgyud 'grel): de la man ngag ni 'di yin te/ de la a yongs su gyur pa las/ bcom ldan 'das mdzu shrI sgra mdog dang dbyibs sngar bshad pa lta bu/ ralas dra ba can gyi 'od/ ba las zla 'od/ tsa las sgra can/ na las nye skra can/ thams cad kyang bcom ldan 
97b7(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang 'dra ba bsam par bya'o// de nas lha lnga po de dag las yi ge lnga 'bar ba'i 'od kyi tshogs 'phro ba'i rang bzhin du bsams la/ rang gi snying gi shes pa sbyang bar bya zhing / sems kyi rgyud dri ma med par bya'o// de nas skad cig gis 'khor lo 
97b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su 'khor bas 'khor bar bsam zhing / lha rnams kyi g.yo bar bsams la/ gti mug gi mun pa bzlog par bya ba'i phyir/ 'khor lo dang de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las 'od kyi tshogs mang po byung la/ phyogs bcu'i sems can 
98a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi be shes pa'i sgrib basbyangs la/ rgud dri ma med par byas te/ slar 'ongs nas de nyid du 'u bar gyur ba bas pa par bya'o// de nas bsgom pa la sems bstan zhing bla ma'i man ngag gis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas bzlas pa 
98a2(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ a ra pa tsan d+hI zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs pa'i yi ge rnams las sngags kyi phreng ba shel lta bu byung nas/ rang gi lte ba las thugs kha de nyid du zhugs par bsam mo// de ltar ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bzlas par byed cing 
98a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms la dang ba'i sems dang ldan nas dang pha rol tu phyin pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de ltar dus gsum du rnal 'byor byas na ring po mi thegs par blo mchog tu 'gyur ro// a ra ba tsa na'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga slob dpon shrad d+hA ka ra bar mas mdzad 
98a4(rgyud 'grel): pardzogs so// / 6// ma can pagasas// rgya gar skad du/ a ra pa can sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ a ra pa tsana'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar phyag 
98a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan gleg bam ral gri can/ rab mdzes shin tu zhi ba'i gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan// dga' ba rgya chen thar mchog spyan ni pad+ma'i 'dab ltar yangs// bla gros ngan pa sreg mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas// lo phyed rgyun du 
98a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgom pa mngon sbyor skye bo gang // nges par gnas kun khong du chud 'gyur mchog gi blo// 'thob 'gyur ar pa tsan ni legs 'grub phyir// 'khor lor ni chen shin tu bsdus pa'i gdams pabartsam// mnyam zhing gtsang legs yid 'ongs 
98a7(rgyud 'grel): drizhim me tog bkram// de yi chas btabs phyogs 'gar ni sngags rig pas// shin tu nyams dga' 'jam pa'i stan la nyer 'dug nas// bde ba'i yid kyis mtshan med byang chub sems bsgom bya// sa b+hA ba shud d+ha'i sngags brjod cing // 
98a8(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun nas ma lus stong nyid du// rnam par bsgom bya slar yang bdag gi lus// skad cig nyid la 'od gsal nyid du blta// de nas nam mkhar dbyangs yig dang po las// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'phro ba bsgom// de nas 
98b1(rgyud 'grel): de la d+hiHyig shin tu dkar// de ni 'jam dbyangs dri ma med par bsgom// rtse gcig bsam gtan gyis ni pad stengs gnas// chags bcas cung zad 'dzum zhing yid du 'ong // ri bong gi mtshan bye ba'i 'od zer can// rgyan kun gyis brgyan rab 
98b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bsgom par bya// rang gi snying khar rab 'phros a yig mchog bsgom ste// 'od kyi dra ba dpag med rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo'i tshul// de steng zla gzugs bsgom bya de las sngags pa yis// ri bong 'dzin 'od ltar dkar 'jam pa'i dbyang 
98b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid// de g.yas sgra gcan gzugs mdzes zur mig rgyas pa can// ches che'i dum zung ldan rab ltag yon du ni// rab mdzes ral pa'i 'gying ldan nye ba'i sgra gcan ma// mtha' dag yon tan ster dag tsa dang na las bsgom// rab dkar re// 
98b4(rgyud 'grel): pa las byung dri ma med// dra ba can gyi 'od nyid 'dun du bsgom// ba yi ga las skyes 'od zer rang bzhin can// yid 'phrog zla ba'i 'od de'i rgyab ku bsgom// yang na 'od zer 'bar ba'i yi ge rnams// rgya chen nus mthu ldan pa bsgom par bya// 
98b5(rgyud 'grel): de rnams mi shes ra bo 'dzams byed cing // rnyog pa med pa'i ye shes bzang po mdzad// 'og tu 'khor lo myur du 'khor ba las// gti mug mun pa thams cad bcad par rabs pa// zla gzugs 'od zer chen po 'dra ba can// ltar bcas 
98b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba med pa nyid du blta// ri bong gis mtshan las byung 'od zer gyi// sprin tshogs dpag med phyogs bcur rab 'phros nas// sems can dri med byas nas de bzhin mthar// slar log bdag lus zla ba la zhugs bsam// yid 
98b7(rgyud 'grel): brtan sngags kyi sgra can man ngag bzhin bsgom zhing // sngags kyi dam pa a ra pa can bzlas na// myur du blo ngan skyon bcom yid 'ong dri med mchog/ rgyal ba'i sa dang mchog gi dbang phyug kun kyang thob// mchog gi bla ma dga' 
98b8(rgyud 'grel): babarda rjed mchas mchog gi mdzod gyur pas/ bde bar gshegs tshegs mdun du gang zhig tsheg ji bzhin dbang bsgyur ba'i// blo zos bzang po mi pam pa shes gnyen de yis skye ba rnams kyis ni// bla gros 'grub phyir ar pa can 
99a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'khor lo'i gzhung 'di byas// 'khor lo'i cho ga mchog ni legs bsgrags nas// bsod nams mtha' yas dri med gang thob pa// de yis 'jig rten ma lus sdig spangs shing // 'jam dbyangs bde ba gcig pur 
99a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas gyur cig/ a ra ba tsana'i sgrub thabs/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mi 'pham pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi b+hu ti tsan+d+ra dang / chag lo ts+tsha dge slong chos rje dpal gyi 'gyur// / 
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dags pa 'angs dpas kyi sgrub pa'i babs palags so// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya many+dzu shI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tshad med pa dang byang chub sems 
99a4(rgyud 'grel): baspyad de sngags 'di brjod cing ma dmigs stong par bskam/ es b+hA ba ba shud+d+haHsarbad+ha m+b+ha sa b+hA ba pa~M shwats+tshaH// snang ci ngang las pa pe a dka las// rgya mtsha steng du pa ng+gA zlab bsam// de steng rang sems ya dka shid / 
99a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros don byas 'dus pas lhar gyur te// zhal cig phyag gnyis mchog sbyin ut+pal bsnams// rdo rje'i skyil krung 'od zer rab 'phro ba// dar dkar na bza' rin chen rgyan gyis spras// ston zla'i mdog can lang tsho ldan pa bsgom// oM bAka 
99a6(rgyud 'grel): kyekyi de na maH/ rig sngags rgyal po 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub// zla ba gcig gis blo 'phel rig pa 'dzin// dngos sam rmi lam nyid du mthong thos 'gyur// grub pa'i mtshan ma gzhan yang snang bar 'gyur// nyi zla gzas zin dus su ma sha 
99a7(rgyud 'grel): zhinyid// dar dkar gyis dril lce 'og bcug la bzlas// myu gu byung 'gyur 'di ni grub pa yin// yang na ral gri nyid bzung rig 'dzin 'gyur// gre phugs a dkar dag las 'od 'phos pas// rgyal ba kun gyi blo gro dpag med dag/ 'dus nas 
99a8(rgyud 'grel): nga dratham pas sras kun 'angs// me brjod dan pa'i ga zung ba ba par 'gyur// snyid nabus thab dkyis 'khong rgyab rdug sa// 'bru drug lag pa gad la gsas gsan bltar// shugs drag rgya man zhing bad/ rangs/ 
99b1(rgyud 'grel): zhes 'joms stobs ldan myur 'dzin rab gsal 'gyur// pha rol phyin dang bstod pa mang po dang // mtshan dang brjod dang mchod pa sna tshogs dang // man Tal dbul zhing gsol ba gdab par bya// 'di ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur 
99b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// 'jam dpa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po matis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga tA la'i paN+Di ta chen po dA na shI las bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po'i rir lha'i skad la sa bod kyi 
99b3(rgyud 'grel): brdar 'khrul pa med par bsgyur ba'o// / 5/ 'gas pas ba na mchod pa na gas so// rgya gar skad du/ ar+tha a ra pa tsa na pU dzA bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa a ra pa tsa na'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 
99b4(rgyud 'grel): a ra pa tsan la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrub thabs su bshad pa'i rim pa yis// de ltar bla ma'i maN+Dal sngon du'o// shin tu mnyam par gzhag la 'gro ba la phan pa'i sems kyis mchod par bya'o// oM aHhUM gnas dang bdag dang rnal 
99b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byor bsrung ba'o// de nas oM sar+b+ba ti thA ga ta su la le ta/ la li tir+m+ma bA maM b+ha ga ban+d+ha ar pa tsan n+ta tha/ dzaHhUM ba hoHpra tIts+tsha maM ku su mA dza li nA tha tsaHoM AHhUMHpra ba ra sad+ha ra ya a ra pa tsanA ya pA d+hi pra tI ts+tsha hUM swAhA/ oM AHdza 
99b6(rgyud 'grel): pra ba ra sat+kA rA ya a ra ba tsa nA ya pro k+Sha Na pra tIts+tsha b+hu sAhA/ oM AHdziHkhra ba ra san rA ya a ra pa tsa rA ya A tsam naM pra tIts+tsha hUM swA hA/ oM aHhri pra ba sat+ka rA ya a ra ba tsa nA ya ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha trAM swAt+ma/ oM na mo many+dzu g+ho Sha ya d+hI 
99b7(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na mo dz+wA li nI pra b+hA ya raM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na ma shUn+ta pra b+ha ya baM oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na maHke shi n+ye tse oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na ma u pa ke shaM n+yai na oM badz+ra puSh+pe hU~M swA hA/ 
99b8(rgyud 'grel): nam ak+Sho b+hu yA hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe bru~M swA hA/ oM na mo bai tsan+da ya oM oM badz+ra puSh+pe hU~M swAhA/ oMn mo ngon sa~M b+ha bA ya tA oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na ma a maM tA b+hA ya hriHoM badz+ra puSh+pe d+hu swAt+ma/ oM na ma a mo g+ha se d+hI khaM a 
100a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swAhA/ oMn mo lo tsa n+da ye lAM oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na mo mA pak+Shi mA oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM na maHpat+tA rA ye pA a~M badz+ra puSh+pe d+hu swA hA/ oM na bstA rA ye tA i badz+ra puSh+pe hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM 
100a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di yi rim pas/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hi pa hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he hUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra ni bid+d+he hU~M swA hA/ de rnams kyi mdun du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams nye bar yang dag par dbul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ta thA 
100a3(rgyud 'grel): ga ta pA dzA be g+ha pra sa ra sa mu twe s+pha ra Na hi ma ga ga na ka hUM phaT/ mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya'o// dngos po med kyang yid las byung ba'i mchod pa dbul lo// na ma sarba bud+ha bo d+hi satwA na sarba tha ut+pa te s+phar hi ma ga ga na ka sa ma n+ta ta 
100a4(rgyud 'grel): swA hA/ yid kyi mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa'o// ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu ces pa la sogs pa dang / rin chen gsum rnabs phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa'ang rin chen gsum po la// sdig pa gang rnams brjod par bgyi// bsod nams kun la 
100a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su dga'// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor zhing // mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu gzhugs// bdag gi sbyin sogs bsod nams kyis// bdag la kun rtog yongs su bsgyur// ces pa rnam pa bdun bla na med pa'i mchod pa byas nas dbang 
100a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i phyir/ spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mos mngon par dga' bas dbang bskur ba'o// rang gi rigs ngo bor byas nas 'dod pa'i phyir bdag la dbang bskur ro// gtsang ba'i lha yis chu rnams kyis// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs 'khrungs 
100a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe// kun bkrus de bzhin bdag dbang bskur// oM aHsarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ye hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi She ka badz+ra sa b+hA bA A da ka ha/ yi ge'i rang bzhin 'byung gnas dang // lhan cig kun tu rnam par rtogs// A 
100a8(rgyud 'grel): li kA li'i tshogs// de nyid rtogs pa'i rnam par 'gro// oM pade pa daM ma hA dz+nyA naM sarba bud+d+ha ma haM b+ha me hUM hUM hUM hoHhoHhoHaHkhaM swA hA/ 'di yis gsang sngags kyi phreng ba rnams byin gyis brlabs la gsang sngags bzlas so// gsang // 
100b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags bla ma'i nye bar bshad pa las rtogs par bya'o// bzlas pa byas nas gtor ma byid gyis brlab par bya ste/ yaM yig gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// ra yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du ka yig gis skye dbu gsum gyi 
100b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ a yig las skyes pa'i snod du 'chi meng lnga dang rab tu gsal ba lnga po lhan cig wa nas 'chi bad ye shes bcug nas dbul bar byas te/ oM ar pa tsa nA ya an pu sta ka ha stA ya e ma pa li kha ga rA hi khA hi/ ha na ha da da ha da ha/ 
100b3(rgyud 'grel): patsa ba tsam ma sarba satwA nAT+Ta pratra d+hak+ShA na ban+d+ha ban+d+ha nI d+hi pri kha/ a ra pa tsa nA ya swA hA/ gtor ba'i sngags so// chad pa dang lhag pa kha dgang ba'i phyir/ yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra 
100b4(rgyud 'grel): satwa twe na pa tiSh+Tha Di d+hi ma b+ha ba/ sa ta~M Sh+ya ma~M b+ha baM/ su poSh+Ta me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+ta ma b+ha ba/ sarba sad+hi m+me pra ya tsa sarba karmA su tsa ma tsit+ta shre ya ku ru d+hu/ ha ha ha ha hoHga ba nasarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra rA me mASh+Ta badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya 
100b5(rgyud 'grel): satwa aH/ bdag cag sems can dan kun mdzad// ji ltar rjes rtogs dngas grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs pa dang // slar ni byon par mdzad gyur cig/ oM muHswA hA sa gshegs par bya'o// smon lam gyi bye brag 
100b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang gdab par bya'o// dus gsum bsags pa'i yod pa'i dge ba yis// bdag cag srid kun pha rol phyin nas ni// sems can kun bcas rin chen rtogs ldan pa'i// bla na med pa'i 'bras bur myur du 'gyur// 'phags pa'i a 
100b7(rgyud 'grel): rapa tsana'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// lung du ston pa'i bstan bcos kyi skad cung zad rtogs pa'i/ shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang bas/ grub pa'i zhing dam pa mang yul skyid grong 'phags pa 'jig rten 
100b8(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i gtsug lag khang las/ cung zad mi ring ba'i chen po rnams kyi gdanas/ dpal sher gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// / 9// lag ya gas ga gsas// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha/ 
101a1(rgyud 'grel): pany+tsa ne ba ste tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ rje btsun spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' ltar rang bzhin rnam dag las// paM yig a dkar yongs 
101a2(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i// pad+ma dkar po zla sted du// hriHyig dkar po las 'khrungs shing // g.yas brkyang rol pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// gangs ri ltar dkar kun d+hi'i mdog/ g.yas pa mchog gi don sbyin mdzad// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma 
101a3(rgyud 'grel): gos pa'i// pad+ma dkar po g.yon na 'dzin// 'dzum bcas zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes// mchags dkyil 'khor gcol bstod// pad+ma dkar po bla steng du// ha yig dmar po las 'khrungs shing // 
101a4(rgyud 'grel): mnyam par bzhengs nas 'gro don mdzad// pad+ma rag dmar po'i mdog/ zhags pa dang ni rdo rje g.yas// lcags kyu 'grang phreng g.yon na 'dzin// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes pa yis// don yod zhags la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
101a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'i steng thu las 'khrungs// g.yon brkyang gyad kyi tshul gyis bzhugs// su mdog dmar po b+hai ru'i tshal// sdug dang sbrul gyis rnam brgyan cing // be tson dang ni bsdigs 'jub g.yas// 'khor lo pad+ma dmar po g.yon// 
101a6(rgyud 'grel): gtsug rta mgo ljang khu 'tsher// ha ya gri la phyag 'tshal bstod// chu skyes nyi mar pha las 'khrungs// nam mkha'i mdog can g.yon brkyang tshul// mche gtsigs khro mo'i cha lugs 'dzin// stag gi lpags pas rnam par dkris// 
101a7(rgyud 'grel): ral gri zhags pa pad+ma mda'// 'khor lo dbyug pa rtse gsum gzhu// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams// ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// pad+ma dkar po zla steng du// Ta yig dkar po las 'khrungs shing // zla ba chu 
101a8(rgyud 'grel): shel nor bu'i mdog/ 'gying zhing ldems pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// dbug pa pad+ma dkar po g.yas// 'grang phreng dang ni spyi blugs g.yon// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes pa yi// khrog nyer can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
101b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lnga lnga'i bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po can drago mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rag nam mad pa la khri 'jo grus so// rgya gar skad du/ kal pa man ha ran ni nA ma lo kAnA tha sto tra/ 
101b2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'jig rten mgon po'i bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha min me yis zhabs la phyag byas shing // skye nan 'chi ma lus rab tu 'joms pa'i sku// 'jig rten 
101b3(rgyud 'grel): da ga gas ldan pan na// ragan ma ba dgal brnangs ma nga brags rjem da ngags/ 'a ba mam ya da ma nan byu // na mangs dpa sa kyis na yang gzhas sa 
101b4(rgyud 'grel): 'debs pa bdag la btang snyoms ma mdzad par// khyod la bstod bgyid thugs rje chen pos bsrung du gsol// srid pa'i rab kyi ni blo ma gnyer gtses shing // 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yis ni lus sems g.yengs gyur pa// ji srid mi bzad 
101b5(rgyud 'grel): mnar med gnas sum lhung bar// bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la bskyab tu gsol// rmongs pas rgyun du gzhan gyi bud med brten bgyis dang // srog chags stong phrag srog dang bral ba la sogs pa// mgon po bdag 
101b6(rgyud 'grel): gis sdug bsngal rgyu ni tshang bar bgyis// lus kyi zhes pa de dag yang dag sbyang du gsol// gang zhig bkur sti'i ched dang 'tsho ba'i ched du ni// 'jig rten mi bden rdzun tshig glang po la sogs pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dag gi zhes 
101b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kun sbyor yang // dmyal ba'i rgyu de yun rings ma lus goms par bgyis// sems can rnams la rang gis gnod pa gang bgyis dang // gzhan gyis bgyis pa la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i// bdag gi yid kyi sdig de dag ni sme 
101b8(rgyud 'grel): sngags su// 'don zhing mchis pas bsal du gsol dang mgon po kye// lha dang mi dang lham yin skye ba rnams dang na// dud 'gro dang ni dmyal ba yi dgas rnams su yang // sdug bsngal dang bcas 'gro ba gang gnas de dag la// 
102a1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba mdzad ces khyod kyi lo rgyus bdag gis 'khums// des na bdag la thugs rje yang dag mdzad du gsol// g.yar lus dar la bab pa yal bar nyams la khang // de phyir ji srid dmyal ba'i gnas su ma zhugs 
102a2(rgyud 'grel): par// bcom ldan khyod ni bdag gi zhu ba gsan par mdzod// gzhan yang gzhan don la rang nyid gshegs mdzad na// bsod nams ma bsags bdag ni spyan sngar mchis kyang spong // khyod kyi thugs rje bsod nams dag la 
102a3(rgyud 'grel): ltos sam ci// sdug bsngal med la snying rje bya bar su lagasan// dran pa tsam gyis khyod ni yongs su mnyes nas su// sdig zad mdzad ces bdag gis ma 'khums lags sam ci// de phyir bcom ldan gzhan pa na mdzad la phul du 
102a4(rgyud 'grel): byung // bdag 'dir mdor bsrung dang bsgrub pa mdzad du gsol// glang chen dag dang nor bu sras bcas btsun mo dang // gnod med rgyal srid khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba dang // sha dang rus pa dbu ni sku mtshal mthar thugs btang // 
102a5(rgyud 'grel): grub pa'i mig sman rkang pa byug pa dag dang ni// grub pa'i gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mo dag kyang // 'jig rten mnga' ba dag khyod ni mnyes par gang su dag/ don gnyer rnams la mthar thugs ma mchis sbyin par mdzad// gang dang 
102a6(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa lag pa mig dang bral rnams dang // sna tshogs blo 'tshal gyis ni 'jig pa dang bcas rnams// yon tan zab mo khyod mnyes pa yi de dag gi/ yan lag sobs gyur bro 'tshal dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur// mkha' lding sprul gdug 
102a7(rgyud 'grel): gdod dang mkha' 'gro mi dang ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnod kun rtag tu zhi mdzad cing // rgyal ba khyod kyis gang la dgongs pa de la ni// gshin rje'i pho nya rmi lam du yang snang mi 'gyur// mgon po bdag ni 'jigs pas
102a8(rgyud 'grel): g.yengs pa yis// nyin dang mtshan du lag pa gyen du brkyang ste ru// 'jig rten dbang phyug des na bdag ni 'gums pa dang // nye ba lags na bcom ldan skyabs med 'bor ram gyi// yul dang dbang po gdul dka' sems kyang 
102b1(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba dang // mnyam par ma gzhag lus kyi sdig pa mang po bgyis// nyams pa bdag gi 'khor bzhin du ni skye ba 'dir// thams cad kyis ni sdig pa 'ba' zhig bsgrubs par zad// de phyir da ltar khyod la thal mo sbyar nas ni/ 
102b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal dag/ myong mi 'gyur bar khyod kyi spyan sngar bde 'gror ni// 'chi bar bdag zhu 'di ni gnang bar mdzad du gsol// khyod ni 'dod chags zhe sdang rnam par 'joms pa'i sku// khyod ni 
102b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i mtsho chen gyi ni chu lod lags// khyod ni ltung bas skrag pa 'dren pa'i lag pa ste// khyod ni brjed bcas mi dge 'dzin pa'i sgra gcan lag/ khyod ni bde gshegs bla med de nyid ston pa po// khyod ni sdug bsngal mang ldan 
102b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i skyab byed yin// khyod ni yid 'joms gdul dka'i bdud las des rgal ba// khyod ni srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal ba lags// khyod ni nad pa ma lus nad ni rgyun gcod sku// khyod kyi sku ni 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu mdzes// 
102b5(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni dpe me dazugs rje'i rgya mtsho chen po ste// khyod ni chu med gnyen du 'grob rnams kyis rtogs// khyod kyis g.yo ba'i dbang po 'bad pa med par btul// khyod ni yul la chags pa yongs su bcom pa lags// khyod kyi thugs 
102b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bsam gtan mchog ni mnyam par gzhag/ khyod kyi thugs ni spong ba kun la snyoms par mdzad// thugs rje ldan pa gzhan la phan par mdzad kyang ni// ma rig sprul chen rgyab tu zhon nas yul rnams kyi// 'dod pas dge ba 
102b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams par gyur pa bdag la 'dir// khyod ni gang gis yongs su dgyes par mi mdzad lags// khyod kyi spyan sngar g.yar chab 'byin cing sme ba yi// sdig ldan dag la gangags bsrung ba mi mdzad na// mgon po 'gro ba kun brten 
102b8(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje gang lags pa// des khyod kyi nye tshe ba rabaskyed lags sapa// mgon po khyod kyi thugs rjen ma ma kha'i khyab pa yi// sprin bud char pa'i rgyun ni tshwa dang skal dag dang // mthod man yul ni kun la 'bab cing sems can gyis/ 
103a1(rgyud 'grel): don du kun la nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug/ de ltar bcom ldan dran pa'i bdag gi bsod nams gang // des ni 'gro ba sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag gis// 'gro nang mdzes pa rnam mang rnam par rol pa yis// 
103a2(rgyud 'grel): po ta la'i ri rtser gnas pa thob par shog/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa yid 'phrog sdig 'joms zhes bya ba/ shar phyogs ba re na Di'i/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po tsan tra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar shar 
103a3(rgyud 'grel): phyogs ba ren Di'i dza ga ta'i la'i pa Na Di ta chen po dA na shi las bskur ba// 6// 'phags pa spyan sa gzigs dang drug gi bsgrub bapas dang / bstoskod pa'i bzhong ba sa so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha ma Na Da la de ba ga Na sto tra pi ma la pra 
103a4(rgyud 'grel): b+hanA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dan yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis lha tshags la stod pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos 
103a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang // thugs rje chen pos gdul bya'i snang de la// gang la gang 'dul de la de ston pa'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug khyed la bstod par bgyis// 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos phyir// pad+ma dkar po rab rgyas lte ba la/ 
103a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i chu rgyun 'bebs mdzad zla ba'i gdan// ye shes 'gying tshul bzhugs mdzad khyod la bstod// 'jig rten log rtog ston pa 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyal ba'i rol stangs dbang phyug cha lugs 'dzin// sna tshogs
103a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs mnga' rin chen rgyan gyis spras// 'jig rten kun gyis bstod pa khyod la 'dud// don dam chos sku nyag cig zhal mnga' zhing // thugs rje 'gro la chags pas hriHlas 'khrungs// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur 
103a8(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med// ral pa'i khur na 'char ba khyod la bstod// 'gro drug sgrol phyir ral ba'i cod pan 'dzin// rgyal ba'i rgyal po rin chen dbu rgyan can// me tog cod pan rgyal sras 'gran zla bral// dus gsum rgyal ba'i 
103b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag po khyod la bstod// nor bu'i skan chas 'grol chos sgra sgrogs// spyan gsum dus gsum shes dang shes bya mkhyen// 'dzum pa'i zhal mnga' 'gro ba'i don la dgyes// stong nyid thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
103b2(rgyud 'grel): kun rdzob tsam du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi// nyon mongs kun skyob bde ba'i mchog sbyin cing // don dam rnam dag pad+ma dkar po bsnams// thabs shes zung 'jug phyag gnyis phyag 'tshal bstod// srid pa'i mes gdungs
103b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud lnga'i sems can la// bdud rtsi'i rgyan 'bebs g.yas na spyi blugs 'dzin// bdud bzhi'i 'jig skyob g.yon pa skyabs sbyin mdzad// 'khor 'das gnyis med gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid gsum bzod nas
103b4(rgyud 'grel): dben par rtog pa'i phyir// ri dgas lpags pas sku yi sham thabs mdzad// 'khor 'das rang bzhin spros bral rtogs pa'i phyir// gangs ri kun d+ha'i mdangs ldan khyod la bstod// khyod kyi thugs rje'i rgyun gyis dus gsum gyi/ 
103b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sras bcas 'gro don la bskul nas// mdzad bya'i phrin las ma lus mdzad pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor gtso bor bzhugs pa khyod la bstod// pha rol phyin bcu'i yon tan rab rdzogs phyir// phyag zhabs kun la nor bu'i rgyan 
103b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis spras// sa bcu'i stobs rdzogs ye shes mnga' ba'i phyir// mu tig de shal 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdzu 'phrul mthu yis 'gro ba drang ba dang // stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis bdud dpung gzhom pa'i phyir// zhabs gnyis cung 
103b7(rgyud 'grel): zad brkyang bskum rol pas bzhugs// rtag par gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid pa gsum po dbyings su bsgral ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i skus// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer 'gyed mdzad 
103b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i// ma rig mun pa 'joms la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung 'dzin dri ma dang bral pad ma'i gdan// nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don yengs pa mi mnga' bzhengs tshul can// thugs rje chags 
104a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mdog mnga' khyod la 'dud// thabs kyi zhags pas 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// ha las 'khrungs pa'i tshul ston don chen mdzad// skye med zhal mnga' srid gsum gzigs pa'i spyan// dbu rgyan rgyal ba'i cod pan 
104a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang la bskyod// bden bzhi'i phyag gis chos kyis 'khor lo bskor// snying rje'i zhags pas 'gro ba 'dren mdzad cing // rtogs pa'i rdo rjes log rtogs mtshan ma 'joms// sgyu ma'i rdzu 'phrul mnga' ba khyod la bstod// 
104a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen brtse'i lcags kyus 'khor ba bde bar 'gugs// nus ldan bgrang phreng yon tan gter mdzod 'dzin// 'gro don mdzad mkhas zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul// mtshan don ldan par bzhugs pa khyod la bstod// 
104a4(rgyud 'grel): mchags pad+ma'i rigs te skyon bral steng // mkhyen pas nyon mongs tshogs 'joms nyi ma'i gdan// bdud dpung 'joms mdzad khro rgyal hUM las 'khrungs// khro bas khro ba 'dul mdzad khyod la bstod// rngam pa'i zhal gyis
104a5(rgyud 'grel): log rtogs dbyings su gsol// dmar ser ral bas log 'dren bran du 'dul// ye shes spyan gyis khams gsum sku gsum gzigs// rta mgrin rta skad sgrogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje'i dbyug pas bgegs 
104a6(rgyud 'grel): dpung rdul du rlog/ rdo rje sdig 'dzub bdud sde skrag par mdzad// gser gyi 'khor los 'khor ba'i rtsa ba gcod// chags bral pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen sbrul rgyan klu rgyal gdug pa 'dul// glad chen 
104a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yang gzhi stobs bcu mnga' ba'i dpal// stag sham pa tis 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// khro rgyal brkyang bskum bzhugs la phyag 'tshal bstod// // skyon bral gdan la rmongs sel nyi ma'i steng // pha las 'khrung 
104a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdul 'dul nag mo che// rngam pa'i stabs kyis gdug pa sgrol bar mdzad// mche ba gtsigs pas bdud bzhi gsol la bstod// rnam thar phyag brgyad ye shes rno ba'i mtshon// shes rab ral gris gti mug rtsad nas 
104b1(rgyud 'grel): gcod// thugs rje'i zhags pa skyon bral pad+ma 'chang // thabs mkhas brtse ba'i mnga' 'phen khyod phyag 'tshal// 'khor los srid pa'i 'khor lo 'joms mdzad pa'i// byug pas bgegs 'dul rtse gsum dug gsum 
104b2(rgyud 'grel): gcod// spros bral gzhu yis thugs rje'i mnga' 'phen ma// 'phags la mdon ldan ral gcig ma la bstod// khro rgyal kun 'dul dbu rgyan rin chen 'chang // bdud dgra kun 'joms khro mo'i cha lugs rdzogs// sdug lpag 
104b3(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs stobs bcu'i rtsal ba yi// rgyal ba kun skyed khro rgyal yum la bstod// skyon bral chu skyes gdung ba sel ba'i steng // Ta la 'khrungs pa'i 'phrin las kun rdzogs ma// brtse ba'i zhal mnga' 'phrin las rgyas pa'i phyag 
104b4(rgyud 'grel): ral pa'i cod pan rdo rjes brgyan la bstod// thod dbyug bgegs 'dul pad+mos 'khor ba skyob// phreng bas sems can rjes 'dzin 'gro drug la// dam chos bdud rtsi'i rgun 'bebs spyi blugs 'dzin// sgrub pa po la mchog 
104b5(rgyud 'grel): gsol mdzad la bskyod// rin chen rgyan 'changs dang yon tan rdzogs// dar sham ba tis mi 'jigs lha chen 'dral// chags can 'dul phyir chags bltar ston pa'i// lha mo khro gzhir ldan la phyag 'tshal bstod// kun kyang 
104b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs// thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston// nyam thag 'grol kun du brtse ba can// thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod// ye shes rol pa chen po'i bdag nyid 
104b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir// kun kyang ye shes 'od dpung klong na bzhugs// thabs la mkhas pas sna tshogs cir yang ston// nyam thag 'grol kun du brtse ba can// thugs rjes rtag tu gzigs mdzad khyod la bstod// ye shes rol pa chen 
104b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag nyid phyir// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par rab rdzogs phyir// sgeg pa'i tshul 'chang bde ba'i mchod 'bul ma// sgeg cing bzhad par mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// byang chub yan lag 'bras bu kun ste bas// tshul 
105a1(rgyud 'grel): khrims pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// rin chen phreng bas 'chang zhing mchod pa 'bul// chags pal blta bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod// bzod nas zhi ba'i don la rab mos pas// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa 
105a2(rgyud 'grel): rab rdzogs phyir// snyan pa'i glu dbyangs sgrogs shing mchod pa 'bul// don dam rtogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba mchod par bya phyir skyob med// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// sna tshogs 
105a3(rgyud 'grel): rol pas dgyes pa'i gar mdzad ma// mnyes pa'i gzigs mo mdzad la phyag 'tshal ba stod// sangs rgyas rgyu 'bras byang chub sems yin pas// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// yid 'ong me tog rnams kyis 
105a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod mdzad ma// rnam thar sgo gsum rtog la phyag 'tshal bstod// thar par 'jug pa dbu mar grub pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin pa rab rdzogs phyir// bdug spos sprin tshogs rnams kyis rgyal ba mchod// don dam go 
105a5(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzad pa khyod la bstod// mi shes mun pa lhag mthong gis 'joms shing // thabs mchog pha rol phyin par rab rdzogs phyir// snang ba'i sgron mas kun tu mnyes mdzad ma// ma rig mun sel mdzad ma khyod la bstod/ 
105a6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs dring rab tu 'joms pa dang // smon lam pha rol phyin parab rdzogs phyir// dri mchog blug pas rgyal ba mnyes mdzad ma// dri rab bsdams mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal bstod// snying rje chen pos 'gro ba kun bsdus 
105a7(rgyud 'grel): nas// stobs bcu'i sa la kun du dgod bya'i phyir// lcags kyu 'dzin cing zhi ba las mdzad ma// shar sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// byams pa chen pos sdug bsngal kun bsal nas// yang dag/ 
105a8(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i don la dgod pa'i phyir// zhags pa 'dzin cing rgyas pa'i las mdzad ma// lho sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// dga' ba chen po 'gro kun bde la 'god// srid gsum 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i phyir// 
105b1(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog bsnams nas dbang gi las mdzad ma// nub sgor bzhugs tshul mdzad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// btang snyoms chen pos 'gro kun bdag du mdzad// ma lus sangs rgyas sa la rab dgod phyir// dril bu 'chang 
105b2(rgyud 'grel): zhin mngon spyod las mdzad ma// byang skor bzhugs mdzod la gus pas bstod// tshangs pa drag po nyi ma b+hA ba dang // dbang pog shin rje chus nor gyi bdag/ drang srong srin po rlung dang dbang bdag ste// 'jig rten 'dul 
105b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir zhabs drung 'dud mdzad bstod// bdag 'dra las kyis mnar ba'i skye bo yis// yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i mgon po yis// yon tan cha shas tsam yang ma rig pas// khyod kyi mdzad tshul dpag par mi nus mod// 
105b4(rgyud 'grel): mun khyud nang nas me khyer 'od tsam cig/ khyod kyi mthu yis dad pa'i blo thob nas// rgya mtsho che las skra rtse'i chu thigs tsam// bdag yid spo bas khyod la bstod pa 'dis// cung zad tsam rnyed dge ba dri ma med// gangs ri ltar 
105b5(rgyud 'grel): dkar cha tsam thob pa des// rgyud lnga'i 'gro bas nyes pa kun spangs nas// mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i gnas thob shog/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bcu bdun la don rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ 
105b6(rgyud 'grel): drim med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka sngongaH/ bod skad du/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskal ba// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chags 
105b7(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam gzigs bcom ldan 'das// spyan ras kyis gzigs spyan zur bdag la gzigs// spyan bur gzigs pa tsam gyis 'gro rnams kyi// sdug bsngal nyam thag zhi mdzad khyod la mnga'// mtha' med g.yang sar 
105b8(rgyud 'grel): ljang nas sa 'og gi/ mun nag thibs por gtan du 'khyams pa bdag/ nyam thag phongs pas thugs rjes mchog sbyin cing // yongs su srubs pa'i dus la de ring bab// sdug phongs gang gis nga ni dran byas na// de yaM 
106a1(rgyud 'grel): nyam thag nga yi bsal lo zhes// khyod kyis zhal bzhes sngon mdzad deng bdag gi/ nyam thag bsal te 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// mthong dang thos dang reg dang dran pa yis// nad gdon thams cad ngas bsal/ 
106a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsungs pas// nad kyis gdungs pa'i 'gro ba bdag cag pa'ang // mchog sbed nyid kyis zhal bzhes ma rnyed mdzod// 'gro rnams gang dag sdug bsngal de dag gi/ nyam thag kun tu bcad par bya'o zhes// dgangs 
106a3(rgyud 'grel): nas mgon po gzhan du rnam nur// bdag cag sdug bsngal khyod kyis pa gzigs sam// gang gis khyod nyid drar pa tsam gyis kyang // de mod nyam thag pabs pa 'ga' med la// bdag kyang rtag tu nyam thag gzir bzhin 
106a4(rgyud 'grel): khyad kyi drin gyis ma skyabs skal rdungs so// mthu ldan khyod kyi thugs rje'i blo gros kyis// lanal par bzhin du phan 'dogs pa// bdag kyang khyod la skyabs su mchi bzhin du// sdug pangs 'di 'dra'ang migazigs 
106a5(rgyud 'grel): kye ma'o brlag/ ji lta ji ltar nyor mongs gyur pa dang // ji lta ltar rten med phongs gyur pa// de lta de ltar khyod kyi thugs rje yang // der ni phyi phyir mngon par 'phel lo skad// sdig ldan bdag gi nyam thag sdug bsngal yang / 
106a6(rgyud 'grel): shin tu brnag dka' rten med skyabs med pa// de dag las bdag thugs rjes bkal badzad na// khyod kyi thugs rje phyogs gcig ci ru rang // 'gro ba gang gis skyes mchog khyed dran na// don med gyur pa sngon chad 'ge' ma 
106a7(rgyud 'grel): mchis// sdug bsngal shin tu drag pos nam thag 'dis// brlag la khad kyis mgon khyod bdag la dgongs// thugs rje'i gnas gyur sdug pangs ma lus pa// phongs pa thugs rje chen pos 'phrag mdzad pa// khyod kyis 
106a8(rgyud 'grel): gal te bdag la ma gzigs na// bdag gi rten gzhan gang lags gsung du gsol// mgon po khyod la skyabs su mchis dgul// mdal sdug bsngal ma'i 'ga' ma mchis// bdag kyang skyabs su mchis yis brtsa 
106b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yis// sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di las bskyab tu gsol// khyod kyi mtshan tsam grag la brten pas kyang // sdug phongs ma lus zhi bar 'gyur lags na// bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis pa// de 'dra'i thugs 
106b2(rgyud 'grel): rje ci las gyur pa lag/ khyod kyis grub brnyes bzhin du sems can rnams// yongs su bskyab phyir smon lam mjed lags na// bdag kyang sems can grangs pas ma 'das pas// mchog sbyin bdag gi sdug bsngal dbrog 
106b3(rgyud 'grel): du gsol// nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa'i tshogs bcom zhing // zla gas la dri med khyod ni rab bzhugs kyang // da dung bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis non cing // sdig pa'i mun pas non bskal chungs so// skye bo rnams kyis gang 
106b4(rgyud 'grel): zhus skyong mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis zhus bzhin mi gnang ba// mtshams las thar bar skal ba med dam ci// shin du ngan nam cir thal yas re mug/ mgon po khyod ni sems can phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po 
106b5(rgyud 'grel): ma spangs bzhin du yang // sdug bsngal ba rnag dka'i rang bzhin gsol 'debs la// skyob pa mdun na gnas bzhin 'dod 'bod// 'jig rten skye bo'i pha ma'ang 'di ltar du// kha chus btab par gyur kyang mi skyo bzhin// sems/ 
106b6(rgyud 'grel): can phan brtson khyed la'ang 'khor ba nas// 'khor ba'i tshe na bdag ni skyabs mchi zhing // nag po'i las kyis nyin dang mtshan du ni// mngon par zil gyis mnon par gyur pa dang // sdug bsngal cher gdungs 'di las thar bya'i 
106b7(rgyud 'grel): phyir// nyin rer 'dod 'bod kyis ma skyo srungs// de ltar bdag gis pos shing sme ba yis// khyod thugs shin du thugs rjes brlan gyur pa// de ltar skye bo sdug bsngal brgyas gzir ba// kun la'ang srid bcom khyod ni 
106b8(rgyud 'grel): dgongs mdzad cing // thugs rje'i dbong gyur thugs ni bstan pa yis// gzhan don 'ba' zhig lhun len yon tan no// bla ma'i gnas gyur khyod ni sdug bsnga la kun// 'phrog ma'i nus mthu ldan pa de bzhin no// bdag 
107a1(rgyud 'grel): gis srid pa mthar mdzad spyan ras gzigs dbang la// bstod bskal 'di bgyis bsod nams thob pa gang yin des// bcos min rang bzhin bde ldan bde ba can du ni// 'gro kun sdug bsngal gzer spangs 
107a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu phyin gyur cig/ thugs rje chen po la bstod cing bskul ba nyer bzhi pa// dge bsnyen chen po bla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po par me shwa ra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha 'gos lhas bcas kyis bskur cing 
107a3(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// 6/ gas pa da thaM gags pag ji sto papa sa so// rgya gar skad dra/ Ar+ya a bo g+ha pA sha pany+dza de bsto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ 'phags pa 
107a4(rgyud 'grel): don yod zhags pa lha lnga la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can sdug bsngal me tshogs kyis gdungs la// thugs rje'i char rmA na bsil bas zhi mdzad cing // rang bzhin bde ldan gnas su 'dren mdzad pa// mgon po spyan ras gzigs 
107a5(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po'i zhags pas 'gro kun gyi// gnod pa nges shel ba de la 'god mdzad cing // sna tshogs sprul pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// don yod zhags pa grags la phyag 'tshal lo// ma chags 
107a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i rigs kyi sprul pa ste// klu rgyal tshul gyis gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa// dbang chen bskal pa'i me ltar rab sbyin 'bar// khro rgyal rta mgrin rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid spros bral ro gcig mngon gyur tshul// ral pa
107a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig 'chang lha mo'i skur ston cing // bgegs tshogs 'dul phyir khro mo'i cha lug 'dzin// ral pa gcig ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan bzhir gyur cing // skal ldan rjes 'thun 'gro na mdzad la 
107a8(rgyud 'grel): brtson// mgon po'i 'phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad ma// lha mo khro gnyer can la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ paN Di chen po e ra pa tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
107b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi paN Na gad na yod rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba rin chen grags pas bskur ba'o// // / gas gas pa mas das pas gsapa// rgya ga skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ka ti shwa ra s+ya tsan+ma Te ru ci sto 
107b2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsan+d+ra Tis bstod pa/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mi lha min gyis ni zhabs la bcad// skyergan dang 'chi ba rab tu bcom// thugs rje'i rang can 
107b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang po khyed// skyabs med padag la snying rje mdzod cig kye// nyon mongs rlabs chen tshogs kyis 'joms byed cing // sna tshogs sgra sgrogs 'khor ba'i chu gter dbus// bying ba bdag ni zud la bsrung bar mdzod// 
107b4(rgyud 'grel): brtse ba chen po khyed la bstod pa bgyid// srid pa'i mun pas mig la nyer 'tsho zhing // 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa chen pos lus nyam chung // ji srid mnar med mi mnyam 'gro min par// bsrungs la bcom ldan pa dag la kun tu gzigs// 
107b5(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med gzung ba byas// mi shes pa yis srog chags stong phrag bsang // bdag gis sdig byas deng du mgon po yis// lus can skyon rnams ma lus nyams par mdzod// gang zhig 'tshe ba dang ni bkur sti'i 
107b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bden min 'jig rten 'dod pa min pa smras// dmyal ba yun du goms pa'i smra ba can// de kun 'jig rten dbang pos zhi bar mdzod// bdag gis sems can phan min gang bsams dang // gzhan gyis byas la'ang rjes 
107b7(rgyud 'grel): su yi rang ba// mgon po de la du bar bgyi ba na// deng bdag yid kyi sdug pa bsal du gsol// lha dang mi dang lha min ris rnams dang // dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dgas 'gro bar ni// gnas shing rtag tu gdung ba'i sems can gang // 
107b8(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni de rnams bsrung zhes bdag la grags// de phyir gzhon nu nyid srong lus la ni// thugs rje'i gzigs pa bdag gi steng spros shes// dmyal bar zhugs pa min pa ji srid du// smra bar bgyi yis bcom ldan khyed kyis gson// 
108a1(rgyud 'grel): 'on kyang gzhan gyi don la btang snyoms pa// dor zhig bcom ldan bdag don ma mdzad do// yang na brtse ba'i dbang gyur khyod kyis ni// bsod nams bskyed mdzad rgud pa ma gzigs sam// dran pas kyang ni khyod ni 
108a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs tshiman// sdig pa dor bar mdzod cig ma gzigs sam// de slang bcom ldan 'das gzhan phan la mkhas pa// bdag ni 'dor bar ma mdzad 'di du bsrungs// glang chen rta dang bur bcas chung ma dang // dmag bcas/ 
108a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal srid khang pa sna tshogs dang // sha rus mgo dang khrag gi mthar thug pa// don du gnyer la mtha' dag khyod kyis byin// su zhig 'jig rten dbang po khyod mnyes byed// ri lu mig sman mchil lham grub pa dang // grub pa'i 
108a4(rgyud 'grel): sman dang nor bu rnam dag sngags// gnod sbyin mo dang grong 'dzag sgrub par byed// gang dag mig dang rkang lag sman pa yi// sna tshogs nad kyi 'jigs chen nyam thag pa// khyod ma zhes na ni de rnams yongs rgyas lus// rnam 
108a5(rgyud 'grel): sgeg nad med yon tan zab mor 'gyur// khyod rjes gang lags rgyal 'gyur ga ra Da// gcan gzan gza' dang mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// rtag tu zhi 'gyur de yi mdun du ni// gshin rje'i pho nya rgyu bar mi byed do// 'jig rten
108a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dgyes bzhin skyabs med bdag/ 'dor ba ci zhes bcom ldan bdag sme te// nim so sor lag pa bsgreng byas nas// cho ga 'khrugs pa yi skrag pa zhi bar mdzad// 'khrugs pa'i lus kyis song ba'i skye bar bdag/ 
108a7(rgyud 'grel): yul drug la ni dbang po g.yo ba'i yid// sdig pa mang byas 'dir ni ma lus pa// dkris pa'i rgyu yis 'khor zhing rnam par 'dzings// gang gis ngan song sdug bsngal ma myong bar// bde 'gro mngon sum 'gro de khyod kyis mdzod// 
108a8(rgyud 'grel): deng bdag 'jig rten dbang la phyag dang zhing // sna tshogs thal sbyar 'di ni phyag gi'o// khyod ni rmongs dang sdang ba 'jig pa'i rgyu// 'khor ba'i chu gter chen po'i zam pa lags// ltung zhing skrag pa slong ba'i dpung pa khyod// 
108b1(rgyud 'grel): sdig lci mtshan mor byed pa'i sgra gcan no// bla med bde gshegs kyis gsungs de nyid kyis// khyod kyis sems can sdug bsngal mang po sbyangs// rgyal dka' yid bsrubs bdud las khyod rgyal te// kun tu grol ba srid mtsho'
108b2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol lo// nad kun gcod par mdzad pa khyod kyi sku// ma lus 'gro bar mchog tu lus mdzes pa// bcom ldan dpe med snying rje'i sin d+ha khyod// rgyu med gnyen du skye bo rnams la grags// rol pas dbang po 'joms shing 
108b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'byed// khyod ni yul la kun nas chags pa 'dir// lha yi bsam gtan mnyam bzhag khyod kyi thugs// nor ni slong ba po dang thun mong lags// brtse ldan khyod ni gzhan la phan mdzad kyang // gti mug lto 'phye / 
108b4(rgyud 'grel): chen pos sos zin cing // yul la kun rtogs dge ba las ltung ba// bdag ni tshim par mi mdzad ci ltar lags// mtha' dag 'gro ba'i don bsten snying rje gang // khyod kyis spros de nges pa lags sam ci// khyod kyi spyan sngar

108b6(rgyud 'grel): lus nyin mtshan par med 'bebs par 'gyur// bcom ldan dran las bdag gi bsod nams gang // de ni 'gro 'dis bde blag thob gyur te// dpal ldan po tal yi ra ber gnas// mdzes shing sna tshogs rol pas skye bar shog/

109a1(rgyud 'grel): mgon po'i yan lag mchog btud cod pan 'dzin la 'od dang ldan pa'i nor bu lta bu'i 'od// mtsho skyes stan ldan gus pas rab 'dud mgo bo la ni dza ti'i me tog rgyas 'phreng 'od ltar te// bde 'byung dbu yi 
109a2(rgyud 'grel): dbu brgyan re dgas mtshan ldan dkar ser ma dman dman zhing nyams pa nyid bgyid pa/ 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs se ni dri med ri bor mdzes pa'i zhi slad 'jig rten la gyur cig/ ral khur 'dzin pa'i zla ba rab gsal ral 
109a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar ser dang 'grogs lhan cig bkra ba'i zer rnams kyis// nges par mi rdzi 'phrog byed kyi ni dman pa min pa'i cod pan nor bu'i 'od rnams kyis kyang min// lha tshogs rnams kyi skra 'phreng mdzes pa nag po dag dang

109a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa zhi gyur pa// 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi sen mo bsil ldan pa'i sngon med zer gyis khyed rnams dag gyur cig/ nyon mongs phung po'i bud shing dag ni lus pa med par bsreg byed me chen mthon por gyur pa'i

109a8(rgyud 'grel): zhabs las 'khrungs sen tshogs 'od zer rnams kyis khyed kyi 'khor ba yang dag sel gyur cig/ rang gi mdun pas bcad pa'i 'dod pa sbyin la shin tu mkhas gyur yid bzhin nor bu bsam yas shing // shin tu 'jigs 
109b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dgos pas gdungs gyur zhi bar bgyid pa'i bsil ba'i 'od zer yid ni rab 'phrog la// yon tan du ma'i tshogs rnams 'dzin pa gsal bar gyur cig mdzes pa dang ldan me long dag gi gzugs// 'jig rten dbang

109b7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sa bon btab pa las skyes mi chung dpag bsam shing gi myu gu'i tshogs rnams dang // mtshungs pa gang yin 'di yis khyod kyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa rab mang mthu tshogs nyams par byed gyur cig/ 
109b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs pa de las skyes sen mo'i 'od zer bdud dang dgra sde dag la skrag ster zhing // ut+pal dmar mdog dong par don yod mnga' rnams med rtse gyen du bstan bcug 'od zer ltar dkar rab mdzes la/ 
110a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i dong du ltung ba'i skye bo 'dren byed sra mkhregs thag pa'i dpyad thag 'dis// shin tu rnyed dka'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po mtho ba'i go 'phang dag la khyed rnams 'god gyur cig/ 'od

110b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya cher sdug bsngal rnam mang 'jigs su rung rnams yang dag 'phrog par byed gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang po zhabs las rab skyes sen mo'i gnas la snang ba dag ni shin tu bzlog dka' ba'i// bdud kyis kun nas rab

110b3(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum gyis mi nus nus pa srid pa gsum las rgyal ba'i ru mtshon chen pos rgyal gyur cig/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi zla ba kun nas mdzes ldan 'od kyi tshogs pa lta bu dang // nyon mongs des
