110b7(rgyud 'grel): las khyed rnams bsrungs gyur cig/ phun tshogs dam pa'i sgrub byed rab tu stobs ldan pad+mo 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi rdzong la gnas bcas shing // 'jig rten gsum dpal rgyal bar bzhad pa sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs ni 
110b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med mngon par rab thob// bshes gnyen 'chang pas thob pa'i rab gsal rjes su 'grogs ldan shin tu phul byung 'phel ba rnyed gyur pa rgud pa kun gyi dgrar gyur theg chen yang dag 'grub pa'i rgyu des khyed rnams 
111a1(rgyud 'grel): phongs las skud gyur cig/ gtsug phud la ni zla byed rgyan 'dzin bzhed par gyur pa'i phyag bdag 'di ni ngo tsha dang bral la// nub par mi 'gyur nor bus mngon par mdzes 'dod khyab 'jug dag dang ji ltar mkhas 
111a2(rgyud 'grel): pa lta bu yin// dbang po yi ni mgo bo che la nor bu 'di yang don yod min zhes phyag na pad zhabs kyi// sen mo'i tshogs 'di mthong gyur gang zhig mdzes pas sems zin 'jig rten gyis bsams de yis rgyal gyur cig/ 
111a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya khyon cher byas ring du steng du 'gro zhing du'ang dmyal ba zhams kyi sgrol bar byed par gyur// bsil zer ldan pa 'char kar gyur ltar dkar zhing dgra rnams bzhin ni nag po nyid du 'gyur ba'i rgyu// nus mthu rnam par shes
111a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba dka' zhing ma lus 'gro bas mchog tu gsal bar mthong zhing snang // dbul sangs rgyas kyi ni zhabs pad la gnas sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed nams srung gyur cig// lha dbang dgyes pa'i 
111a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la mkhas lha mo rab gtor ga pur phye ma kun nas 'thul ba yi// 'od ltar snang zhing gus pa'i khur thogs 'phrog byed phyag 'tshal ral pa'i thal bar rnam par 'khrul pa'i sa// dpal mo mchod pa 'bul ba'i lag gi 
111a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i ge sar rtse yi rdul phran zags pa ltar mdzes pa// phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs las skyes gyur sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams phongs las srungs gyur cig/ lhun po'i 'od zer ser po min bgyid lha yi glang chen li 
111a7(rgyud 'grel): khri'i tshon gyis gsal byas dmar po'i dpal// nyams par byed la dpa' zhing rta ljad can gyi rta yi mi dman ldang ba nyid ni 'phrog bgyid la// sngon po'i snang ba nyams bgyid 'chi med bu mos 'o ma'i chu ster lud par rnam 
111a8(rgyud 'grel): rtags skrag gyur pa// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi pad+mo las 'khrungs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyi khyed rnams srungs gyur cig// lha rnams khyed kyi rnga yab bsil zer byed pa ltar dkar bdag gis 'di la 
111b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes par mi 'os te/ ka ye ram b+he dgos pa med pa'i ga pur phye ma gus pa'i rtsom pas yongs su 'thor ba ci// bde sogs khyod kyi me tog dkar po rnams kyi rab tu gtor bas ci zhes mtho ris sa yi rje// mchod la sngags
111b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad phyag na chu skyes zhabs 'khrungs sen mo'i 'od zer tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ ke la sha ltar 'bigs byed mdzes skyed lha min las rgyal lus kyi nag po nyid ni nyams par bgyid// nag mo rtse 'joms 
111b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes ldan byugs shing nyi ma'i rta yi 'od zer ljang khu nyid kyang dkar por mdzad// mchod mkhas lha yi skye bos gtor ba'i kun d+ha'i zil las bsil zer can gyi dum bu ltar gyur rnams// ci zhig la dgos 'jig
111b4(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang po'i zhabs sen 'od zer che ba'i tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ 'khor ba'i chu srin bdag po pha rol bgrod pa'i rnams la bsdams pa'i lam chen dag dang mtshungs 'gyur zhing // bzlog par dka' 
111b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sdug bsngal me 'bar zhi bar mdzad pa bsod nams chen po'i tshogs kyi chu bo ni// dngas pa rang dga' dag tu 'bab pa lta bu dbu la sangs rgyas kyi ni zhabs las 'khrungs pa yi// 'od zer mchog tu rnam par rgyal 
111b6(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur rnams khyed rnams kyi srid pa myur du sel bar mdzad gyur cig// nag mo dga' ba'i mdzes pa zil gyis gnon bgyid sa gzhi 'dzin pa ke la sha ye na// snang ba rgyas pa gsal bar nyams shing 
111b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar po nyid gyur kha ba can gyi dkar ba nyid kyang 'phrog/ 'o ma'i rgya mtsho rgyas pa lud pa dang mtshungs phyogs rnams kyi yang lha yi glang chen so rnams ni// bcag pa'i dum bu ltar du 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs sen 
111b8(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer rgyas pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig// gang zhig yongs 'du'i me tog gis mchod mtsho skyes dpal ni 'dzums shing bung ba'i cho gas rnams kha bsgyur bgyid// gang la gnas bzhin bsnyen bkur 
112a1(rgyud 'grel): la chags pad ma cung zad bum zhing rang byung 'dug pa dka' bar gyur// gang gis lha yi chung ma gdung ba'i skyon sel nyin mo'i dpal ni nag mo min par mtshan mor gyur// phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs zen zla ba 
112a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa dang ldan zla ba'i 'od 'dis khyed rnams sung gyur cig// lha'i na chung skye bo mdzes ma rnams kyis 'dod 'os su 'khrul tshugs su lta zhing mchod gyur la// sen mo'i 'od gsal dkar zhing mdzes par gyur 
112a3(rgyud 'grel): ba pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i tshogs pa lta bu 'dzin mdzad cing // mi chung 'dod par brgyas 'dod ldan lta bur gzhan gyis dbang gyur du ma'i spyod la rab tu 'jug/ mi dman lha yi grong gi tsan dan gyis byugs phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs kyis 
112a4(rgyud 'grel): khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ kun dga'i khur bu mi dman rab rgyas lha'i lag pas yongs 'du'i me tog rab tu gtor rnams la// bung ba'i don 'thun nag po brtsegs pa shin tu gnag par gsal ba'i tshogs pa lta bu 
112a5(rgyud 'grel): rab rgyas pa// phyag dpad+ma'i zhabs kyi mtsho skyes dag gi sen mo'i 'od ni dri med 'o ma'i chu gter gyi// dbus las 'khrungs pa'i dpal mo g.yo med dge ba'i rgyu 'dis khyed kyi dge legs mchog tu sgrub gyur cig/ re ba rnams 
112a6(rgyud 'grel): chang skyobs 'phel ba'i me'i rtse mo gcod pa'i chu chen rab tu rgyas gyur cig// pad+ma'i mdzes pa'i rjes 'thun gyis drangs sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sgrib byed rnams kyis bsgribs par gyur pa'i dpal// sen mo'i 'od zer dkar 
112a7(rgyud 'grel): zhing rags la stug por gyur pas rang dgar khyab cing nad ni khengs gyur pa// sor mo chu skyes dpal la reg pa'i zhabs kyis tshegs med ma ched khyed kyi 'dod pa sprin gyur cig/ 'khor lo'i 'od ni rab tu mdzes dang ldan 
112a8(rgyud 'grel): gyur dri med sen mos bskyed pa ngo bla med pa'i dpal// mtshungs med yon tan grangs med bsod nams rnams kyis 'thob pa'i mtshan gyi tshogs ni rnam par 'dzin gyur cing // ma lus gling rnams gsal ba'i mthu ldan 
112b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu che bar phun sum tshogs pas sa yi bdag po rnams// phyag bgyid mgo yi 'khor lo sgyur ba dbu la sangs rgyas zhabs kyis khyed rnams yun ring srung gyur cig/ mtho ris gang ga'i gser gyi pad sngon me tog cung zad 
112b2(rgyud 'grel): bye bas 'di la gtor ba'i yon tan ci// dpal ldan mtsho skyes su 'khrul bung ba'i phreng bas glu blings nyid la glu rnams kyis ni ci zhig bya// rab mdzes sen mo 'di la nor bu phreng ba rnams kyis mdzes pa nyid du bgyi bar dus 
112b3(rgyud 'grel): min zhes// gang zhig mchod pa lha yi dbang pos gsungs gyur phyag na chu sras bsdams pa'i zhabs des rgyal gyur cig/ gang zhig mgon po kho na'i bde bar gshegs pa'i rgyur gyur 'ba' zhig zhig ma yin skye ba'i snod kyi 
112b4(rgyud 'grel): yang // gang du pad+mo mngon 'dod sbrang rtsis thung ba'i tshogs gnyis 'dab bskyod ma yin skye bo rnams kyi yang // gang gis rab gyis nyid shin tu bla mar gyur cing 'dud rnyed ma yin 'jig rten gsum po yang // dbul bde ga shes 
112b5(rgyud 'grel): ri bong 'dzin pa'i 'od kyis rnam par gsal ldan zhabs des 'jig rten srung gyur cig// gang zhig sten byed bung ba rnams la btung ba'i sbyin pas dga' mgu rangs pa'i tshogs ni skyed mdzad cing // gang gi rtsa ba mi 
112b6(rgyud 'grel): dman nges pa kho nar ljang khu nyid min mchog tu mdzes panyer 'dzin la// rdul gyi tshogs rnams 'chi med mgor nyal dpal ni gnas pa'i sar gyur sen mo 'od zer bzhad pa yi// ge sar dang ldan 'jig rten mgon po'i 
112b7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi pad+mas khrid la yun ring dge legs sbyin gyur cig// lus 'joms nyams byed 'jigs su ru ba'i dgra 'jobs sbubs pa lus can rnams kyi mtshon te 'dod pa yi// dngos grub 'bod par byed cing kye ma 
112b8(rgyud 'grel): shin tu zer bsags ma bad sdig pa'i tshogs tshon zad mdzad pa// nyon mongs bkod pa dgra'i bsam pa'i bsregs lugs kyis bskyed sdug bsngal me chen gyis ni bsregs pa dag/ sel ba'i chu rlung phyag na pad+ma'i zhabs 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od kyis khyed kyi rnam mang phan pa sgrub gyur cig/ dbul sangs rgyas rgyan ldan zhabs kyi nye 'khor du rgyu ma tshad med pa'i pad+mo'i 'khrul ldan pa// bung ba'i phreng ba sgra snyan sgrogs pa rnams ni sems can bskyab 
113a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bya ba gcig pu rab brtan la// yun rings bzhugs par bstan par bgyi slad stobs chen snying rje dag gis sbom zhing gnag pa lcags kyi ni// lcags sgrogs bkod pa lta bus khyed rnams dag gi phun sum tshogs pa 
113a3(rgyud 'grel): nges par g.yo med sgrub gyur cig/ pad+ma'i nang gi 'dab ma'i phreng ba ltar mdzes 'jam zhing rdo rje lta bu sral rnam par brtan// gdug pa'i dgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bsdun byas mtshon cha'i tshogs rnams rnam par nyams par 
113a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i sa// dmar zhing chags pa nye bar zhi ba 'khor ba'i chu ga ter dag las sgrol bar bgyid pa'i byed pa po// shin tu stobs ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i ri bong can 'dzin zhabs kyis khyed kyi skyo ba sel gyur cig/ 
113a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang po'i chu skyes rab tu rgyas shing mdzes pa'i tshogs la bung ba g.yo ldan yin yang mi g.yo zhing // kun du dga' ba'i kun na 'phrog byed lag na gnas pa'i tshogs sred ldan yin yang mi srid de// mdun du khyab 'jug 
113a6(rgyud 'grel): gis gtor mdzes yongs 'du'i me tog dri bzangs ldan la'ang dga' ba mi skye bar// gang du byung ba'i phreng ba dgar 'gyur rgyal ba 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma des khyed srung gyur cig/ 'od zer rab tu mang po'i tshogs las 
113a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i ral pa g.yo zhing shin tu rab mdzes gsal ldan la// dmar zhing mdzes pas rjes 'brel rab tu mtho ba sen ma'i so btsigs kun nas mdzes shing yid du 'ong // nyes par zhugs pa'i gnyis 'thung dgra bo skrag 
113a8(rgyud 'grel): bgyid ring du g.yo ba'i spyan gyis kun du gzigs gyur pa// pad skyes ral pa'i nag nal 'jig rten dbang po'i zhabs kyi seng ge khyed rnams zhi ba'i slad gyur cig// shin tu dri ma med kyang mi chung yangs pa 
113b1(rgyud 'grel): na yang myur dra phyugs kyi spyan pas 'ag bang btsud// 'jig tan gsupa ba zur d+hu ga ba sa kyang kya thAms ldan pa sa sa thas mangs su gadrung ba d+ha/ yangs sdug 'gyur byad thug pa ldan yang yul d+ha 
113b2(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal ba pa dgags mdug na// dmarnas ca pa byed dam pa'i rashA zhig par ra 'grus so// gang la rnam pa'i rgyal pas pan pa rnams dang 
113b3(rgyud 'grel): byad kyis kyang yangs 'ang shA nang da zhug dngas// thabs pan dag kya ba ldanan rnams da na zla rgyad kyis nga bram ba chags// 'bas lda dpa' la shA ra b+hAms 
113b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i byang par rab rnams// rjes su da pa'i stan dgalta bras mdzad po gyis byug nan skyes dkyis nas kyad rnams gyur cig/ 'di rnams rnam par gsal brnams bskyed ba gyis min pa rnams kyis mtsha ras 
113b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon pa yis// sor ma'i rtse ma'i tshigs la dbang phyug 'dren byed rnam pa mdzes pa'i mtha' sa mthar byed kyang // 'jig rten rnams la gang gi zhung mang min pa'i mdzes pa phul du byung ba'i yul nam 
113b6(rgyud 'grel): ni// ma lus bzang ba'i nus pa yang mam pag la sang sa rgyus gzugs kyis mtshan pa' dbas nas rgyal glar cig/ yang dag rtags pa'i sangs rgyas yang kyis dgas la ras pa'i chags kyi shing ldan pa 
113b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku// 'khor ba'i chug ter gting du 'jug byed skye bo'i tshogs kyi shin tu lci ba'i sag zhi ba gnan ring // mtha' rnams dgal yang dag byung ba yid 'ong zag cing dmar pa'i khams chen ldan pa'i chu rnams 'bab/ 
113b8(rgyud 'grel): grung po'i don 'thun gyis rten pad+mo 'dzin pa ri ba'i zhabs ni khyed kyi bzang ba'i slad gyur cig/ 'khor ba'i lam la rab bgrod 'gro ba mtha' dgang la zhing dub ldan zhi ba'i rgyu yi grib bsil can// rab tu mdzes pa'i yal 
114a1(rgyud 'grel): garab bsal sen mo'i me tog 'dzin cing 'dod don 'bras bu dang ldan pa// lha'i skye bos rab bdud mgo'i phreng bas basbyor ba'i rtsa bar nor bu'i bum pa gang ba yi// dri med 'od kyi chus dran 'jig rten dbang po'i 
114a2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyi ljon shing phun tshogs kyis khyed srung gyur cig/ rtsa ba rab brtan zhon mongs tshogs pa'i dgra bo stobs ldan stobs rnams bcad rnyed pa chen po yis// rangs pa thob gyur rnam par sgeg ldan stobs ldan las rgyal
114a3(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo'i gnas la g.yo zhing rnam par rtse// chu skyes rgyas pa'i rdzun la chags shing kun du sred ldan dang dir mang po rab tu sgrogs pa yi// bung ba'i tshogs pa mi bzlog mtshungs med dri bral pad+ma 'dzin pa'i zhabs kyis 
114a4(rgyud 'grel): khyed la srur gyur cig/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug dpal 'byor lag ldan chung ma g.yo ba'i sdom thag gdags sa'i dbyug pa ste// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sbrul gdug sos zin 'gyel ba'i 'gro ba mtha' dag skyong
114a5(rgyud 'grel): bar byed mkhas nam mkha' lding // mi chung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nang du bzlog dkar 'jug pa'i sgo sdom rab brtan srid pa'i chu gter ni// legs par rgal ba'i gdos pa gcig pu 'jig rten pa'i dbang po'i 
114a6(rgyud 'grel): zhabs ni khyed rnams 'byor pa'i slad gyur cig/ 'dun sa gang du lha'i rol mo mkhan rnams mdzes pas yid gzung mchod pa bgyid par ma nus te// gang rnams rnam pa las 'das sil snyan rig byed kha na ma tho med 
114a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams de tshe rnam par nyams// dman pa min pa'i glu dbyangs mi len nyams rnams dag gis spras pa'i dngos po nyid min ngo bor gyur// de ltas brgya byin nang du bzhad gyur lta bas mi ngoms gzugs can mtsho 
114a8(rgyud 'grel): skyes can des rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan par med rab bu mtshungs pa med cing cher gyur 'dod pa chen po'i khang pa mchog gi sar// lhag pa'i stabs ldan g.yon gyi rim par mi bzad 'dras pa'i bdud kyi yid rnams 
114b1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'joms mdzad cing // sems can dga' ba de rab bzhed grags pa dang ni 'jam pa'i thugs ldan ngal bas skyo bar mi 'gyur ba// mgo la 'od dpag med pas khyed kyi gti mug gis bskrun rab 'joms 
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya che'i 'jigs pa 'joms kyugyur cig/ brtan pa'i rab 'jigs su rung ba'i bskor zhing sgra ldan bcing bas dam bcings ring por gsal ba'i sgra// drag po shin tu 'jigs rung dmyal ba'i grong khyer nyid kyis
114b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa 'dzin pa dgra rnams dgagis ni// brtson khang nang du gdung ba drag pos shin tu 'jigs par gyur rnams dran nas skyabs la rab gshegs shing // bkur sti sgrub mdzad snying rje rab lci 'jig rten dbang phyug 
114b4(rgyud 'grel): gang yin de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ bskal pa'i mtha' yirba rlabs ltar 'phyogayo ba'i rlung gi stobs kyis rab brlabs rba rlabs phreng ba rnams// skra drag sgrogs shing thor thor dang ldan chu srin tshigs 
114b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis gang ba 'jigs rung chu yi chu gter ni// gang zhig dmigs pa nyid na 'thon 'thong dri ma meng po'i tshogs chen bkram pa rtse dga' dag gis gnas// zhams rab dga' bar 'grub 'gyur pad+mo can de shin 
114b6(rgyud 'grel): myur bar 'gro rnams srung ba'i srad gyur cig/ ngu ba'i tshogs kyi 'ching bas bcings pas zla ba zhi ma'i 'od zer rnams shing 'bras bu med par byed// 'gog pa bskyed pa'i bgegs la mkhas pa'i lha yi chung 
114b7(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams kyang brtan pa'i mthu rnams nyams 'gyur ba'i// du ba'i rgyal mtshan can yang gang gi mang brjod rgyun 'dzin 'dzin byed rnams la rab tu nyams gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'dzin pas khyed la nyams dgar 
114b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyun chad med cing sgrub byed dang bcas legs par sgrub gyur cig/ khro bas rang ba slang lag pa dus kyi mtshon cha dang 'dra 'jigs su rung ba'i slad ces sgrog par byed// chang gis bsgom pa'i 'gram pa dag tu 
115a1(rgyud 'grel): bung ba'i tshogs gtibs blo bur gnag gyur dar zhing che ba'i lus// lag ldan dbang po 'ong ba gang gi mtshan gyi lcags kyu brnag dkas btab na zhum zhing skrag 'gyur ba// 'jig rten dbang po'i thugs rje 
115a2(rgyud 'grel): rab 'dod yo byad de ni khyed kyi 'dod pa'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig/ skud ces dbugs ni 'jigs rung khro ba'i rang gnas zabs sreg byed mi chung ngug gi du bar ldan// so yi bza' ba mthong bas mgo bo shin tu rab tu gdes 
115a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur nyes byed so rtse ldan pa rnams// rang gi mtshan ni dug so'i dbang po'i dgrar gyur blo la rnam par bzhugs pas nus med nyams 'gyur ba// 'jig rten dbang de kun gyi nyon mongs phung po shin tu mi bzad mngon
115a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur na pa'i slad m+b+ha // smras dris rab tu bsang ba'i rtags pa che 'dzin glang rkyen tshogs rnams zabar sngags shing 'jigs pa'i shugs// thobs rtsag cag tu 'gro mgrin pa'i mug zab dganas drag pa 
115a5(rgyud 'grel): ngar sgra zab mo sgrogs byed pa'i// ri dgas dbang po 'khor byed kyis bkol 'os pa nyid du gang gi yon tan brjod ldan 'gyur ba// yan lag mchog mthor bde gshegs gnas shing rnal 'byor ldan des khyed kyi 
115a6(rgyud 'grel): ngan par 'brel ba sel gyur cig/ rab mang gnod pas rjes su dpag bya brtse ba zad pa'i skad ldan 'jigs pa sgrub par byed gyur pa/ mkha' la gnas shing ri yis nye bar gzhal bya bung ba ma he mngon gyur 'od lta'i 
115a7(rgyud 'grel): lus kyi tshogs// sbyor thabs legs ldan sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu gang zhabs brjod pas dman zhing brtson 'grus med pa dang // rnam par nyams par bgyid ldan bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas des khyed rnams/ 
115a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i slad gyur cig/ glang chen tshogs kyi chu srin rab gyur la gri mdung rings 'od dang ldan pa'i tha rlabs 'khrug cing rgyug/ rab bslang dkar zhing g.yo ba'i tog gi dbub legs par dpal ldan skrag pa'i 
115b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas kyi sar gyur pa// mtshungs med dgra rnams yang dag 'grogs pa'i sde brtan chu bo dag ni gang zhig bstan pa legs pa'i grus// spro ba dang bcas yang dag rgal 'gyur mtsho skyes can des khyed kyi bde min 
115b2(rgyud 'grel): bde bar sel gyur cig/ sa 'dzin tshogs rnams 'byed pa'i mthu ldan 'od zer rab mang 'byor pa'i 'od la spyod cing 'jigs byed pa// rab tu bkra ba'i me 'od rnam 'dzin 'jigs pas zil gnon 'byung po rnams ni 
115b3(rgyud 'grel): rmongs shing 'khrul bskyed pa// rdo rje 'jigs pa'i snod kyi mngon du lhung ba dag ni gang la gus pa'i mthu las myur nyid du// rnam par nyams pa'i sar 'gyur mdzes ldan mtsho skyes 'dzin pa de yis khyed kyi srid pa 
115b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byed gyur cig/ kun du gzir bas brtan nyams 'pho ba'i sgrub byed nyegyur lha ngan khros pas 'khar rje zhan gyur pa// zug gzer ba rnag dka' drag pos 'gog byed rnam pa sna tshogs mang po'i nad kyis rab tu gzir 
115b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i lus// gang gis bsam gtan nges brjod bdud rtsi 'dzin byed kyis bzung 'gro ba blo ldan zug rngus mi brdzi bar// lhag par dga' bskyed mgo la sangs rgyas de yis khyed rnams blo ni byang chub slad du srung
115b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig// ring nas bod bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bdag mtshungs med dgra rnams nyams shing rab tu gdung bar byed pa'i glu// drag tu len cing khrims lugs grags pa las rgyal khrims lugs dag dang 
115b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan// 'byor pa rnams kun rlag pa skyed pa'i rgyur gyur khros pa'i blo can gang zhabs brjod pa'i nus pa yis// mchog tu mdza' bar 'gugs byed rgyal ba'i khyu mchog gnas des khyed kyi 'jigs pa yang 
115b8(rgyud 'grel): dag 'phrog gyur cig// tshangs padamani pa nyid byung bla ma yang ni bla ma min dang mnyams par brjod pa nyid// khyab 'jug mi spu'i nga chul dbang phyug kyang ni tshigs rnams rnam par 'god pa'i khang 
116a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med gyur la// tshim zhing gsal bar bstod 'dod rnams kyang de ltar lha rnams gang gi yon tan brjod la mkhas min te// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi spyod yul nang gi yon tan tshogs mda' phyag na pad+ma/ 
116a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gis rgyas gyur cig// yab kyi sa ya mtshan la te lha dgra'i dgra yis spyod pa dang ni mig gsum ldan pas mig dag la// rigs kyi dgra yis rigs la bla ma yis kyang gshegs pa la ste mtshan mo'i 
116a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag pos sku la'o// grogs po yis ni byams pa la te a tra'i bu yis 'gro kun bu ltar gyur pa'i mnyes gshin la// 'di bstod bstod pa'i snod gang mtha' yas sprin mdzad phyag na chu skyes de yis khyed rnams 
116a4(rgyud 'grel): srung gyur cig// gang la tshangs pas rang gi zhal rnams mang po nyid la mang po legs par bzhed dang ldan pas bstod// kun dgas khengs shing phung pos kyang ngo klu rnams dag gis mgon pos kyang ni spyi bos
116a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dud par bgyis// brgya byin 'dren byed brgya phrag bcu rnams bsngags pa bgyid cing gang la rnam gzigs rgyun chad med par ni// 'dren byed dga' bas phyag 'tshal bstod gyur 'jig rten dbang des 'jog
116a6(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum rnams srung gyur cig/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i gdung med rab gsal 'jig rten pa rnams snang ba'i don du yod pa min nam zhes// mkha' yi lam la nyi ma'i mgron po 'di ni ngal zhing snang byed 'od zer 'bras 
116a7(rgyud 'grel): bu med par gleng // blo yi nor can blo ldan rnams kyis bstod pa bgyis pas 'dun sar rags pa'i snang ba sgrub byed pa// gang gi bka' drin myur du dgra rnams nyams par byed pa de las 'gro ba dge legs ldan gyur
116a8(rgyud 'grel): cig/ phyag 'os gang la phyag 'tshal bkod pa las kyang bsod nams snod rnams shin du mtho ba nyid 'gyur la// thun mong min pa'i mcho 'os gcig pu mchod kyang gus pa'i snod rnams nye bar bsags pa 
116b1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mang // gang gi bsam gtan gnas pa dran pa yis kyang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dag ni 'phral la brjed 'gyur ba// mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab 'jig rten phan pa'i sgrub lam 'jig rten mgon des khyed
116b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams srung gyur cig/ dbang po'i rdo rje brdzun te lha'i dgra rnams nyams par gang gis byas shing stobs ldan 'phrog byed ni// shin tu rno zhing yid 'phrog mngon par me tog mnga' can dag la me tog can ni 'bras bu med// 
116b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug 'khor lo la ni 'khor lo don yod min zhes skye bo'i tshogs kyis nges par brjod ces nas// mtshon tshogs bzung ba med par dgra yi skye bo dga' bas bcom pa mtsho skyes ldan pas rgyal gyur cig/ 'jig rten 
116b4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pas bde ba 'dzin par gyur kyang 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis sdug bsngal ldan// rtag tu rjes su chags pa btang bar gyur kyang skyabs med sdug pa'i srog chags gtong ba dag las grol// 'jig rten 
116b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi mgon po nyid du gyur kyang mi mnyam sred ldan 'grol sten zhing 'dud pa bgyid// mtshungs bral bsam yas spros pa sgrub mdzad mgo la sangs rgyas gang des khye rnams yun ring srung gyur cig/ rgyun mi 'chad 
116b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'jig rten gsum du dpe med mnyes gshin snum glugs sbyor ba dag las zhi bar ni// gang zhig mi gshegs stobs ldan mi chung mu stegs rlung 'tshubs dag gis rnam par mi g.yo zhing // gzhan phan rgyal brtson 
116b7(rgyud 'grel): pa rab brtan sdong bu mi nyams 'od zer dang ldan srid pa'i khang par ni// gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs pa sel byed 'jig rten dbang po'i sgron ma do yis rgyal gyur cig// gang du 'di ni kun la byams ldan mi 
116b8(rgyud 'grel): bzad mang por gyur pa'i nyon mongs dgra rnams cil sreg/ gang du grol bar nus pa'i mthu ldan snying rje'i zhags pa brtan pos g.yo ba med par ci la 'ching // gang du btang snyoms phyogs nyid la bsten gzhan la phan 
117a1(rgyud 'grel): par bgyid skad cil 'khrug ste de yi phyir// rnam bkra ngo mtshar phyag na pad+ma'i spyod pa 'grolas 'das pas khyed rnams dman la ma rgyal gur cig/ kun la phan zhing kun gyi rang bzhin du gsal rgya che tshul ldan 
117a2(rgyud 'grel): dus kun du ni kun gyi mgon// kun gyi don chen thams cad sgrub slad gang zhig 'dul ba'i sgrub byed rnam pa kun ni ster bar bgyid// bla mar gyur cing che ba'i yon tan kun gyis kun las 'das shing khengs pa kun naM 
117a3(rgyud 'grel): zhum par bgyid// kun ni kun la rab sbyin mgo la kun mkhyen des na sred chen khyed rnams 'bras dang bcas gyur cig/ dbang po rjeb skye dgu rnams bdag 'chi med bla ma 'jig rten skyong bdag dang dbang po che/ 
117a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od ldan dang ni dgra thul dbyug pa gzhan las rgyal ba'i stobs dang ldan las rgyal nor sbyin rgyal ba'i zhags// don ldan ming gi snod ni rgyal ba nyid ces khong bzhad kyis khengs 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa las/ 
117a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mi skye bo ngo mtshar gyur rnams gang la phyag bgyid phyag na chu skyes de yis rgyal gyur cig/ gtso bo 'phags pa rnams kyi mchog gur sdom pa dag ni pha rol phongs pa rab tu sel ba'i mchog/ rab tu mang ba'i mchog 
117a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin rgya che'i tshogs kyi chu yi char drag gsal zhing che ba'i rgyun tshogs kyi// sbyin pa'i mi dman rgyan 'dzin gyur cing bzlog dka' rab brtan bdud kyi dgra yis dpa' bos mi thul ba// dpag med 'od zer 'dzin pa'i 
117a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo yis ni khyed rnams dag gi dpa' bo'i dgra rnams zlog gyur cig// gang du phyag na pad+mo mdzes ldan nus pa mchog gur mthu dang ldan zhing rtag tu sbyor ba la// 'khor ba'i chu bdag la ma zhugs 'jig rten 
117a8(rgyud 'grel): mgron po mtha' dag mgon dang bcas shes rnam par bsam nas ni// sangs rgyas snying rje mi chung kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa don dang ldan pa dam bca'i khur po dog/ rnam par dor nas yang zhing mya ngan 'das pa 'thob par/ 
117b1(rgyud 'grel): dgyes 'phel de yis khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ 'gro ba'i bya ba tshogs kyi khur ni bla mar gyur pa'i bde gshegs bzhin du gtsug gis leg par blangs// bsngags par 'os pa pad+ma'i rgyan ni gus pa'i snod la rang nyid
117b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du lag tu legs par gtod// sems can tshogs kyis zhi ba dag ni dmyal me bzhin du yun ring 'thob par bgyid// gang gis nyon mongs rab 'ching rnams ni shin tu mi bzad 'gro ba bzhin du zhi mdzad des khyed 
117b3(rgyud 'grel): srungs// gang zhig rgyu can min yang rang bzhin sna tshogs mtha' yas ston byed gsal bar grags pa'i rgyu dang ldan// 'jigs kun yang dag zhi yang shin tu snying rje ldan pa nyid kyis 'jigs par gyur pa'i kun spyod 
117b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad// khro dang bral ba yin yang gdug pa'i bsam pa 'dul la mkhas pa'i rtag tu rjes su 'brel// bsam gyis khyab pa min yang chen pos bsam bya mgo la rdzogs sangs rgyas mdzes ldan des rgyal gyur cig/ yan 
117b5(rgyud 'grel): lag dam pa kho na ma lag sku lus mchog kyang dpag med 'od kyi mngon par dga' ba 'dzin// gang gi pad+mo kho na ma lag dgra sde dag kyang lci 'jigs bzod par dka' ba dag kyang man+t+ra laM// gang gi ral pa kho na ma lag nus pa 
117b6(rgyud 'grel): dag kyang 'gro ba'i dgra 'joms byed par chas shing bsdams// mkhas pa 'jig rten mgon 'dis gshin rje khros pa'i bzhin ni snang ba dag las khyed rnams sung gyur cig/ ma lus sems can don gyi bya ba bgyi srad nus 
117b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dag ni kun nas rab tu bstar byas shing // chas kyis bsdams pa gang gi tshe na srid pa'i chu gter dag ni skams kyis dogs nas 'dar byed cing // nyon mongs don mthun rab 'phros byang chub sems dpa' ngal 
117b8(rgyud 'grel): thub pa rnams kyang mya ngan 'das pa la// dge shes bsngags shing gzhol byed ma ga la bde gshegs gnas des khyed kyi rab 'dod drim zhi gur cig/ bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gnod pa dag gis rnam par 'jom 
118a1(rgyud 'grel): pa mi bzad yid kyi'ang spyod yul min pa'i las// gcig tu nges par bde ba gcod pa'i 'gro ba'i dgra bo bcad pa'i slad du phyag na pad+mo ni// dbang mod myos bzhin shin du 'jigs ldan rnam par mi 'gyur/ 
118a2(rgyud 'grel): gang gis sgo byed mgon po dag gi yang // lci bar gyur pa'i jo bo brtse ba des ni khyed rnams brtse med mthar byed dag las srung gyur cig/ zil gyis mnan pa'i sa nyid ma yin shin tu 'jam pa yin yang ji snyed 'jig 
118a3(rgyud 'grel): rten khams mtha' yas// brtson 'grus shin tu bzlog bya ma yin dus gcig la yang rab tu snang ba dag gis khyab par byed// ma lus shin tu gsal ba ma yin gzi ldan gzi yang me khyer 'od kyi cha shas rjes 
118a4(rgyud 'grel): 'thun pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug gzi brjid de yis 'jigs pa ni slad khyed kyi gti mug mun chen 'phrog gyur cig/ ma lus nam mkha'i khams ni skye bo bzhin du kun nas yongs su rdzogs par byas gyur re ba'i 
118a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs// ltung ba'i phung po thams cad snang ba bzhin du rnam par nyams par rab rtsom phul byud med par bgyid// gang gis rdzu 'phrul che ldan yid kyi bdud ni mun pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig zhi bar 'gro bgyid pa// 
118a6(rgyud 'grel): mtsho skyes ldan pa'i snang ba de ni khyed rnams dag gi rab mang 'byor pa 'phel ba'i slad gyur cig/ gzhan gyi 'od rnams nyams byed dbang phyug cig shos 'od kyis mtshungs dka' mun pa'i phung po'i stobs 'bigs
118a7(rgyud 'grel): shing // sems can 'tshe ba'i bsam pa can rnams khyad par du ni gdung byed bkra ba'i 'od zer mi nyams pa// sna tshogs mtha' yas g.yo med la sogs bsgribs pa'i yul rnams dag ni gsal bar byed pa'i 
118a8(rgyud 'grel): nus pa 'dzin// 'jig rten dbang po'i snang ba gcig kyang 'chi med tshogs mtshungs de ni khyed kyi 'jigs sel slad gyur cig/ gang du sems can ma lus rab ma 'dod pa'i chu la rgyu ba'i bde ba rnyed dka' phun tshogs
118b1(rgyud 'grel): / dan med ma rnags dpa'i ban zugs par dka' ba ga pa byad sa// bklag shA shA nas sa thab bye pa rnams par byed pa'i m+bu thang sa pa ldan pa// stugan pa 
118b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer chu gter khyed kyi nags me'i 'jig pa'i slad rnam par 'phel gyur cig// chos kyi bdud rtsi'i chu bo gdul bya la yod gal te dmyal ba'i me rnams zhi ba 'di ni ci// bcing bar byas pa ral pa'i phung po la 
118b3(rgyud 'grel): yod gal te dgra yi tshogs rnams 'gro ba bral ba ci// spyi bo'i khang par rgyal ba rab lci gnas gyur gal te mgon po 'jig rten gsum rnams dud pa ci// de ltar 'jig rten gnyen gyi rnam par bkra ba'i tha snyad dag gis 
118b4(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi dgra rnams 'joms gyur cig// mngon par dga' bas rgas pa gcig pu nyid kyang sems can bsam pa'i dbang byas rnam pa tha dad pa// dbye dka' yang dag min pa'i tog pa g.yo med mi g.yo dgal 
118b5(rgyud 'grel): rtsom pa chen po rdo rje'i rtse// dam pa'i blo gros ku mu ta la zla ba 'od zer mu stegs don med can brjod mun pa la// nyams par byed pa'i nyi ma 'jig rten dbang po gsungs pa'i bstan pa khyed kyi srid 'byed smad gyur cig/ 
118b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rnam par rtsod pa'i gnas pa kyi mdun sar 'dus pa rgya cher dregs pa'i cha las smra ba po// bzlog dkar rab gyur bston pa'i sgra chen ldan pa rkang mig la sogs dman pa dang bcas zhum 'gyur zhing // bag med
118b7(rgyud 'grel): myos pa'i skye bo rnams kyi rnam par ldud pa rab sel mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' skyed pa// mgo la rgyal ba'i sku lus 'od zer phun tshogs dag gis dngos po skye med gsung des rgyal gyur cig// dgra rnams dngang 
118b8(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur rgyal ldan mtshon gang 'od zer tshogs ni rab tu mdzes shing 'gro ba dag gis bstod// mya ngan dmyal ba'i gnas rnams dag la rgya cher gdung ba rab tu 'joms byed rnam par rgyas pa'i chu// dgra yis 'phangs pa'i 
119a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshon phreng dag la stobs ldan rdo rje srid gsum mtha' dag 'jigs par gyur pa rnams// nyams par bgyid pal bsngags phyag na pad+ma'i phyag ni khyed rnams chags nyams med pa'i slad gyur cig/ 'jigs 
119a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mthor rlung dag gis dkrugs ltar yul gyi ri bo rab 'thor ljon pa'i phreng ba'i rtsa ba rnams rtsad nas 'byin pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing dgra yi glang chen dregs pa mi chung nyams pa nyid du bgyid// slong ba'i sbrang rtsi byed 
119a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gugs sbyin pa'i rgyun 'bebs 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag gi sdong po la dga' ba// bzang po dag ni khyed kyi dgra yi grong khyer srid pa 'joms pa'i slad du brtun te 'jug gyur cig/ dam pa'i khongs ni gang zhig nor la 
119a4(rgyud 'grel): sred ldan skye bo'i tshogs kyi rib mi 'chad grub pa'i gter// gang zhig yub dag ni rdo rje'i rjes 'thun dgra rnams skrag bgyid mdab ma dam par gyur pa'i rtse// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal mos gnas bgyis 
119a5(rgyud 'grel): yon tan bsngags par 'os ldan rnam par ma btang ba// 'jig rten mgon po'i phyag gi yongs rdzogs pad+ma de ni khyed rnams dag gi grol ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ rtag tu sred pa rnam par 'phel zhing mgrin pa'i phugs 
119a6(rgyud 'grel): skams dman par gyur pa'i yi dgas phung po'i rnams// kun du dga' ba skyed byed dam pa'i bcud ldan mchog tu byang chub dpal mo lhag par gnas pa can// 'byor 'dod yid dang ldan pa rnams kyis legs par 
119a7(rgyud 'grel): bsten gnas dam pa'i pad+ma gsal zhing mdzes pa yi// tshogs kyis rab spras ze ba dang ldan 'jig rten dbang po'i chu skyes gang des khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ nyon mongs nyi ma sdug bsngal tshogs kyi 'od zer chung ba// 
119a8(rgyud 'grel): ma yin stug por gyur pa'i tshe gdung gis// gdung zhing bzhin dman skye bo gang dag rnams la tshad pa'i gdugs dang mtshungs par rjes su sgrub par byed cing // mi dman gdung bar mi 'gyur ma lus 'jig rten dag la 
119b1(rgyud 'grel): ma tshang med 'od steng gi bla rer bres// 'jig rten dbang po'i phyag na 'byor pa'i dri med pad+mos khyed kyi sdig pa nyams par 'gro gyur cig// stobs rnams kyi gnas bdag nyid che rnams che bar dar ba'i gzhi dang 
119b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer grags pa dag gi khyim// dgra rnams skrag par 'gyur ba'i gnas dang mnag par dka' ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i sa gzhi nyid gyur pa// sdug cing mdzes pa'i bsti gnas dang ni 'gro las 'das pa'i brtson 
119b3(rgyud 'grel): 'grus phung po rgya cher gyur pa'i gnas// 'jig rten dbang po'i dpungs pa 'gro ba rnams kyi dgra mang tshar gcod gtum pa'i dbyug pa nyid gyur cig// gang zhig rnam mdzes bdud kyi rgyan gyi 'gyur bag ldan yang
119b4(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo rnams ni 'jigs pa kho nar bgyid// mthong ba rtsol bar bgyid pa min nyid de lta na yang lta byed rnams kyi dga' ba chung ba yin// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes pa'i khang pa yin yang 'gro kun rgyun rnams mdzes 
119b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bral bar bgyid// 'od ldan chu skyes can gyis gos ni gcig pu de yis khyed kyi bde min bde bar sel gyur cig// gang zhig rab mdzes rgya mtshor gzugs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal nub cing bsod nams snod kyi 
119b6(rgyud 'grel): lta byed rnams/ 'gro ba 'bras bu dang bcas sred pa skyes pa yang ni mi gnas rab tu g.yo bas 'joms 'gyur ba// mtshams med rab tu mdzes ldan ri bong mtshan ma can sogs grangs med rnams ni gcig tu bgyis
119b7(rgyud 'grel): sam zhes// snyam par 'gyur zhes de yi pad+ma las kyang rgyal ldan phyag na pad+ma'i bzhin des rgyal gyur cig// gang zhig rgyun chad med par mdzes pa'i chu tshogs ldan pa'i sprin rnams kyis bsgribs dgra rnams 
119b8(rgyud 'grel): snod la ni// shin tu rab gsal lan cig ma yin 'tshig pa ster ba'i yul ngan du gyur lus can rnams la yang // shin tu rjes 'brel drim mang po'i sna tsha'i 'dam gyi tshogs kyis rab tu bsgos rnams 'khrul par bgyid// 
120a1(rgyud 'grel): mgo la sangs rgyas khang pa'i bzhin ni shin tu bzhin bzangs khyed kyi rnam bkra'i bya ba mdzad gyur cig// phyag na bzhed pa'i chu skyes dag gis skyo ba med pa'i ral ba'i thor tshugs dag ni rab gsal 
120a2(rgyud 'grel): zhing // che bar brtsigs te bkod pa'i nang na rnam bzhugs gsal ba dang 'dres 'od dpag med kyi 'od gsal tshogs// tha dad du byas 'od ni gsal ldan gyen du brtsams shing bcings pa'i steng gi stug po bkod pa ni// 
120a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pas tshim pa mi mthong dgra rnams rab 'jigs gsal zhing sgra ldan go chas khyed rnams srung gyur cig/ tshun chad med par rnam 'phro shin tu kun dga'i rgyur gyur 'od dpag med 'od chu la tshogs lta bus// bran pa 
120a4(rgyud 'grel): las ni shin tu phul byung dag cing mdzes pa'i 'phel ba rnyed gyur lhag pa'i dri bzang can// lha yi me tog rmad byung tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i pad+mo 'dzin pa'i ral bdag gi ni// dpag bsam 'khri shing cho ga 
120a5(rgyud 'grel): ni khyed rnams dag gi bsam pa'i don rnams phun tshogs 'grub pa'i rgyur gyur cig// gang zhig bcings par gyur kyang rnam par grol bar nges par bgrod byed gang zhig lus la lhag gnas pa// gzhan rnams 
120a6(rgyud 'grel): nges par spangs kyang thun mong min par mgon pa 'od dpag med kyis rnam par brgyan par mdzad// dri bzangs thams cad spangs kyang gang zhig mtshungs med dri bzangs mang pos ma lus phyogs rnams byugs gyur pa/ 
120a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang po'i shin tu che ba'i ral pa de yis khyed kyi nges par thob bya'i 'ching ba 'brog gyur cig/ ral tshogs ma lags skye bo ma lus rnams kyi yid ni 'ching bar bgyid pazhags pa'i phung po lags// mdzes 
120a8(rgyud 'grel): sdug ma lags 'on kyang sdug bsngal me yis nam bcom dgra rnams gso byed bdud rtsi dag gi rgyun// pad+mo ma lags ma rungs mthar byed rta rgod 'dul lcag rgyal ba'i ri bong can sbyar skra'i dpal byed kyi nyon mongs 
120a9(rgyud 'grel): nga ma sam pa sa mam sa mamam saca nga ma mams mams sa ma sa yas ba pa ma pa ma ca tha pas la nga ya sa ma pa sa pa mams ma mas sa ngam sa pa nga ra yang bang ba yang mdzar ba tha ba ma tha' ma yang par thang ba ra ya ra 
120b1(rgyud 'grel): skyon rnams shin du 'joms shing mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub sbyin par mdzad gyur cig/ ma lus phyogs rnams sreg byed lhag par kun du dmar ser gzi brjid ldan pa rnam par bkod gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum po mod 
120b2(rgyud 'grel): shing 'jigs la skyabs med pa pa'i tshogs 'bar bskal pa'i me ltang brtag bya ba// so bsdams sdang mig rab tu 'bar ba'i rta mgrin dag gi rjes su kun nas gtang de gzigs pa las// mtshungs med brtse ldan 'jig rten 
120b3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug skad cig 'jigs pa'i gzigs stangs skyes pas khyed rnams srung gyur cig// 'jig rten rnams ni brlag par rab gtong gsal ba ma lus sa 'dzin che rnams de ring myur bar ni// bye mar 'gyur bgyid 
120b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin par byed pa yang stem tha' med chu yi gter rnams skam pa nyid bgyid pa// de lta gang zhig khro ba bzung ste khro ga nyer rab rgyas bsdus gyur 'jigs su rung ba'i dpral ba las// nges mthen lha mo mtshungs med dpung stobs 
120b5(rgyud 'grel): can gyis mthos nas sdug 'brur mchi skyes can des rgyal gyur cig/ bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod cing bla ma rnams kyi'ang 'gro ba'i thas phyag bya rnams kyis phyag byas pa// mi spang bskal bar bsgrubs pa'i gal med 
120b6(rgyud 'grel): nus ldan mtha' dag 'gro ba'i skyabs gyur mtshungs pa med pa yi// brtse ba rang nyid lus can bzhin du 'jig rten sdug bsngal gzhil phyir pad+mo can las legs 'thon pa// sgrol ma yis ni khyed kyi 'khor ba'i btson ra'i 
120b7(rgyud 'grel): nang du lci bar gyur pa'i gdung byed 'phrog gyur cig// tshig maba' ldan pa'i tshogs kyi grangs ni bzang bar lci zhing tshig bdag gi tshig gis sde tshan yang // rjes su gzung bar nus pa ma yin ngang pa'i 'gros dang drag 
120b8(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshig rnams kyis kyang gsal bar ni// brjod par rtogs dka' brjod bya min pa'i tshogs ni cha shas chung ngu grab pas brjod de yongs rdzogs pa// bde ga shags tshig gis yang dag brjod bya chu byes ldan pa'i yan tan 
121a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis khyed rnams srung gyur cig// skye ba'i skye ba rnams su spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ zhabs la gus shing rang bzhin shin du drang ba dang // blo gros pa ga yo gzhan phan bla ma'i bya ba dag/ bya bar ldan 
121a2(rgyud 'grel): shing snyan dag mkhan du'ang 'gyur bar shig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bsad pa brgya po// sman dag mkhan pa// shrI badz+ra ba zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs sa// / yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas 
121a3(rgyud 'grel): spras pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang // mi'i dbang po sgrub dpon chen po shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gi/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan dag mkhan po chen po mahA paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mI kar dang // bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shod ston 
121a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur ba'o// / sdeb sbyor chag tun snyan pa'i dag/ de sa min spang don gyi yang // cha shas med me dgras pas sbyor// ldan rabs bzhin du bdag la'ang ci// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khong bzang ning dga' ba der/

126a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dad pas 'phags mchog mi gtong nam// 'phags mgon 'gro don mi mdzad cil dgongs// byams mgon ci slad bdag la thugs mi brtse// bdag 'dra'i blun rmongs las ngan sdig po che// las kyi dbang gis 
126a6(rgyud 'grel): snyigs ma'i dus 'dir skyes// skyes pas 'gyod de las la yid re chad// yid chad 'gyod kyang las dbang bcos su med// las kyi shugs ni chu bo'i rgyun dang 'dra// las dbang chu klung bzlog par rab tu dka'/ 
126a7(rgyud 'grel): bka' la bzhugs so bka' bzhin rngom thogs// lus ngag yid gsum sdig pa'i dbang du gyur// sdig pa'i las dbang drag po me 'bar bas// rnam shes dbang po'i myu gu gdungs gyur te// phung ba sgyu ma'i lus 
126a8(rgyud 'grel): 'di mi bzad na// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis bzod lags sam// nyi ltar 'od gsal bla ltar ma dang gsal ba'i// thugs rje'i zhal nyid mthong bar 'tshal lags na// thog ma med nas ma rig ling tog gri// 
126b1(rgyud 'grel): mdongos pa'i chu bur mig gis ma mthong na// 'gro ba'i mgon khyod da lta gang na bzhugs// sdug bsngal drag po shin tu mi bzad pas// shin tu skrag cing kyi g.ya' rab 'jigs nas// dung dung gdung ba'i smre sngags 'di 
126b2(rgyud 'grel): 'don cing // nyams thag phongs pa'i nga ro'o dod 'bod// byams mgon thugs rje can gyis gas na lags sam// nam zhig 'chi 'pho lus rjes gyur pa'i tshe// bshes gnyen grogs dang bral te gshin rjes khrid// 
126b3(rgyud 'grel): de tshe 'jig rten nye dus mi stong ste// las kyi dbang gis bdag 'dra gcig pur khrid// dus der bdag la mgon skyabs ma mchis na// byams mgon khyod kyis 'khor bar bdag gtod ngam// las kyis mnar ba'i
126b4(rgyud 'grel): skye bo bdag 'dra ba// thog ma med pa'i dus nas log brtags pas// khams gsum 'khor ba'i las las ma thar te// bskal pa dpag med skye ba ji snyed du// sngon chad lus blangs grangs med zhig gyur te/ 
126b5(rgyud 'grel): sha rus bsags na 'jig rten gtos dang mnyam// rnag khrag bsags na rgya mtsho chen po tsam// las 'phro bsags na bsam 'das brjod mi lang // khams gsum bgrangs shing skye ba bdun brgyad kyang // byas
126b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i las rnams don med chus zos te// skye ba grangs med de tsam las// skye ba gcig gcig kho na tsam gyi las// bla med don du rab spyad ci tsam na// de tsam byas pa'i las la don re yod// sha khrag 'dra ba'i lus 
126b7(rgyud 'grel): blangs 'khor bar 'khyams// sdug bsngal drag pos srid pa'i btson dar chud// mi bzad sdug bsngal drag po 'di 'dra na// nyes byas thams cad rang gi las las byung // thugs rje chen pos las rnams rgyun
126b8(rgyud 'grel): bcad de// nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di bzlog tu gsol// nyon mongs las kyi rlung 'di dbang btsan pas// ma rig mun pa'i nang du gtan 'khyams na// ye shes sgron ma'i zer gyis ma gzigs sam/ 
127a1(rgyud 'grel): nyes byas las kyi 'bras bu mi zod na// thugs rje chen pos 'phrin las mi mdzad dam// dug gsum bzod dka'i nad kyis gdungs lags na// thugs rje thabs mkhas sman gyis mi gso 'am// phyin 
127a2(rgyud 'grel): ci log gi g.yang sar lhung lags na// thugs rje'i myur 'gyogs phyag gis mi 'dzin nam// sdug bsngal drag pos las dbang me 'bar na// thugs rjes bsil ba'i char rgyun mi 'bebs sam// khams gsum 
127a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i gnas su sbyangs spyad nas// nam zhig rang gi 'bras bu thob pa'i tshe// 'phags pa thugs rjes ci 'tshal don ma mchis// sems can las 'phro ba tsan sar gzhag na dag/ 'phags pa'i thugs rjes su 
127a4(rgyud 'grel): la ci zhig bgyi// 'phags mchog khyod la thugs rje'i stobs mnga' na// yal yol btang snyoms le lo ma mdzad par// snyid nas gzigs shig thugs rje rgyal ba'i lha// thugs rje chen po'i gsol 'debs/

127a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bcom ldan 'das// phongs gyur 'gro ba la ni khyod lta bu// gzigs pa tsam gyis zhi bar mdzad pa po// spyan ras gzigs kyis bdag la gzigs su gsol// mchog sbyin bdag ni rab tu sdug bsngal te// 
127a8(rgyud 'grel): mun nag btabs pa snang ba med pa bzhin// ri bo ga yang sa'i kha na gnas 'dra yi// dus 'dir thugs rje ldan pas gzigs su gsol// phongs pa gang gis nga ni dran byas na// de yi sdug bsngal bsal bar bya'o zhes/ 
127b1(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i smon lam mi 'gyur de lags na// bdag la de 'dra'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzad// nga ni mthong thos reg pa 'am dran yang rung // nad rnams kun gyi gsos su gyur cig ces// bdag ni mi bzad nad kyis thebs

127b3(rgyud 'grel): ci slad sdug bsngal ba dag ma gzigs// gang gis khyod ni rjes dran tsam gyis kyang // de'i mod la mgon pos gnod gsal na// bdag ni rtag tu 'di 'dra'i blo 'tshal kyang // thugs dpags ma mdzad pa ni bdag byung

127b8(rgyud 'grel): na yang // bdag gi mgon bgyid gzhan ni su lags gsungs// khyod la skyabs su mchis pa ci bgyis kyang // de yi mod la sdug bsngal sel mdzad pas// mgon pa khyad ni bdag gi skyabs lags kyis// thugs 
128a1(rgyud 'grel): rjes mi bzad 'di las sgrub tu gsol// mtshan nas brjod pa tsam gyis nyam thag pa// zhi bar mdzad pa khyod dang mjal gyur la// bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na// khyod ni thugs rje can du

131a1(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i lpags pas nu ma g.yon pa bkab pa rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs du mas brgyan pa khyad par du yang lha'i rin po che rnam pa rtsa ba'i zhal kun nas dkar ba/ spyan gsum mnga' ba/ g.yas ldang 
131a2(rgyud 'grel): khu/ g.yon pa dmar ba/ zhal thams cad kun nas 'dzum pa'i nyams can/ de'i steng ma ljang khu/ de'i g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon padamar ba/ de'i steng ma dmar po/ de'i g.yas ljang khu/ g.yon dkar po/ de'i steng 
131a3(rgyud 'grel): na khro bo'i zhal 'thing nag mche ba brtsigs pa/ dbu skra ser po zhal bcu po ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o// de'i steng ma bin du ke'i me tog ltar dmar ba mgrin pa yan chod 'thon pa tshangs par spyod pa'i cha lugs rgyan spangs

131a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi 'og ma bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi gsum pa na ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ g.yas kyi gsum pa na yi dgas kyi bkres skom gyi gdungs pa sel ba'i mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ g.yas kyi bzhi pa na 'khor lo 
131a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ g.yon gyi bzhi pa na mda' gzhu 'dzin pa'o// de nas g.yas kyi phyag rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang sprul pa'i sku rgyal ba shAkya thub pa dang / me long dang shel gyi gdu 
131a7(rgyud 'grel): bu dang dgra sta dang / phub dang / ril ba 'bri khar dang rnga yab dkar po dang / rin po che me shel dang / rin po che chu shel dang / skyabs sbyin pa dang / rin po che'i kha T+wAM ga dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / lhung bzed dang / 
131a8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i zhags pa dang / rin chen bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa'i phyag rnams su go rims ji lta ba bzhin du rgun 'brum gyi snod thogs pa'i phyag dang / pad+ma'i steng du 'od dpag tu med pa dang / rin po che'i za ma tog dang / 
131b1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i shing dang / rin po che'i zhal med khang / rin po che'i dung g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / 'khar sil dang / rin mda' dang / rin po che'i dril bu dang / thod pa'i 'khar ba dang / rin po che'i lcags kyu dang / rin po 
131b2(rgyud 'grel): che'i mdung dang / pad+ma leb rgan dang / sprin rnam pa lnga dang / rin po che'i phyag rgya dang / rin po che'i glegs ba ma dang / pad+ma sngon po bsnams pa'o// phyag stong gis nye bar mdzes pa de las gzhan pa'i phyag thams cad 
131b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin pa phyag gi mthil na spyan re re mnga' ba'o// 'jigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i spyan ras gzigs dpag tu med pa 'phro ba g.yas su don yod zhags pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang 'dud pa'o// g.yon 
131b4(rgyud 'grel): du rta mgrin dang sgrol ma 'dud pa'o// phyogs bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi rang rang gi g.yog dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa'o// steng gi phyogs su lha'i bu dang drang srong mchod pa thogs pa dpag tu lhags pa'o// de nas

131b6(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar la pad+ma kha phye ba'i tshul du byas te snying khar gzhag pa 'di ni pad+ma rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// oM pad+mo b+ha bA ya swAhA/ de nas hrIHlas 'od zer 'phros pas rigs lnga spyan drangs la snga ma bzhin du 
131b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod de/ byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod chen gsol mdzad pa// bdag kyang rab tu bslab pa'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje dang bdag gsol// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yum dang 
131b8(rgyud 'grel): bcas pas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing tshig tu/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung // khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa// di ring khyod la sbyin par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta 
132a1(rgyud 'grel): / a b+hi shiny+tsA nA maM zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa spyi bo steng du bsam/ de na sa nga rgyal bstan par bya ba'i ched du oM yo ga d+harmA d+ha tu swa b+ha ba sarba Ad ma ko haM zhes brjod pa sa nga 
132a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal brtan par bya'o// de nas sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas gsang sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ 
132a3(rgyud 'grel): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ban+ta d+ha nats+tsha da na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ba sa mut+sa trits+tshe Sha Na yak+Sha rA ya/ sarba bya d+hi pra sha man ka rA ya/ sarba to ba dra ba bi na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ya Sh+yA tra Na ya ta su na margi ba ta i maM 
132a4(rgyud 'grel): A dz+nyA ba lo gi te shwa ra ta pa ni la kan+tha nA ma ma hA thi da ya ma ba r+ha ta i shA mi/ sarba ar+tha sa d+ha daM/ shu b+haM a dze ya sarba b+hU tA tsA/ b+ha ba mAr+ha bi shra d+ha na/ tad+ya thA A ba lo ki ma ti/ lo ka ta kran te/ dwe hA re/ ma hA bo d+hi sa 
132a5(rgyud 'grel): tra/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi sarba~M/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ka ru Ni ka s+pha ra tsi da yaM/ hihrI hA re/ A rbA ba lo ke te shwa ra/ pa ra ma tha tri tsetak+Sha ru ni ka/ ku ru ku ru karma sa d+ha ya/ sAd+ha ya bi drAHde hi de hi be ba ra 
132a6(rgyud 'grel): kA maM ga ma/ be haM ga ma/ si d+ha yo gI shwa ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru bi ya d+hi/ ma hA bi ya d+hi/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ren tre shwa ra/ tsa la tsa la bi ma la mu ra te/ AR+YA ba lo ki te shA ra/ kr-iSh+Ta dzi ta dza mu ku Ta laM ba/ pra laM ba/ bi laM ba/ ma hA sid+ha 
132a7(rgyud 'grel): bar+YaMHd+ha ra mA la mA ya/ ma hA mA la/ tsa la tsa la/ ma hA tsa la/ kr-iSh+Na bat+sa kraSh+Na pa k+Sha nir ga ta na/ he pad+ma Nasta/ tsa ra tsa ra ni shra tsa shra ra/ kriSh+Ta sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyA ba bI ta/ e h+ye hi bA ra mu kha/ tri pu ra daha no shwa ra/ nA rA yan+da 
132a8(rgyud 'grel): ba la rU ba be Sha d+ha rAM/ he nI la kaN Ta/ he ma hA/ ha la ha la/ bi Sha nir dzi ShA/ l-i ka d+ha rA ga bI ShaH sha naM/ de Sha bi Shan sha naM/ mo ha bi Sha ni ra ma kA ne hu lu/ hu lu ba la/ pa la ba la ha re/ ma hA pad+ma na d+ha/ sar sa ra 
132b1(rgyud 'grel): si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+d+ha bu d+ha/ bod+b+ha po d+ha/ mi ti rI la kaN tha e h+ye hi bA ma s+thi ti/ siM ta mu kha ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma rA D+ha D+ha hA sa/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho/ ma hA sid d+ha yo gi shwa ra/ b+ha Na b+ha Na/ bI tsa/ sad+h+ya 
132b2(rgyud 'grel): sad+d+ha/ bi d+h+yaM/ sma ra sma ra te/ b+ha gi ban ti/ lo ka bi lo ka taM/ ta thA ga taM/ da dA hi me dang shA nAM/ kA ma s+ya dar shAnaM/ prah+mad ya ma nA sAhA/ sid d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA si d+ha ya sAhA/ sid d+ha yo kI shwa rA ya sAt+ma/ 
132b3(rgyud 'grel): ni la ka Na thA ya swA hA/ b+ha rA ha mu khA ya sA hA/ ma hA na ri mi ha mu khA ya swA hA/ sid d+ha bi d+h+wa d+ha rA ya swAhA/ pad+ma ta stA ya swAhA/ kriSh+Na sa ra sakr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bi tA ya swA hA/ ma hA laM ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra a yu d+ha rA 
132b4(rgyud 'grel): yas+yAH/ shal she byad/ nai ba d+hanA ya swAH/ thamasadaHte shan s+t+wa~M ta k+Shad+hadza na yas rba/ b+ha ma hAs b+hA g+h+nAHrA pa ni trA satwA ya swAH/ ka~M shwa rA ye swAt+ma/ sarbi sad+d+hi shwar s+phoH/ na mo thug pa te/ AnA pA 
132b5(rgyud 'grel): lo gi te shA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA ka ru na kA ya/ sid+d+han+tu me man tra pa dai AhA/ oM hriHtI lo kya ba tsa ya A mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pad+mo uSh+NI sha bI ma le hUM phaT 
132b6(rgyud 'grel): swAhA// oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA// gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ldang ba bzhi byung ba yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// 'di 'dzin pa'i gang zag de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
132b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun mi 'chad par mig stong dang ldan pa'i thugs rjes gzigs par 'gyur ro// phyag stong gis skyob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga dang / de dang nye ba lnga dang / dge 'dun gyi skor rku 'phrog byas pa rnams kyang lan 
132b8(rgyud 'grel): cig brjod pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// the tshom za ba ni ma gtogs pa'o// gshis don du 'chi ba'i 'chi ltas bco lnga 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po bco lnga yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sus snyid 
133a1(rgyud 'grel): po 'di'i ming thos pa de ni bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba'i bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur na brjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos/ rgyun mi 'chad par gzung nas bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la 
133a2(rgyud 'grel): dka' ba med na 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu thob pa lta ci smos/ yul gang du yams kyi nad byung la/ yul der rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang gtsang mar bya/ sems can thams 
133a3(rgyud 'grel): cad gtams las mi gcad do// nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o// zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na yul der yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
133a4(rgyud 'grel): yul der gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa rnams la gau tor ma byin la 'phags pa spyan das gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la rig pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas 
133a5(rgyud 'grel): rol mo sna tshogs kyis lan gsum du bskor ba byas na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshon skud sA lnga la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la mgul du gdags so// gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun 
133a6(rgyud 'grel): du'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa dang yul der nad 'byung ba dang char chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang / zla ba dang nyi ma drang por mi 'gro ba dang / ltas ngan pa de rnyed byung na rgyal po des 
133a7(rgyud 'grel): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de'i ngos su bzhin bstan la bzhag go/ shin tu dud pas bdug pa dang me tog du gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs 
133a8(rgyud 'grel): pa ci 'byor pas mchod par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po des zhag bdun du brtson 'grus bstan por byas nas ris so so'i dgra thams cad phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems 'thun par 'gyur ro// phan tshun grogs
133b1(rgyud 'grel): por 'gyur/ skye bo yongs dang rgyal bu rnams kyang byas pa gzo zhing legs par byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba skyed par 'gyur ro// nad dang gnod pa gang byung yang 'phags
133b2(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i mdun du mchod pa byas la gzung sngags stang rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// su zhig ha la ha la'i
133b3(rgyud 'grel): dug zos na de gu gul gyi gdug pa dang ga bur cha mnyams te khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa skol la khyor gang lus pa dang byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs
133b4(rgyud 'grel): na dug zhi bar 'gyur ro// su zhig mig nyams te long bar gyur pa dang / mig gi 'bras bu'i steng du ling tog byung ba dang / mig tu ru skyes te mi mthong bar gyur pa des a ru ra dang / ba ru ra gcig dang / sku ru ra gcig 
133b5(rgyud 'grel): zhib tu btags la sbrang rtsi dkar po dang khye'u'i nu ma'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya ste/ sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing byis pa gsar pa btsas pa'i bud med dang khyi dang phag gis ma mthong bar ril bu byas
133b6(rgyud 'grel): te/ byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman 'di mi'i 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te mig gi nang du blugs
133b7(rgyud 'grel): na mig gi 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur ro// leng tog med cing legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'byung po'i gdon nam mi ma yin pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na gu gul gyi dud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas 
133b8(rgyud 'grel): brjod byas la snar ba dug go// yang na ri bong gi sdug pa tsam gyi ril bu byas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la bza'o// sha dang chang dang sgeg pa dang 'thab mo spang ngo // 'on kyang sos par 'gyur ro// shu dag
134a1(rgyud 'grel): dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dpung pa g.yas par btags na 'thab mo las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ba glad dkar po'i g+hi'u hang lag mthil du bcug la byang chub sems dpa'i drung 
134a2(rgyud 'grel): du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te yan lag rnams la bskus te dpral bar thig le byas na lha dang klu dang 'byung po dang mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// khyed shug me dang chu ltar mi mthun par gyur na

134a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod par bya'o// me bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gces par gyur na zhags pa thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// khang par nad rnams yod par gyur na rin po che'i lhung bzed thogs

134a7(rgyud 'grel): gsal te 'od dang mi ldan par gyur na me shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// tsha ba'i rims kyis thebs te bsil bar 'dod na chu shel gyi nor bu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// blon thabs mthon 
134a8(rgyud 'grel): por 'dod na rin po che'i gzhu thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// grogs po mdza' bshes dang myur du phrad par 'dod na rin po che'i mda' thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// lus la nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par

134b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na lcug ma thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// lus kyi bgegs ma lus pa bsal bar 'dod na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// thams cad mthun pa'i 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dod na bum pa thogs

134b6(rgyud 'grel): srong gi lam mngon par sgrub par 'dod na sprin rnam lnga thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// tshangs par skyes par 'dod na ril ba thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// lha'i gzhal med khang du skye bar 'dod na pad+ma leb

134b9(rgyud 'grel): ma ma ma tha' pa mthas mam mam tham ma ma mam ma mamacan mtham sa ma mam sa sa ma tham mamamam

135a7(rgyud 'grel): gyi 'khor lo thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod na mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la mchod do// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams myur du 
135a8(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas spyi bo nas phyag gis byugs te lung bstan par 'dod na spyi bo na sprul pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa'i phyag la mchod do// shing thog dang 'bras bu rnams 'grub par 'dod na rgun 'brum thogs 
135b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag la mchod do// de ltar mngon par sgrub pa'i mchog rnams stong yod kyang / de mdor bsdus nas bstan pa yin no// lus drang por bsrang ste snying khar thal mo sbyar nas sor mo thams cad phan tshun thad kar 
135b2(rgyud 'grel): bsnol la g.yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams la khrud de 'dzub mo gyen du bsgrengs la rtse mo gnyis sprad do// mthe bong gnyis 'dzub mo gnyis kyi tshig dang por reg par bgyi lag mthil la ma 
135b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byar bar bgyi'o// 'di ni bzung sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba rnams byed par 'gyur ro// tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su

135b5(rgyud 'grel): dod snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par gyur to// de'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// ta d+ya thA sarba d+ha ra ni maN+Da lA min Na Da lA ye A h+ye hi sa ram shud d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs phyag stong 
135b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ga brjod par bya ste/ thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba gzhi sa bcad cing bkra shis pa'i sa phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o// der sa brkos te gsig ma dang gyo mo dang rus po dang / mi gtsang ba rnams 
135b7(rgyud 'grel): bsal la dri zhim po dag dang ba'i lci ba dang 'jim pa bsres te byug par bya/ dkyil 'khor 'phang mtho gang gi tshad du bgyi sgo bzhi gdod do// rin po che du mas sbas pa'i rta babs dang sgo 'khyud dang bcas pa tshang

157a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhis yid nye bar brlan par byas la// bsam gtan gyi khang bu la sogs pa'i gnas la ma gang yin pa po Ta ke'i ri 'i rgyal por byin gyis brlabs te// de gzhal med khang rin po che/

157a7(rgyud 'grel): sdong bu mdab brgyad dbus// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug bskyed// de ni zla mdog dkyil dkrung byed// mchog sbyin pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// a i u e/ shar sogs phyogs dang mtshams 
157a8(rgyud 'grel): rim bzhin// 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo las// phyogs kyi kha dog gzhon nu'i tshul// gter chen bum pa bzhis gang po'o// A I U e/ de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// phyogs min 
157b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs kyi kha dog can// gti mug rdo rje sgron ma can// bag chags rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags rdo rje zhags pa thogs// zhe sdang rdo rje ral gri bsnams// oM oM aM aHbyang shar la sogs

157b3(rgyud 'grel): Ta ta/ khyams kyi shar sogs phyogs bzhir yang // phyogs mdog gar gyi rol pa mo// rdo rje gzugs mdzes me long can// rdo rje sgra bsnun pi wang sbed// rdo rje dri mchog dbyug pa thogs/

157b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba sgron ma thogs// yid 'ong phyogs phyed mdog can la'o// ri rI li lI/ de nas shar sogs sgo bzhir yang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// phyogs mdog cung zad khro ba'i tshul//

157b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes byar brjod// de bzhin lus dang sems rab dag/ nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid do// pho pho pha pa/ de nas ye shes dkyil 'khor lha// ji bzhin bkug la mchod

158a1(rgyud 'grel): oM oM a aH/ ka tsa Ta ta/ pa ya shak+Sha/ ri ri li le/ hUM phaT swAhA/ gal te dmigs pa'i sbyor ba yis// skyo bar gyur na sbyor bral ba// shin tu dmigs med zhi ba'i rgyu// mkhas 
158a2(rgyud 'grel): pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom// nam zhig de las ldang 'dod tshe// snying rje chen pos blo bskyed la// dpal ldan nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdage/ dkyil 'khor mchod sogs bya phyir 'bad// bdun phrag

158a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad de// rgyud bral zlu ma spangs pa la// dngos grub yod par ma gsungs phyir// mtshan macim mthong bdag gis 'dir// bla ma'i gsungags chud don bsdus// dag 'dis 'gro kun po Ta la'i//

159a1(rgyud 'grel): lha bcu gcig bcas bsgom// rtse yis lcags gong gser bzhin du// phung po ye shes spyod yul bsgyur// de dbus snying gi mdab bzhi dang // yan lag drug rtsibs mkhas pas bsgom/ 
159a2(rgyud 'grel): hriHkun bzhi rnam dag lhun gyis grub// 'jig rten dbang phyug gangs ri'i mdog/ ting 'dzin mchog gis mnyam gi zhag pa// bag chags ma lus bcom pa'o// hUM gti mug rnam dag rnam mi rtog/

162a1(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo'i skyob pa'i tshangs bu ga nas// zhugs gyur thugs bltam bdag gi bar// // de ltar ye shes kyi 'od kyi rgun babs pas bdag gi rgyud la de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa 'di lta ste/

162a8(rgyud 'grel): lag pasdod dang bcud// gsang sngags rgyal pos byin rlabs la// gzi bskyed zab cing rgya ches mchod// hreHa hAM/ a A e I u A/ ri rI li lI/ e I/ oM ai/ aM aHlce byin gyis 
162b1(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'o// a a hUM tAM/ ka khag g+ha nga/ tsa tsa dza dz+nyanya/ Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa tak+Sha/ lag pa byin gyis brlab pa'o// d+hu ka tsa Ta ta pa ya ShAk+ShA/ bcud byin 
162b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa'o// i a hUM be ho// gzi byin bskyed pa'o// oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM ad+yA nud pan tad ta be shud+d+ha swA hA/ zab par bsgrub pa'o// o a tri sarba ta thA ga to a tiSh+Ta ne sarba pu dza me 
162b3(rgyud 'grel): g+ha sa mud gra s+pha ra na badz+ra mu dz+ra Da D+ha hUM/ rgya che bar bsgrub pa'o// oM aHhriHshI lo ka nA thA sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa sa ka la iSh+Ta de ba tA sarba d+harmA pa la puSh+paM d+hU paM/ g+han d+han/ n+ya be d+yai/ sha pa ta/ maN Da la/ 
162b4(rgyud 'grel): b+ha liM ta/ kha kha/ kha hi kha hi/ sarba kardza pa ri pu d+yaM/ ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ dbul ba dang las bcol ba'i sngags so// dpag med 'jig rten mgon 'khor lo// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
162b5(rgyud 'grel): rten pas// legs bskor 'od zer ljags sbubs kyis// bdud rtsi yi ga tor me ba zhes par 'gyur// thugs rje chen po yi gtor ma yi cho ga rdzogs so// // thugs rje chen po rnam par skyob pa la 
162b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dkyil 'khor bzad po dges pa po zhes 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i sa nyid dang // rin chen rang bzhin ngos mnyam la// dri zhim pa yi 
162b7(rgyud 'grel): byug pas byug/ mu tig me tog nor bu dgod// dbus su 'dab brgyad 'dab bzhi yi// me tog dmar po sa bon can// bzhag la de steng thub pa bzhugs// gdugs dkar gyis ni steng nas dbu ba/ 
162b8(rgyud 'grel): sgrub po pad+ma'i phreng ba yi// nga rgyal 'dzin pas rdo rje lag/ gnyis gshibs gyen du bskyod pa'i rgyas// sa gsum gtso bo spang bar bya// rab tu dbyibs legs kha dog mdzes// dri gsung ro mchog 
163a1(rgyud 'grel): reg bzang pa'i// me tog spangs pas go rims bzhin// gling sogs bkod pa ji bzhin brtag/ oM a badz+ra tsatra ra dI pa hUM/ ba oM a badz+rI pa yaSh+Ta di pa hUM/ oM a badz+raSh+Ta rat+na hUM/ oM a badz+ra 
163a2(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Tha mag la hUM/ oM badz+ra sid d+hi biM sha ti trAM/ oM a sUr+ya tsan+d+rA tAM/ rnam dag zhing du phran tshogs gling dang rin chen dang // bkra shis grub pa rim gsum phreng ba legs bkod la// gsel byed sgrol ma 'bar 
163a3(rgyud 'grel): be gnyis kyis rgyan gyur pa// sngags 'chang rdo rje rol pa'i gar gyis bstabs pa'i dbul// de nas lus can thams cad la// 'jig rten mgon po nyer mkho'i gzugs// dpag med rnam par 'phrul 
163a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// zhing rnams kun tu yog don spyod// ji srid snying po byang chub par// de dag nam yang 'dren pa'i mthus// ngan 'gro'i sgra yang mi drag cing // rtag tu dga' skyid 'tsho bar byed// gal te blogs la 
163a5(rgyud 'grel): spobs spyod na// sku gsum la sogs gang bshad pa// cho ga de dag bzlas pa yang // gdon mi za bar bya ba nyid// gang tshe bsdu bar 'dod pa na// se gol bsdams pas spang byas la// bzod par 
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol dang smon lam gdab// dran pa'i rgya yis gzungs bcab bya// thugs rje chen po yi maN Dal gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // dpal thugs rje chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la 
163a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo// dngos bra ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// sgrub bo la phan byed pa'i thabs// mchod sprin rgyal mtshan rtse mo yis// bsam mi khyab byed mchod pa bri// me tog bdug pa mar me dri// zhal zas 
163a8(rgyud 'grel): rol mo maN Da la rdzas// 'byor pa'i khyad bar gyis bkod de nyid kyi nga rgyal gyi byin brlab// oM badz+ra puSh+pe A hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa a hUM/ oM badz+ra dA paM a hUM/ oM badz+ra g+han d+ha a hUM/ oM badz+ra n+ti'u d+ye a hUM/ 
163b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra sha pa ta a hUM/ oM badz+ra maN Da la a hUM/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid can gyi// sna tshogs mchod rdzas bsam mi khyab// rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i rim pa yis// sprul nas 'phags tshogs mchod par bya// 
163b2(rgyud 'grel): e na mo b+ha ga wa te/ ma hA ka ru ni kaSh+pa pu tsa me ga sa mu drA ke tu ra dza ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ a ra had te sa ma myA ka sa ma bud d+h+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pe/ duSh+pe/ pu puSh+pe/ puSh+To/ ud b+ha be/ puSh+pa/ a 
163b3(rgyud 'grel): wa k+Shin+te swA hA/ me tog dbul ba'i sngags so// de bzhin du/ d+hu pa dang / dI pa dang / g+han d+ha dang / nai d+h+ye dang / sha pa ta dang / maN Da la dang / ces bya ba la sbyar ba'i rim gyis bdug pa dang mar me dang / 
163b4(rgyud 'grel): dri chab dang / zhal zas dang / rol mo dang / maN Dal dbul bar bya'o// gos bzang gyon cing rgyan bzangs btags// yi ge gsum dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje'i glu gar sngon song bas// sangs rgyas 
163b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs mchod par bya// bdag nyid mchod sprin brgya mtsho yi// dbus bzhugs mchod kun la mda' brnyes// mgon po 'khor los bsgyur rgyal tshul// rgyal mtshan rtse mo gser mdog bskyed// 
163b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes snying po las byung ba'i// sna tshogs lha mo mdzes rnams kyis// de re las kyang dpag tu med// sprul pas rim gro rdzogs par blta// ma phyed gus pa mang yod pas// gzungs 'di lan 
163b7(rgyud 'grel): gsumachog 'dis// nyin re dus gsum mchod byed na// bye ba bsam mi khyab mchod 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa spyan

164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di bshad bya// sngon nas bzhin pa'i rim pa la// 'dres zlar stong rjes yid gdungs pa// mig dang smeg 'tshams snyeng dkyil dra// byams sogs thig legasum bsgom bya/

164a3(rgyud 'grel): gang tshe skye ba don tshol ba dang don mi tshol ba gcig dang mang po yang rung ste// bdag gi dbang po'i spyod yul du babs pas las la sbyar du rung bar gyur na// cho ga 'das rnal 'byor du byas la 'phags 
164a4(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs la gsol ba btab ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su med gakho nar sems can khyed cag bdag gi smin pa'i gdul bur gyur cig ces smon lam btab la// nye 'od thig les de dag 
164a5(rgyud 'grel): pad+mo kha phye nas// zla 'od can gyis gdung ba 'bar ba zhi bar bya// mi byeng zer gyis lus bkang rdo rje'i rgyas btab la// ci dgar khyed spyod mi lus myur du bdag gis bsgral// de rjes chos dang zang zing 
164a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyi// mgu bya kun gyis sems bkug nas// glang chen myos la thugs klu bzhin// mkhas pas 'gro ba dbang du bya// me tog la sogs bzlas gtor ba'am// yang na lag pa rkang pa dag/ yun 
164a7(rgyud 'grel): rings dmigs ltas mda' bsnun pa'ang // bdag nyid chen po'i thabs la mkhas// khab rnams kyis ni khab lan dang // brang ba rnams kyis me tog bzhin// da ni mi 'dod nyin cig kyang // dbang 
164a8(rgyud 'grel): med skye bo 'dra bar 'gyur// smon lam du bya ba rdzogs so// // dpal bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba mnyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan ras gzigs dpal bdud rtsi brnyes// bza' dang bca' dang myang

164b2(rgyud 'grel): tshig spyod// rab gus mchod byed sprin la brtson// sa cig dran pas lhar bskyed nas// bzhi pa'i yi ge sbyor ba yis// mgrin pa lce stengs byin brlabs la// a dang ka phreng gnyis med bzhu/

164b4(rgyud 'grel): spyang dang gza bskyed pas// g+ha no pastur pa rnal 'byor chags// a9/ za ba to// chags la sbyong byed bdud rtsir byed// phun sum tshogs dang dges byed pa// dam tshig phyag rgya rnam pa lnga/

164b6(rgyud 'grel): shI lo ka nAb+hA sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa b+hA pad ma bi shud d+ha ar+m+mi te dzar b+ha k+Sha ta kha ba/ khakhA hi ShA haM/ a ne ka satwA rtsa sa ma ya sid d+hi sA ra sma ra hUM/ hUM hUM swA hU~M/ zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod pas so//

165a3(rgyud 'grel): mkho nar mchod pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor gyi lus nye bar spen pa 'di'o// de la yang rang nyid bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs rnam par dkar ba 'od zer bcu drug gi/ 
165a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa can du bsgom par bya'o// de'i thugs ni hriHkun d+ha lta bu'o// de las byung ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis gdug pa can 'dul ba'o// lte bar de dmar po la skyes pa'i me yi phreng ba gsal 
165a5(rgyud 'grel): byed kyi 'khor lo can no// de bzhin du thugs khar yang a dkar po las skyes pa'i dbyangs kyi 'khor lo yang ngo // mi dang lha dbang klu rgyal gyi// mgo gsum skyed pu'i steng du ni// lha yi smin 'tshams

178a5(rgyud 'grel): de bsreg go/ kun tu sdang ba med nyid dang // ltos bral gcig tu snying brtse can// dpal ldan mgon po che nyid la// drin sdod de yi dgra rnams 'jig/ gang tshe rmi lam nang du yang // byams sems zhugs// 
178a6(rgyud 'grel): pas snying g.yo zhing // gzhan don mchi ma 'khrug 'gyur ba// de tshe gdug pa thul bar 'gyur// rlom med dregs pa zhi ba dang // rtag tu byams ldan spring ston pa// mi de'i dam tshig zab mo ni// mchod 
178a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin byang chub sems bsnun bshad// 'phags pa thugs rje chen po gdug pa 'dul ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// yang de nas skye bo 
178a8(rgyud 'grel): gdul bar dka' ba rnams kyi snying ga dregs pa zhi bar byed pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ bdag nyid 'phags pa zhal brgya pa// phyag stong spyan dpag med ldan sku// dkar zhing dri med 'od 'bar ba// mi 
178b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs sgra sgrogs bsgom par bya// shar du ha la zhal gsum khros// phyag drug mnga' gzhu rdo rje dril// lcags kyu zhags pa 'dzin dud mdog/ sprul dkar gyis brgyan bzhad pa'o// lhor ni khro bo ha ha che// 
178b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dril// dgra sta kha T+wAM thal me sdebs// nam mkha'i mdog can spu la ser brgyan// nub tu btum chen dmar nag dpa'// zhal gsum phyag drug lcags kyu zhags// nyi zla ba sdigs 
178b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzub tshangs pa'i mgo/ sprul dmar gyis brgyan rngam pa yin// byang du za byed thal mdog tsan// zhal gsum phyag drug glang chen lpags// mdung thung be con ral gri phub// sprul nag gis brgyan rgyu ma gsol/ 
178b4(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag dpa' bo khros pa yi// cha lugs sdang stabs drag bcas pa// spyan mangs kyis spras spu sgo nas// kun nas me 'bar 'khyil ba'o// de'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshig las ji skad bshad pa'i tshogs/ 
178b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs pa byas la// bde ba chen po yi pho brang gi rnam par thar pa zab mo dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ yang mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu gang dag kun nas 
178b6(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa gang dang gang gi dbang las skyes pa'i nga rgyal gyi sems rab tu dregs cad mngon par mtho bar 'gyur ba// lta ba phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log gis kun nas bkris pa'i/ 'ching ba dam po'i// / 
178b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang du gyur pa de dag nyid blos mdun du bya'o// de la mkhas pa sdang ba dang // brnyas bral zhi ba'i sems ldan pas// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms las byung byang chub sems// yang 
178b8(rgyud 'grel): dang yang du brtan bsgoms te// de yi sems ni rlung gi rta/ thig le rtse yi sbyor ba can// rnam par shes deng gcig gyur rje// de gdan tsita tA dmar mdab bzhi// phyogs bzhi char gnas b+hu ba ra// ya 
179a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes dkar sde dmar ljang mdog/ go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// phyogs kyi lha dbang rnam bzhi yi// thugs las dbyangs dkar gsal byed dmar// phreng ba yi ge 'bru gsum gyis// 
179a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshams spel khab la khab len bzhin// bdag nyid snying gi pad 'a dab bzhi'i// lte dbus rnam par shes bdag hUM/ bsams la dbyangs dang gsal byed kyi// 'khor lo g.yon du bskor ba yis// mthu
179a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgrubs nas ni grub pa dang // rmi bltas dkar po bzhi mthong ba// de tshe chos sbyin gtor ma sbyin// de 'og bstan pas las sbyar bya// che ge mo'i duSh+Ta tsita tA shan ti ku ru ye swA hA// rjes su gdags pa'i 
179a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// las ni 'od zer mda' gzhu dang // me dang mar gyi gong bu dang // 'khrul 'khor bskor dang nyi mun gyi// sbyor ba bla ma'i man ngag bzhi// i Ti// / bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'khor 
179a5(rgyud 'grel): lo'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngags pa yan lag drug rtsibs drug/ 'khor lo 'bar ba dri ma med// de nang pad mo stong mdapa la// skal bzangs sangs rgyas brgya phrag bcu// lte ba pad mo can nyid de/ 
179a6(rgyud 'grel): de snying rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// de yi thugs ni ye shes che// gnyis med thig le dkar 'tsher ro// oM a griHhUM phaT swAhA/ g.yas dang g.yon lag mgo bo dang ni rke bzhin rkang // g.yas g.yon rdo rje yan lag 
179a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs la go rims bzhin// zla ba mdog me dang nam mkha' in dra dang // mar me'i dud mdog gnas drug ngag gi bdag nyid bsam// dza hUM baM ho/ ji bzhin ye shes bzhugs pa yi// man ngag gis ni lha bcing 
179a8(rgyud 'grel): pa sa// dang thugs kyi gas smras bad/ gas rjong // / nga // snang rdzu du 
179b1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsgrub par bya'o// oM A hriHhUM phaT swAhA/ a A/ i I u A ri rI li lI e i o au aM aHka kha ga g+ha da/ tsa tshadza dz+ha nya/ Tarba/ D+hAN/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pab b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha saha

188b6(rgyud 'grel): med 'phros pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs gzi brjid bsdus// 'gro ba gzi brjid bskyed bdag don bsgrubs pas// phyi nang lus dang snying gi dbus// 'khor lo pad+ma pad mo can// gzi brjid rgyal po/ 
188b7(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'bar ba// sdig 'joms rtag tu bsgom par bya// gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos// sangs rgyas sras po gzi bskyed la// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i gsang sngags kyis// stobs bskyed bya phyir rtag tu dbul 
188b8(rgyud 'grel): sems can gzi brjid chung ngu gang // de dag la yang cho ga sbyin// bzang dang 'gran zla ma rabs rim// dga' dang 'dun pa snying rjes spyod// lhag pa'i sems dang lhan cig tu// rlung dang 'od dang dod 'byung zhing // 
189a1(rgyud 'grel): spro bas skye bo thams cad kyi// yid 'ong rlom pa zhu bar byed// mi gang 'jig rten mgon la dang // 'bar ba'i mtshan mas rtag lus mtshan// de ni dud 'gro 'dra na yang // 'gro ba'i mig sngar lha ltar
189a2(rgyud 'grel): sdug/ oM AHhriHmo hA dz+nyA na swA hA/ oM AHhriHma hA ka ru ni ka swA hA/ oM AHhriHma hA dz+wa la ga to swA hA/ lus la me 'bar 'od 'byung dang // nyi ma la sogs snang bas reg/ rin chen sgron ma lag na thogs/ 
189a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag gzi brjid grub pa'i ltas// de nas blo ldan grong khyer sogs 'jug rang gi khyim du de rten la// 'od 'bar mdog bzangs lar me dri zhim bdug pa can skor snyan pa'i sgras// legs mchod su yang ji srid 
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag sod de srid mthong ba 'bad bkag la// slar log don bsgrub gtor mas mnyes bya slob ma bzang la rgyun chod bsgoms// gzi brjid bskyed pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // 'phags pa thugs rje chen

189a6(rgyud 'grel): mar brtan g.yo nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis// dag bcas de las pad ma zla ba bskyed// de steng a dang ka phreng ze'u 'bru can// 'dres gyur mgon po yid 'ong gzugs can bsgom// shel ltar rab dngas rdo rje 
189a7(rgyud 'grel): lta bur mkhregs pa'i sku// dkar la dmar mdangs shin tu 'od gsal rnam par dag/ bltas pas mi ngoms dpe byad mtshan rab kun rdzogs pa// skyabs sbyin chu skyes g.yas g.yon phyag rgyas btab 
189a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// brgya phrag 'od 'bar rgyan rnams las byung phan tshun 'od zer rnams 'khrugs pas/ nyid kyi sku bkab dra ba dang ni dra phyed rdo rje g.yung drung 'khyil/ zer phog pa dang gzugs brnyan rab 'dres ti gtig
189b1(rgyud 'grel): gong bu 'khyil 'gyur te/ spu sgo kun la rin chen 'od 'dzag mkhas la nyi ltar mdzes bdag gyur// de'i snying por yi ge gsum pa 'dus pa la nu ma gnyis kyi brgyan pa bltas la// dad pa dang lhan cig pa'i 'od
189b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhags pas po tal nas gzhon nu 'bar ba nyid bkug la bcu drug dang brgyad dang / nyi shu dang bcu dang / bdun dang lnga la sogs pa'i lha mo lte ba'i sgo las mngon par 'phro ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis
189b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par mchod nas// phyogs kyi gzhon nu ma bzhis yid 'ong mtshungs med la sogs pas bstod nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrogs dang dril bu'i rang bzhin gyis bkug cing bcug ste/

189b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang gzugs mthong bas dbang po mngon par g.yo ba'i tshe/ de dag gi snying la hriHdmar po bsams nas/ sna bug g.yas nas spros pa'i sa bon las 'od kyis mda' skye ba bsnun te/ de las bdud 
189b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i rgyun zags pas lus thams cad la khyab par bya'o// byams pa'i lta bas rnam blta zhing // rtag tu kun la snying rje 'jug/ chags bral sdang ba yang med la// sgrub po 'gro ba kun yid 'phrog/ dbang 
189b7(rgyud 'grel): po rab tu dul ba dang // dregs med bka' blo rab tu bde// 'jig rten mgon la lhag par dad// yid gzhungs gang yin skal ldan mtshan// ji ste 'di brtsams kyis ma spobs// de nas sbrang rtsi rma bya'i 
189b8(rgyud 'grel): mdongs// me tog bzang po kun mad brtse// spos chus sbyar ba smin 'tshams byugs// byang chub sems dkar dmar thig le// rgya mtsho'i sbu bseng ldeng lpags// tsan dan dmar po ga pur bcas//

190a2(rgyud 'grel): mngon sum 'phrog/ sems can mgu bar byed pa rdzogs so// // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po rab tu snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur ba nges par mi shes pas ci byas

190a4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'bral bas reg pa bzla zhing bsrung bar gnas par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ na maHshrI ar+d+ha wa lo ki shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA mehA sotwA mA hA ka ru ni k+Sha/ dar sha dar sha/ pra dang sha pradar sha/ sarba bud d+ha dz+nyA na garba 
190a5(rgyud 'grel): kiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma ma sa pa Na triSh+Ta pra da ra sha hUM hUM swA hA/ 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// me tog dkar po sogs bdug bcas// mchod pa mang pos nyer mchod cing // phyag 'tshal kun tu bskor bar bya//

190b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// // mgon po mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// brtse chen ring nas gdungs pa spangs pa'i rgyus// rnam kun skye bo mya ngan sel mdzad pa// dpal ldan mgon po mya ngan med pa'i dpal/

190b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse gcig gyur pa na// bde bar gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dran par byas pa mchod pa rgya chen po sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das spyan drad par bya'o// rim pa gang dang ldan 
190b4(rgyud 'grel): pas gsol ba btab la/ de'i snying po ri bong can las 'od dang bdud rtsi dang yi ge thiHyi rgyan gyis gtar ba'i phreng ba phyung ste/ bsgrub bya'i snying gi ze'u 'bru'i rtse mo nas brlan par bya'o// bde gshegs zla ba dkar/ 
190b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog mun sel ba// rnam par mi rtog 'ong mdzad mya ngan med// gcig char ting 'dzin chos bsgo brgya phrag la// mnyam gzhag chos ston til gyi gang bu bzhin// rdul bral dgra bcom dbang po rabazhi dang //

191a3(rgyud 'grel): a hriHka ra ka ra a tsa ra tsa ra i/ Ta ra Ta ra u/ ta ra ta ra e/ pa ra pa ra o// ya ra ya ra au// hUM hUM hUM/ sho ka shan tA pa hA ra hA ra/ a sh+lo ka pra ha ra ha ha rA a sho ka ni/ sa b+ha ba shun+na ta a

193b4(rgyud 'grel): daM bskyes bya byer rig pa bzlas// oM ahrIHsarba lok+Shar+N+Na sarba rid d+hi sid d+hi b+hUdz+dzaT+Ta/ sarba satwA nA pa ri pU ra b+hU rba sa ma ya smar d+h+r-i d+hU hUM/ sarbA tsata ta san d+haSh+ThAn b+h+r-i b+ha raM/ saM b+hA ra sa b+hA ra/ prad+had ta na/ 
193b5(rgyud 'grel): sras b+hA ba ka ra t+na d+hAn+tu/ zhes byungab 'bum phrag gcig bzlas la/ de'i phrin las yongs su rdzogs par bye ba'i phyir// lab gyi bani med la sogs par mdzod rten pa zhengs par bya'o// de'i nang du padam 
193b6(rgyud 'grel): mi sdong bu dbus mal zhugs pa'i spyan ras gzigs skyob rnam par spangs pa dang / shar la sogs pa'i sdong bu bzhi la lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang ljags sgrogs dang dril bu can gyi thugs rje chen po// dkar 
193b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sar po dang / dmar po dang / ljang khral kha drug can rnams btsas la// rab tu gnas pa chog kyiste ba bzhin byin gyis bairlab par bya'o// skye ba mang po dan gtar lam// skye med dkyil 'khor ldan 
193b8(rgyud 'grel): gyi tshul// mkha' la lding bas steng brgyan pa// 'gron po rnams kyi yid bzhin nor// srog chags gang gang dang yang dang // dad med shes dang mi shes pa'ang // kun du la mchen 'dir rgyu ni// de dag 
194a1(rgyud 'grel): ngan 'gror 'grom srid// gang gis mthong dang thos dang dran// grib mas reg dang so sor rtog/ de dag rnams kyang ma thogs par// 'jig rten mgon gyi zhing du skye// lam chen po'i bsgrub
