199a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yos gnas gcig min// de bzhin nyid thugs rnyog med zhapa' gdum chu don mthong rna pa bkun du ma bzad 'byung // de dbang phyug zigs dkyim du// bdag nyid lhag mas bde bstan pas// rdzogs

199a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad// rgyun bzang spyi gtsug byung mchog nas brgyud nis// snying dkyil lha mchog nyid sdugang byas la// cher lhagazer kun lus kun rgyas gur dang // de las 'od phyung 'dom gang dkyil 'khor bskur// gang tshe 
199a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyid log 'du byed g.yengs gyur na// g.yon phyag nyid kyi pad mo bdag byin la// de dbus bdag bzhugs 'dab stong thub stong ldan// slar zum spyi'o'i phrag nas bdud rtsi blang // dpal spyan ras gzigs kyi 
199a6(rgyud 'grel): nad bsrung ba'i tshig rdzogs so// 'dags pa thugs rje chen pa la phyag 'tsham la// ma lus na rnams kun gyig na// tshigs snang bye mr-ig phrag dag dang // ser sna'i dug 'jom sa spyan ras gzigs/ 
199a7(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i bum 'dzin la phyag 'tshal// nad med nad kyis 'jigs pa dang // nad bcas sdug bsngal gyis gtsang ba// de dag 'phags pa nad 'joms s+ho/ sbyor bas 'jigs pa bsgrub par bya// rin chen sbyangs 
199a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snod dag par// nam mkha'i chu yis gang byas pa// bde gshegs ring sel snying po can// mdun bzhag yid kyi dkyil 'khor bsam// de la dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ste// mdag pa dag par byed pa ni/ 
199b1(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// nad 'joms mgon po dkar mdzes so// de ni mtshan mo zla shar dus// shel mdog hriHyig las skyes pa// bdud rtsi bum pa dkar bsnams shing // phyag stong bcu gcig/ 
199b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal mnga' ba'o// dag pa dri ma med 'khor lo// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// nad sel mgon po dmar mdzes te// nyin mo rta bdun 'chang tshe yin// dri med phyir mi ldog pa yi// 'khor lod ni phyed gsu 
199b3(rgyud 'grel): dus// sna tshogs pad mo la gnas pa// nad bral mgon po in tra'i mdog/ bud med byis pa bde ster te// zla chos zla rgyas nad 'jig dus// nyi shar nyi zer nad med pa// de bzhin phyed gsum nad spangs 
199b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// dephyir mkhas pa nad med lus// don gnyer 'dod pas 'di dag dus// ston mo nye ba'i ston mo dang // dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya// gang yang rnal 'byor lus can gyi// gtor ma rgya chen bya ba dang / 
199b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'jigs sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i// mchod pa rim bzhin pa rnam par bya// spyan ras gtsigs kyi na pas la ba' tshag rdzogs so// / 'phags pa skrun dus gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal la/ 
199b6(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen gdug pa klu yi nad// myur du bde blag gso byed pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun// snying rje ldan pa rnams kyi bsgrub// de la mi gang zhig sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'am// glu bur gyi 
199b7(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gang gi stobs kyis lus sam sems la nye bar gnod pa'i mtshon ma 'ga' zhig mthong na// de'i sgrib pa bsal bar bya ba'i don du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi cho ga 'di la rab tu brtson 
199b8(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma dang // klu shing gi 'bras bu dang // dar skud dmar po dang // mkhal ma dang snying dang mchod pa dang zho shol sogs pa dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs dang / klu sman thams cad dang

200b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs sna tshogs ni ba gnas pa dang bkram pa'i tshul can longs spyod rgya chen 'byor pa la sogs dang // de bzhin sa dang ring ga nas rtse shing rten sogs ma lus blta// thams cad lcel thub pa yi// 'khor la na/

204a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu 'dzin rngam pa'i sku// gtum chen zhabs brgyad bgegs brgyad mgo mnan rgyal gyur cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir// pha rol rnam gnon 'thing kha drag/ gdug pa kun gyi sku brgyan pa// ma dpung 
204a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba dpa' bos bsgoms// snying rje khros pas sku bsgyur la// dus gsum sangs rgyas cod pan 'chang // rus pa'i gdugs phub 'brug sgra sgrogs// 'khor gnyis kyi ni las byed pa'o// oM AHhrIHma hA ka ru ni ka tsan+d+ra 
204a3(rgyud 'grel): man+da ro sha ni b+ha ya ha ra Ne rak+Sha ba ra NaM gu pa ti pa ra bi dze swA hA/ gcan zan drag po rnams kyi mche ba dang sder mo yi rtse mo la mi rgod dang rgyal po yi khrag ga me sen mo yi chus byugs la rig pa brgya bzlas la dpung par bcing ngo // 'jigs 
204a4(rgyud 'grel): skyob khro bo drag shul che// mdun nas khro zhing tshe mthun bsod// dga' byed drag po phag zig pa// phye bzhin rjes 'brang mi 'jigs sbyin// ji srid yang nga'i lam bskyabs nas// spyod yul phyin par gyur pa na// gnyis 'dus 
204a5(rgyud 'grel): mgon brgyan med zhi// sku gzugs rnam pas mchod pas mnyes// sna tshogs 'jigs pas yang nyams thag dang // gang yang pha rol dregs pa btul byas nas// go 'phang mchog 'dir dngos grub sbyin 'dod pa// rgyal 
204a6(rgyud 'grel): sras bzang la grogs mchog 'dir 'gyur ro// khro dang nga rgyal mang ba dang // sred pas zang zing don gnyer ba// de ni gus par gyur na yang // cho ga 'di las ring bar byed/ chom rkun bcing ba rdzogs so// / 
204a7(rgyud 'grel): bde bar gshegs pa pad+mo can la phyag 'tshal lo// de la rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig slob ma la phan gdags par 'dod pas blo dang ldan pa'i gang zag don du gnyer ba dang bcas pa gang blo brar du lhags pa'am gnyug mar gnas pa 
204a8(rgyud 'grel): yin kyang rung ste/ dul bas mdun du bdang bar gyur pa de dag la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs pad+mo dam pa can gyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po pad+mo kha phye bas shes rab gsal po bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di dran par bya ba yin no// 
204b1(rgyud 'grel): skal ldan skye bo lhags pa na// der ni de ma thag tu de// pa brjod pas ni pad+ma bskyed// de yi snying yang de bzhin no// de la snying gi pad+mo ni// mdab brgyad dkar po zlum pos te// dbus su hri yig gis mtshan pa// spyi bor
204b2(rgyud 'grel): thig le gsum brtsegs pa'o// dkar dmar bdud rtsi nam mkha'i mdog/ rim bzhin rab tu dang bar bsam// smin 'tshams nas zug snying gi dkyil// rtsa mchog sbu gu dkar zangs so// mkhas pa rdo rje 'dzin rgyal 
204b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag/ byams sogs tshad med las skyes pa'i// thub dbang shes rab 'od zer 'chang // spyan ras gzigs su myur bar bskyed// spyan gsum 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar ldan// rnam dag 'od bzangs dkyil 'khor/ 
204b4(rgyud 'grel): can// btsun mo gnyis kyis sku bsten cing // rnga yab dkar g.yo ba dgyes bzhugs pa'o// de rjes gnan la phan brtson pa'o// yid kyis de yi don bsgrub phyir// rnam gus pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi dgos pa 
204b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mchog reg/ de bas de la gsol btab pas// spyan drangs bdag nyid la bstims bya// de nas phyag g.yas tshes 'chad kyi// mthil skyes ma las yongs gyur pa// nyi ma rdo rje snying po can// dbyangs dang gsal 
204b6(rgyud 'grel): byed kyis brgyan bsam// hraMHbcas sngags phreng gnyis brjod pas// nyi 'od tsha zhing rab rno yi// zer 'phros pas ni pad+mo dbye// hriHlas de bzhin thig le'o// de las thog mar dkar thig le// pha yi sa bon 
204b7(rgyud 'grel): zhu bar bshad// dmar po ma yin sa bon te// de bzhin mkha' 'dra kun gzhir bzhed// de mthar zhu ba'i thig le'i rgyun// dbyer med phan tshun rnams 'dres pa// bde chen 'od gsal rnam mi rtog/ blo gros pad+mo rab// 
204b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gsungs// cho ga'i rgyal po dam pa 'di// gang gang skal par ldan pa'i mthus// brtse ldan gus pas sngon song ba// de yis thos sogs rnam dag 'phel// slob ma la shes rab bskyed pa rdzogs so// 
205a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba'i rgyal po ser sprin rab mthug bsreg par mdzad// yi ge gnyis kyis gdug pa'i stobs 'joms 
205a2(rgyud 'grel): nga ro mi bzad nam mkha'i ngos la gad rgyangs sgrogs// zhal gsum phyag drug dkar dmar mthing ka in+d+ra'i mdog ldan rdo rje mda' ge'u thal mo bsdebs// me dpung bsdigs 'dzub ral gri'i bshog bsnams dbang po 
205a3(rgyud 'grel): yi rgyal po spyan ras gzigs dbang la phyag 'tshal// de nas ser ba bzlog pa bshad par byas te/ lha dang klu la sogs pa khros pa dang / 'byung ba nyid kyi dbang ngam// grong khyer ba rnams kyis don ma yin pa'i las kyi stobs
205a4(rgyud 'grel): las kyang rung ste/ dus dang dus ma yin pa'i gnod pa 'di lta ste/ du ba'i mdog dang / rgya mtsho rlung gis bskyod pa'i rlabs lta bu'i sprin gyi phung po 'khrig cing // 'brug gi sgra kun du mi bzad pas glad pa 'gems pa lta bu 
205a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / gnam lcags dang ser ba drag po 'bab pa'i ltas mngon du gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer pa rnams dang skye bo mang po la snying rtse bas gdud pa'i yid can// bdag gi don btang nas gzhan gyis nye bar 'tsha 
205a6(rgyud 'grel): balhag par chags pas zil gyis gnon pa dag 'byung po dpag tu med pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug drag po chen po 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzi brjid rgyal po ltas ngan pa thams cad rnam par 
205a7(rgyud 'grel): 'jig par mdzad pa'i rigs kyi rgyal po 'di yang dag par dran par bya'o// de zhal g.yas dkar lha bsrung ba// g.yon pa dmar po me yi rje// dbus gnas thing ka klu 'dul grags// spyan gsum mche ba brtsigs khros pa'o// 
205a8(rgyud 'grel): g.yas g.yon dang po mda' gzhu'i phyag/ gnyis pa gnyis ni thal mo bsdebs// gsum pa'i phyag na me dpung ste// g.yon pa bsdigs 'dzub bsgreng ba nyid// sgron shing dung mdog sku chen 'gying // ral gri'i bshog rgyangs

205b2(rgyud 'grel): au tri A d+hA ba lo ka ti shwa ra ya a ti kro ta ma hA dza la sarba du sa ra ha ra ha re/ Da ha Da ha/ shI graM lu d+hI mA ra phaT/ thal mo ga ya sa la pa dkar dang // g.yo na laT nag bkod nas ni// bsdabs pas me lce 'bar ba yis// dpa' 
205b3(rgyud 'grel): bos se rab rnam par bzlog/ mig gnyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // smin pa khro gnyer glog rgyun dang // shangs las me stag zhal las kyang // lce 'bar phuHyis btab pas kyang // de las rang nyid 'dod thag gru// mkhas
205b4(rgyud 'grel): pas yid kyis 'tshams bcad de// sprin tshogs 'o ma can gyi khri// bsnol bas chu zhag gis byug bya// gang tshe dus la bab gyur pa// de tshe bstan pa sdang stabs kyis// rngam par byas la med pur 'bar// skal ba me ltar 
205b5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' g.yog 'gyur// sngags phreng gsum mam bdun nam dgu/ yang ni nyi shu rtsa gcig brjed// skra cig de la rdo rje yi// pha bong nyid kyang zhu bar 'gyur// dpal spyan ras gzigs khros pas ser ba bzlog pa'i cho ga 
205b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so// / 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gsum la skyabs song sems bskyed ldan// 'gro la phan 'dod bdag 'dul ba'i// skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan gyi// khang bur

205b8(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya'o// thugs kyi pad+mo la zum pa'i// dbus su sems dngos hriHbsam bya// 'di 'dra'i 'phags pa nyid du bdag/ skacig tsam gyis bsgoms nas ni// dag dang brgya dang dad pa yis// rnal 'byar 
206a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po gnyid log bya// gang tshe gnyid du nye ba na// tri yang thig le gnyis la bsdu// rim gyis thig le 'og ma yang // de bzhin thig le gong ma la'o// de nas sna tshogs snang ba kun// rang gi lus la 
206a2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas de// pad dbus thig le nyag gcig la// chul chu bzhag de bzhin gzhag/ sems ni dri med zung 'jug bdag/ dngos med dngos bral rnam par dag/ 'od gsal chen po nyid la nyid// mngon sum ma

206a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dam nas skyes pa bzhin// gnyid kyis myos bgyur ma rig gi bslad blo gros 'di// rang gi rang dben mkha' la nyi ltar spros bral du// rtsol bral med nyid darang dbang mngon sum 'char bar byed// rmi lam skyes bus rmA 
206a8(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi// grong du dga' dang mya ngan la// bzung ba rlom sems cam yin pa// de tshe de yis shes par 'gyur// me long gzugs bstan bsal ba'i// yod dang med dang gnyis ka dang // gnyis ka ma yin brjod minas 
206b1(rgyud 'grel): dem yid ches mthong bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i ngos la dbang po'i gnu// de bzhin ser sprin 'brug sa can// thog mthar skyes dang gags mi dmigs// 'od gsal gnas skyes bu'i shes// ji ltar smig rgyu'i chu 'bab pa/ 
206b2(rgyud 'grel): shar sogs phyogs ni gang zhig nas// ma 'ongs gar yang mi 'gro ba// rmi lam mthong ba de yis shes// dril bu dang ni pi wang sgra// brag cha la sogs 'du byed ni// rnam par thar pa gsum gyis sgo si// zab mo rnam 
206b3(rgyud 'grel): par dben pa yang // snang ba mun pa thibs po dang // 'od gsal bye brag med 'gyur ba// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser bzhin du// dri bral rnam par dag pa smad// ji srid 'dzin pa mang po la// zad dang mi skye ba sreb 
206b4(rgyud 'grel): yis// ro gcig nyid du sbyor shes pa// rmi lam las gzhan rnal 'byor min// de ni sad pa nyid na yang // yid kyi dbang po tshim pa dang // 'dod pa'i sred pa las bla zlag/ chos 'di brjod pa tsam rtogs so// de ltar 
206b5(rgyud 'grel): gzung dang 'dzin pa yi// dri ma dri ma bral ba dang // bral ba rang bzhin med pa yang // yid kyi mngon par 'du mi byed// 'bags pa'i mig ces bshad pas te// spyan ras gzigs kyi mthu yis so// rmi lam dri ma med pa

206b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyud pa'i// skyob pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phreng // ye shes sa bon hUM yig gis// mtshan ma rdo rje sbu gu'i rgyun// smin 'tshams nas 'phos slob ma yin// d+hU ti'i rin chen po brang du// zhugs gyur de snying pad+mo'i bar// bar chad 
207a1(rgyud 'grel): med 'brel brtan pas bsgom// de nas bla ma man ngag gis// ye shes dbab pa'i sbyor bar bya// byang chub sems khengs ye shes kyi// me lce da la bus spar bar bya// babs par gyur na lus cig des/ 
207a2(rgyud 'grel): sngon chad ma myong dga' ba yi// ro myang mchog bcas ro myang med// spu g.yo ba yis 'dren par gsungs// bdug pa mchog gis bdug bya zhing // sgra chen glu dbyangs rol mo yis// dpa' bo'i gar bya brtul zhugs

208b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'bru gsum mngon bsams la// dad dang thugs rjes dam tshig gis// kha dog rim gsum 'od zer 'byung // sku mchog snying po a~M las 'od zer dkar po dang // gsung rgyun dri med aHlas de bzhin dmar ba'i 'od/ 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag thugs bdag hUM las rnam 'phros rab sngo zer// bdag lus ngag yid gnas gsum la reg dri gsum sel// de rjes bdud rtsi dkar dmar sngo// dag byed rnam gsum man ngag bzhin/ 
209a2(rgyud 'grel): de 'og ye shes rnam gsum gzhug/ mthar ni gnyis med bzhi pa'o// shin tu gsang ba bde ba che// thig le gsum rgyan sbyor ba ni// de rjes blo gros chen pos bsgom// dbang bskur nas ni gshegs su gsol// 
209a3(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur rdzogs so// / 'phags pa pad+mo'i phyag la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi snying la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs rje'i gzhus bskyod byin brlabs kyi// mda' lce rnos bsnun yud tsam gang la 
209a4(rgyud 'grel): nag po'i phyogs kyi rtsa lag dang // bdud kyi bu mo g.yo ba'i mig gis rnam kun blta bar mi nus pa'i// dpal gang bde chen rab tu 'bar byed 'khrul 'khor rgyal po la phyag 'tshal// de nas 'phags pa thugs rje che// 
209a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes 'khrul 'khor 'bar ba zhes// bya ba rang lus rtsa mchog gi/ bu ga thog mar bsam par bya// rab dmar rdo rje rnon po'i 'od// khro zhing ha har bzhad pa'i nyams// thugs kha las brgyud ye shes mes// zhal 
209a6(rgyud 'grel): bka' bdag don brtson pa po// lcags kyu pad+mo g.yas dang g.yon// brtul shugs drag po rtsal 'gyed pa// gzhan gyis mi thub stobs po che// cho na gang bar ni bsgom par bya// lte bar ye shes sbar ba'i rlung // 
209a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsibs brgyad bshog pa rno ldan dang // de dbus raM yig gis mtshan bcas// d+hA ti yangs pa'i rkang zug pa'o// de dbus nas zhugs ye shes rlung // rab tu rdo rje'i rkang srog can// snying dkyil pad+mo 'dab brgyad rtsa/ 
209a8(rgyud 'grel): bsdus shing grims par bzung ba yin// de steng bde gshegs snying po yi// sa bon yi ge hUM dkar mkhris// bltas te dgang ba'i rnal 'byor brtsam// sprul pa'i gnas kyi 'khor lo ni// rtsol ba'i rlung shugs 
209b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dis bskyod pas// 'gal me bskor ba ji bzhin du// sgra drag 'od zer 'khrug pa yis// mi bzad rab tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de phyir de yi shugs las kyang // me lce g.yo ba de bzhin du// de 'bar srog shing rlung gis 
209b2(rgyud 'grel): kyang // thog med g.yo byas snying khar 'gyur// de tshe pho sgra dang bcas pas// steng nas lha'i bdud rtsi dbab// bde chen rab tu gsal ba'i dngos// 'bar ba rab 'bar chen 'bar 'gyur// gang tshe ye shes btung ba 
209b3(rgyud 'grel): yis// chang gis myos par 'di gyur pa// de tshe rang dbang med par ni// lus sems spro bar non par 'gyur// dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i 'khrul 'khor rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po tshe rabs dbang du 
209b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dal ba 'das lam dbang du mgyur pa'i sgrub pa pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang du gyur pa'i brtag pa bsgom par bya ste// ji ltar spyod pa'i gnas nyid du// 'jig rten pha rol dran 
209b5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// ji skad bshad pa'i man ngag gis// dbang gyur 'phags pa mnyes par bya// dal ba ring du mi gnas dang // rgyu dang 'bras bus rjes 'brel la// som nyi spangs nas srid pa las// yid byung zhi la dga' ba
209b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyed// bdag gis yongs su bzung ba gang // ji tsam chags pas rjes bsrungs pa// de dag de tsam skyo ba yis// mchod sprin byas te gcig pur gnas// zhing 'dir gdung ba drag po dang // mi g.yo la sogs 'dun 
209b7(rgyud 'grel): pa che// ltos bral lhag par mos bcas pa// rnal 'byor rgyal po nges par bya// de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyi lus kyi snying po gsum lha'i mtshan ma gsum du bsgyur te/ tha mal pa'i lus las 'das nas ting nge 'dzin
209b8(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byas pas bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs dbang du gyur pa'i gzugs kyi 'du byed pa la zhugs te bla ma dang lha rjes su dran pa dang ma bral bzhin du rig pa mchog gi sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// 
210a1(rgyud 'grel): / oM aHhriHma ma pa rA dzarmA rak+Sha ba ra Ne gu pa ti bid N+ya bya ma he kAt+na/ oM oMHhriHsarba duSh+TA na ma ma grita ti dza b+ha ya/ staM b+hA ya/ mo ta ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM AHhriHmahA 
210a2(rgyud 'grel): ka ru Ni ka yA/ ma ma pA ra dzAr+m+ma dzar+m+ma/ ta ra sarba pra s+tha be rA k+Sha ba ra Na gu pa ti bits+tsha wa shi ti dzA ma hA sa me ya su sma ra swA hA/ brtson pa'i cha lugs gnas zhabs gnyis// gang du 'dod pa'i zhing der bskyod// bu skyes 
210a3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs sdong bu 'am// rin chen pho brang mchog bdag 'jug/ rmi lam rmis pas bar chad pa// do mod mtshan mo'i bar skabs 'dras// mkhas pas dogs pa med byas te// lha bsnyen ji ltar 'dod bzhin skye// skye bo 
210a4(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mnga'i sgor ni// snying rje chen po spangs pa'i rten// sa bon sdig pa bsams nas ni// rtag tu 'jigs pas goms par bya// dpal ldan shar sogs yongs dag zhing // mngon dga' drag pos rtog goms pa//

210a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang // 'chi ba ma yin lhas gang dag/ gang che bsngon du gyur pa na// mgon po'i slu ba 'dir bshad do// 'jig rten g.yeng ba ma lus las// rnam dben dal ba bsgrubs nas ni// mchog gsum skabs 'gro nas 
210a7(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te// ci rigs chos spyod brtsam par bya// longs spyod bshes dang lus nyid dang // byang chub phyogs kyi sngon par zhen// rnam bcu rnam gsum spangs nas ni// ltos pa thams cad rnam par dor// mi rtag/ 
210a8(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal bdag med dang // stong pa nyid kyi rnam thar gyis// 'khor ba'i gnas la yid phyung zhing // mya ngan 'das la mngon par dga'// de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya ste// kha lho phyogs 
210b1(rgyud 'grel): su bltas la// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas mig mi 'dzum par mdun gyi nam mkha' la rgyal ba lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsam par bya'o// gal te spros par

210b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas gzhug par bya'o// de'i 'og tu rang gi nyer bsdogs kyi dngos po gang yin pa 'di dag nyid lha'i rnam par dag par dmigs la// mngon par chags dang yongs su sdang // rab tu mi shes gzhi gsum gyi// 
210b4(rgyud 'grel): dbang gi las gang mngon gyur gang // de 'dir mgon po gsum du mos// dbus su 'thing ka rdo rje can// g.yas su dmar mdzes ral gri 'dzin// g.yon du dkar gsal zhags bsnams pa// thams cad g.yon/

211a8(rgyud 'grel): bung ba gzhug par bya// skal ldan ngo bo nyid dbang du// bde ba mchog gi rgyud tshim zhing // chos kun rmi lam 'drar shes dang // garo bsgyur sems ston grub pa'i rdzas// de nas 'og gi pho brang lha// 'od zer dkrugs pa'i

213b8(rgyud 'grel): dbul lo// a~M ba dz+ra a nu wi tisaH/ sbrang dbul pa'o// oM badz+ras pa ta ye sad+ha/ na zan dbul par// oM ba\u0f89\u0fa4dz+ra ma ba ldan na spang / bgags pasem pa'o// e bar+tha ma su ga sang+gA/ dur ba dbu ba'o// oM 
214a1(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swAhA/ yams shing dbul ba'o// oM AHhrIHna maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM oM a ka na ye a mu ka s+ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+hi ku ru ye swA hA// bsreg rdzas thams cad kyi mgo 'am mjug dang dgang blugs/ 
214a2(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba'o// gzhan yang mchod pa thams cad kyang // ci rigs mkhas pas shes byas te// dgang dang blugs pa'i phyag rgya yis// mnyes byas khrus dang bcas pas mchod// mthar bzod par gsol la dngos grub 
214a3(rgyud 'grel): blang ba dang / gshegs su gsol nas bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o// sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// / thugs rje chen po bkra shis kun du snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas kun tu snang ba

218b8(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba dag/ de yi phyi rim bri byas la// dri zhim dkar ba zhor ldan pa'i// bsreg cing ku shas bcings te gzugs// gu gul me tog ku sha dang // mar dang 'bras thug til dang ni// 'o thug lung thang sngon po dag 
219a1(rgyud 'grel): las kyi sngags ni mthar sbyar la// me lha de yi snying kha yi// mkha' la 'khor lo bsam byas te// bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yis// rim pa bzhin du mchod pa'o// bya ba rnams ni thams cad
219a2(rgyud 'grel): la// de yi ngo bos mnyam par bzhag/ de nas stod pa bya ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs kyi sku// chos kyi sku ste gzhan gyi mchog/ sngags kyi mgon po mchog gi lha// snying rje'i bdag nyid phyag 'tshal bstod/ 
219a3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rje stobs po che// shin tu nges pas zhi ba'i tshul// theg pa chen po'i go 'chang thob// rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal bstod// shin tu dag pa'i dpa' bo che// mdog gi dbang phyug kun gyi mgon// dam chos 
219a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i// ji bzhin 'dul la phyag 'tshal bstod// cir yang mi dmigs stong pa'i ngang // lhan cig skyes pa'i ral gri bsnams// mi rtog ye shes go cha can// rgyu dang 'bras bu phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas 
219a5(rgyud 'grel): zas kyi rnal 'byor ni// chu yi dkyil 'khor de la yang // raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum 'bar ba bsam byas nas// de dkyil tshogs kyi 'khor lo yang // bsal bar rab tu bsam byas nas// snod ni rab lnga 
219a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen ni// rang bzhin 'bar bar bsgom byas nas// der ni kha zas sna tshogs rnams// bsam nas de dkyil rdo rje ni// rtse lnga rab tu 'bar ba las// bdud rtsir gyur par rab tu bsam// de nas rang gi sa bon las/

219b4(rgyud 'grel): garted yang drug 'i ba'i khye dbu tshang pas spyang grub pa chugs// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa lo ke te/ shwa ra tsin+da ma Ni tsakra b+ha d+hi sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub

223b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// / 5// mi ga rme pa'i rgyud kyi ma pa'i kyi 'khor brtan pa'i tshul pa'i pas gas// rgya gar skad du/ shad ak+Sha ra tan tra kra min maN Da tsakra u pa de sha sA ta na/ bod skad du/ yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 
223b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// re shig dang por ting nge 'dzin dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa phyogs su zhugs nas/ 
223b3(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar la spyi bor bzhag nas shar phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA gA tA badz+ra ban d+ha naM/ ka ro bi zhes phyag bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA rad na ban d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du 
223b4(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA pad+ma ban d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs su/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA karma ban d+ha naM ka ro mi/ zhes bya bas phyag bzhi byas la/ g.yas pa'i khu tshur spyi bor bzhag 
223b5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA od b+ha ba ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas lus dang ngag dang sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o// khu tshur de nyid kyi kha la/ oM pad+mad b+ha ba ya swAt+ma/ zhes bya bas/ ngag byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 
223b6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bzhag nas/ oM badz+rod b+ha ba ya swA hA/ zhes bya bas sems byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de'i rjes la cho ga 'dis bgegs gsal bar bya'o// oM a mri ta ha na ha na sarba big+h+nA na da ha da ha sarba

223b8(rgyud 'grel): a mr-i ta han ta na sarba big+han da tad ta/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ ces bya ba 'di lan bdun brjod la thal mo lan gsum brdabs nas se gol yang lan gsum brdabs par bya'o// de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i

228b8(rgyud 'grel): dkar sogs kha dog ngag gi phreng ba yid ni ye shes yig 'bru'i dngos// brtse ba'i rlung bskyod ye shes me 'bar 'gro ba'i sdig tshogs bud shing bsregs// zhi ba'i ngang ni gnyis med mi g.yo mkha' ltar spros 
229a1(rgyud 'grel): bral rol gcig ro// bde chen 'byung gnas ye shes dri med mnyam gzhag chen po bsgoms par bya// de rjes mchod sogs dag pa'i yan lag cho ga ji bzhin ye shes sems dpa' legs bcug 
229a2(rgyud 'grel): ste// rnam gsum 'khor lo dkar dmar sde tshul go rim ji bzhin sku gsung thugs// brtan po'i mtshan nyid dam pa'i zhal bzhin mkhas pas rab tu shes par bya// thugs rje chen po khar sarba Na'i sgrub thabs//

249b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bsog/ de nas rig pa 'dzin pa nyid// rtsa ba'i sdom pa la sogs bsrung // gtsang ba'i zas gos baspung bar gnas// shar bltas chos gos sngon po gyon// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste// 
249b7(rgyud 'grel): snga dro dang po snying rje'i bdag/ bskyed rim bsnyen pa'i dus bzhin bya// khyad par bum pa'i lha rnams bskyed// tshogs gsag sngon 'gro rjes 'jug rnams// bsnyen pa'i dus dang mthun par gsungs// khyad par/ 
249b8(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems pa bstim// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi bdag po spyan drangs te// byin brlabs dbang bskur bum nang thim// thun mong sngags sam khyad par sngags// bzlas shing // 
250a1(rgyud 'grel): spro bsdu'i rim pa ni// snod bcud ye shes bcud bsdus nas// bum nang lha dang rdzas la thim// sngags la gtad de bzlas pa ni// lce ni hUM gi rdo rjer gyur// snying kha'i mtshan ma la sogs las/ 
250a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi phreng ba brgyad mar 'khor// de las khro chung grangs med spros// bsregs gzir bcom btags tshar gcad bskrad// tshur 'dus nad dang gdon rnams phyung // dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas kyang // 
250a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom// thun 'tshams mchod bstod gtor ma btang // sgrub pa thon nas bum pa yis// bdag gam gzhan la dbang bskur te// dngos grub rdzas phud lha la dbul// lhag ma bdud rtsing 
250a4(rgyud 'grel): bsams te bza'// de nas yi ge rgyapas bshags// ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsaso// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu// thams cad sbrum lta bur bsgom// sgyu ma lta bu'i nga rgyal lhas// ji ltar 
250a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba'i las rnams bya// bam las chu skyes 'dab brgyad bskyed// gtso bo klu chen rgyud bsams te// rin chen snod du gtor ma bsham// dkar gsum dngar gsum klu sman blug/ spangs shing byin gyis brlab byas te/ 
250a6(rgyud 'grel): klu la byin pas gdug rtsub zhi// sngags bzlas 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// byab pa'i rdzas kyis dug phyung ste// chos bshad khro bo'i che brjod pas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dran te// de ni zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ 
250a7(rgyud 'grel): yang na mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // ngan na spogs pa'i cho ga bya// de rjes zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya// gdon dang sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur// zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la// smag shad bal po se'u yi// sngags 
250a8(rgyud 'grel): bzlas lcug mas byabs sam brabs// 'jigs pa'i brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir // gla rtsi gu gul mu zi dang // dri chen mi sha sbyang khu'i brun// bsregs pa'i dud pas skrag cing 'bros// de ni khyad par klul shis// 
250b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gzungs kyi las tshogs rnams// ji lta bar ni 'grub par 'gyur// de yis ma zlogs bgegs rnams la// sngon spyod dag gi las byas te// gnas ni gdug cing rtsub pa yi// gnod sbyin pho mo 'du 
250b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sang // sde dpon chen po'i 'khrul 'khor bcal// rig pa 'dzin pas lhor bltas te// gnas cing rngub pa'i bstan la 'dug/ gcer bu khros pa'i sems ldan pas// dur khrod rongs chen po la// khrag dang 
250b3(rgyud 'grel): dug gi zhal zhal bya// smyo byed tshab gsum gyis byug/ nim pag pur snag tsha la// rus chen dag gis bsdug gu yis// 'khrul 'khor rim gyis bca' ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// re 
250b4(rgyud 'grel): mig phyir bstan rtse mo nong // sde dpon lto bar 'khrul 'khor bri// khros pas mche gtsigs gnod sbyin 'jigs// sprul gnyis bzhing 'khor lo 'dzin// de bzhin steng 'og 'khor lo bri// mkhyud dag la mtha' 
250b5(rgyud 'grel): rten sngags// rtsibs la ya tshogs bcu drug bri// dbus su lhas byin gzugs bris te// mgo dang dbang po yan lag rnams// rtsibs chan dag la brgyad zhing dgod// snying khar ni dang lte bar dza// ming rnams
250b6(rgyud 'grel): go rim bzhin du bri// 'khrul 'khor lcags kyi bum par gzhug/ bskyed pa'i rim pa tshul bzhin bsgom// bzlas pa sngags kyi rim pa yis// bkug ste gru gsum kha gcad gzir// sngags bzlas 'khrul 'khor 
250b7(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa yang // steng gcod me yi 'khor lo ste// me rlung drag po g.yon du 'khor// 'og gcod rlung gi 'khor lo ste// grang zhing myur bar g.yas su 'khor// 'khor lo spu gri chen po yis// lhas byin lus 
250b8(rgyud 'grel): sems so sor dpral// phung po mtshon cha'i 'khor pos gtub// 'khor lo tshe grang 'thab pa'i sgra// 'ur 'ur 'brug ltar sngags bzlas shing // 'khros pas rgyun du bskor na ni// klu chen brgyad ni 'chi bar 'gyur// 
251a1(rgyud 'grel): nges par sod na mnan dang bsreg/ yang na nag po'i tshes brgyad nas// brtsams te mthing nag 'brug khung du// ling ga 'khrul 'khor nang bcug la// rdzus skyes tshul du bskyed byas te// sngags bzlas 
251a2(rgyud 'grel): bkug ste sngags ldanan// sde dpon bzhi yi 'khrul 'khor du// bcug ste rdo rje 'amaphur pa yis// dus drug 'khrul 'khor nang du brdung // mngon spyod las rnams gang byed kyang // mchod rten nag par b+hakaH/ 
251a3(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i mchod yon la sogs bsham// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod cing // mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pa lang // bdud rtsi sha lnga sna tshogs bkang // gtor ma sde dpon rnams la sbyin// zod chen rnga brdung 'phrin las// 
251a4(rgyud 'grel): btsal// ling ka drag po'i sbyin sreg bya// yang na mnan pa'i las bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// gzungs kyi las tshogs gang byed kyang // mchod nyin sku gdung dang ldan par// 6 
251a5(rgyud 'grel): tu me tog sngon pos mchod// bdun nam bcu bzhi nyi shu gcig/ gzungs sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na// des ni las rnams thams cad 'grub// grub nas rtag tu mchod par bya// gnod sbyin sde dpon 
251a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po yi// gzungs sgrub 'di la nyes pa gang // gong ma rnams la bzod par gsol// bsod nams sems can kun la bsngo// bdag gis bsgrub thabs 'di byas pas// 'bad bas tshogs gnyis 
251a7(rgyud 'grel): bsags nas ni// rig sngags 'chang 'drar gyur nas kyang // gdug pa'i nad las grol bar shog/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje'i gzungs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po su bA gi shwa ra 
251a8(rgyud 'grel): kIr tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi baN+Di ta dI ba kar shI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsa brgya brtson 'grus song gis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra pA 
251b1(rgyud 'grel): no pa ka sA d+ha nA nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i babs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan sa dras kyis 'dus pa'i sku// gdug pa 'dul mdzad sbrul sogs 
251b2(rgyud 'grel): brtan// rje rje 'dzin la phyaga'atshas te// de yi sgrub thabs tho bar bya// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// sgrub pa yin go rim rnams// thams je ltar gsungs pa ltar // man dag brjed byung du bkal pa/ 
251b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rgyal po bsnyen 'dod pas// gnas ni drang khrod shing gcig gas// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khyim/ bab shes nyams dga' gnas dag tu// maN+Dal ldan po legs byas pa// mai tog la sogs

251b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nyams kyis yungs dkar la// skad kyig ma'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags bzlas tho bo'i sprul pa b+h+yo// gdug pa tshar gcad chung 'dus pas// rdo rje gung dang dbar byung // de nas rang gi snang khang ni/ 
251b6(rgyud 'grel): a dkar nubs zla ba yaM// dkyil 'khor nya gang lta bur bsam// de stengs hUM sngon nu ba las// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga bsam// de yi bum par du sngon po// de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'bros// sarba 
251b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // lhag pa'i sgra dang bla ma rnams// spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs// bsod nams tshogs ni bsag pa'i phyir// phyag 'tshal mchod cing sdig bshags rnams/ 
251b8(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa yongs su dag pa yis// tshig tu brjod de chags pasag bya// spyan drangs rnams ni gshegs su gsol// de nas ye shes tshogs gas gapyod// byi nang snod brgyad 'od bu nas// bdag nyid kyang 
252a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs khar thim// de nyid 'od zhu b+h+rUM la 'dus// hUM zhu zla chos thig ler thim// chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i// ngo bo nyid las byung ba yi// sngags 'di yang dag brjod par bya// oM 
252a2(rgyud 'grel): mahA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM/ tshig gi don dang bcas par bsgom// chu las chu bur rdol ba'i tshul// yaM las rlung gis dkyil 'khor te// raM las me ri kha dog lnga// dbus su paM la pad ma 
252a3(rgyud 'grel): bsam// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du hUM sngon las// de'u rdo rje sngon po ni// 'od zer sngon po 'phro bar bsam// de'i bum par hUM sngon bsam// de las 'od zer thub mo// 'phros 
252a4(rgyud 'grel): nas kyi nang snod brgyad sbyangs// tshung 'dus rdo rjes mo kyu // sngar gyi gnas su thim pa las// de'u rdo rje sngon po ni// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par bsam// de yi bum dkyil hU~M sngon las/ 
252a5(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od byung bcud sbyangs te// tshur 'dus phyag na rdo rje yi// sku ni phra mo'i tshul du 'dus// de las phyag na rdo rje'i sku// mdo nas ji ltar gsungs bzhin bsgom// de ni dam tshig sems dpa'i sku/ 
252a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa'i dus su bsgom pa ni// sku mdog nam mkha'i 'od can la// zhal cig phyag kyang gnyis pa ste// spyan dmar mche ba gtsigs pa la// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdigs 'dzub// shin tu gdug 
252a7(rgyud 'grel): cing khros pa ste// klu chen brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// stod g.yogs sngon po legs bsnams shing // na bza' chos gos sngon po 'chang // smad g.yogs ba ti khra bo dang // stag gi smad g.yogs 
252a8(rgyud 'grel): seng stod g.yogs// nyi zla'i steng na gar byed dgyes// bdag nyid dang ni sprul rgyan gyi// kha nas ha ha'i sgra sgrogs pas// log 'dren tshogs rnams 'joms par byed// de ltar khro bo'i rgyal por ni// 
252b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid rnam par bsam par bya// bdag nyid dam tshig sems pa yi// thugs khar zla ba rdo rje hUM// 'phros 'dus ye shes sems par bsgom// thugs khar nyi ma rdo rje hUM// sran ma nas tshad yungs 'bru la// 
252b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor bsam mo// rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya yis// gnas lngar gtug cing lus bsrung bya// na maHsa man ta badz+ra nAn badz+ra ka brtsa hU~M/ rdo rje rtse lnga'i phyag rgya yis// sngags 'di brjod de brtan
252b3(rgyud 'grel): par bsam// na maHsa man ta badz+ra nAn badz+ra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na ya hU~M/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// thugs kyi hU~M las 'od 'phos pas// 'od zer lcags kyu'i dbyibs byung nas// ye shes 
252b4(rgyud 'grel): sems pa spyan drangs te// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa yi// lhung lo can gyi bzang nas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes gnang ba'i// gsang ba dag 'phags bgos sngon can// 'khor bcas ma lus 
252b5(rgyud 'grel): sman 'dren gyi// 'dir gshegs mchod pa dam par bzhes// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pa Ni sa ma ya maN+Da la ma d+he a ka Da tsa yA/ a ka Da tsa yA/ pra be sha yA/ pra be sha yA/ tiSh+Tha yA tiSh+Ta ya/ a ba lo ka ya/

252b7(rgyud 'grel): a lo ke hUM/ badz+ra g+han d+ha b+h+rUM/ badz+ra ni be d+ye hUM/ badz+ra gI ti gI ti/ ga ta ga ta hUM swA hA/ sngags dang tshigs bcad rab brjod pas// dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul// de nas bstod dang 'phrin las
252b8(rgyud 'grel): bcol// mdun gyi rta'i gtor ma la// a las ban d+ha'i gzhal yas khang // thun mong gdan dang ma yin steng // hUM yig las ni mdog gnag pa// las kyi sems par bskyed par bya// ri rab chen

254b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dang // dkon mchog gsum po spyan drangs te// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // yid rang bskul zhing gsol ba gdab// skyabs 'gro lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo'o// de nas bgegs dgra'i ting

254b3(rgyud 'grel): ko ha/ chos rnams thams cad stong par bsgom// e yaM raM be kha laM saM/ oM las chos kyi 'byung gnas te// de bzhin 'byung ba rim bzhin bsgom// lam las ri rab lhun po'i ste// saM ma las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed/

254b8(rgyud 'grel): klu chen rnams ni rgyan du brgyan// dbu skra s+phar ser la 'jigs// sman mtshams dpral bsdus ha ha bzhad// brkyang bskum klu brgyad zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje mchu yis klu brgyad gzir// nyi zla dang ni 
255a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+mar bcas// dbus kyi chal rnam par bzhugs// de nas rang gi snying gar ni// rang dang 'dra ba'i gas sngon bskyed// dbang po drug la'ang de bzhin bsgom// de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las// 
255a2(rgyud 'grel): 'bros 'khor lo rdzobs bana'i zhing // 'bras 'dus phyag cad mig 'thus mtshad// dedag yongs srung rje dpon pa ni// shar du rdo rjegand sbyin te// D+ho ru sen po zab bo// nub tu rjegadon chen bdag/ byangs 
255a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ro langs te// sde dpon chen po bzhi rnams kyang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthong dag la// g.yas pa rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon rnams sdigs mdzub tri shUl// ram gri dbyug to 'khor lo'o// klu chen 
255a4(rgyud 'grel): brtad ni rgyan du byas// skad dkris nabatha'as pa pa dang // rag ga nyi na dam rgyan// banyi la ba gam babs thos// grod galags sun pa'i chos gas 'acing // dgrakra sA byin mer 'thang // 
255a5(rgyud 'grel): la yig dbyangs sgrog/ brkyang bskum rigs bzhi'i klu rnams mnan// brgya byin mdzes dang ma bcas// me 'bar dbus su bskyed par bya// sgo ba dag kyang yig 'brulas// ji bzhin du ni bskyed pas te/ 
255a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ga cha'i phyag rgya yis// gnas sngar gtugs cing lus bsrung b+ha// namaHsa man badz+ra na badz+raka panahU~M/ rdo rje rje lnga'i phyag rgya yis// brtan par byas te lus byin brlab// thugs ka'i rdu las 'di 'bros nas// 
255a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa// phyag 'tshal mchod bstod sdig bshags te// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas// mchod rten sngon po dag la bstim// 'od zer 'dra 'gro byin gyis bcab// tham 
255a8(rgyud 'grel): las 'da'abros bdag shegs bskul// ma bskyod sangs rgyas bye snyed rnams// sun drangs mchog cing sdig bshags te// gzungs ltar rjes su gnang bad nas// dbang bskur byin brlabs de nyig pam// 
255b1(rgyud 'grel): dbu la mi bskyod rdo rje mtshan// thugs mtshan la sogs bsgoms nas ni// sngags kyi phreng ba 'khor ba las// spros bsdu'i rim pa gsal bar bsgom// sangs rgyas gang gA'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas 
255b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i gsang sngags skyon spangs bzlas// par 'phros pa ni mchod pa'i tshul// de las 'od byung gdon sdig spangs// dngos grub rnam gnyis thob par bsam// ji ltar nye bar ma gyur par// gshegs/ 
255b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol dang thun mtshams med// mchod rten sngon po dag la'o// yang na rig pa 'dzin pa yis// thun mtshams ma chod bstod gtor ma gtang // tha ma'i thun la gshegs su gsol// dkyil 'khor lha 
255b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams thugs kar bsdu// de nyid mi dmigs stong par bsgom// sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod lam bya// bsnyen dus rig pa 'dzin pa yis// rtsa sngags yig 'bru bcu bdun bzlas// oM nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni rA 
255b5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA// 'di yis las rnams thams cad 'grub// grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen pa rab 'bring tha ma'i tshad// dbang po rab 'bring dag dang sbyar// bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan gyur na// 
255b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub blang phyir bsgrub pa bya// snod du bsnyen po cho ga'o// de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i gnas dag tu// gtsang ba'i sa blangs stegs bu brtsigs// ba lcig na ma nas blangs pa dang / 
255b7(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma'i dri chu tsan dan dang // gu dgum ga bur la sogs byug/ gru bzhi rab tu gnas pa dang // thig la sogs pa'i rim pa yang // gzhan nas 'byung ba bzhin du gdab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri/ 
255b8(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams la sogs cha rnams kyang // mtshan nyid rgyas par gzhan bzhin no// mchod rdzas la sogs gong bzhin bshams// khyad par dag gi rdzas rnams ni// bum pa sgrub pa'i rdzas kyis dgod// dngos grub 
256a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyis kha bcad la// mgul chings sngon po'i dar gyis bcing // dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhag par bya// rag sha rus pa'i rgyan cha dang // seng ldeng phur pa rdo rje rnams// bla re rgyal mtshan 
256a2(rgyud 'grel): ba dan gdugs// gzhan yang sgrub rdzas thams cad sogs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa nyid// rtsa ba'i sdom pa la sogs bsrung // gtsang ba'i zas gos srung bar gnas// shar bltas chos gso sngon po 
256a3(rgyud 'grel): gyon// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug ste// snga dro dang po snying rje bdag/ bskyed rim bsnyen pa'i dus bzhin bya// khyad par bum pa'i lha rnams bskyed// tshogs bsag sngon 'gro rjes 'jug rnams// bsnyen pa'i 
256a4(rgyud 'grel): dus dang mthun par gsungs// khyad par ye shes sems dpa' bstim// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi bdag po spyan drangs te// byin rlabs dbang bskur bum nad thim// thun mong 
256a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags sa ma khyad par sngags// bzlas shing spro bsdu'i rim pa ni// snod bcud ye shes bcud bsdus nas// bum nang lha dang rdzas la thi mo// sngags la gtad de bzlas pa ni// lce ni hUM gi rdo rjer gyur/ 
256a6(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i mtshan ma la sogs las// sngags kyi phreng ba brgyud mar 'khor// de las khro chung grangs med spros// bsregs gzir bcom btags tshar bcad bskrad// tshur 'dus nad dang gdon rnams phyung // / 
256a7(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub rnam gnyis thob nas kyang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin bsgom// thun mtshams mchod bstod gtor ma gtang // sgrub pa thon nas bum pa yis// bdag gam gzhan la dbang bskur te// dngos 
256a8(rgyud 'grel): grub rdzas phud lha la dbul// lhag ma bdud rtsir bsams te bza'// de nas yi ge brgya pas bshags// ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol// dam tshig dkyil 'khor rang la bsdu// sgyu ma lta bu'i/

256b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs shing byin gyis brlabs byas te// klul byin pas gdug rtsu bzhi// sngags bzlas 'od zer 'phro 'dra yis// khyab pa'i rjes kyis drug phyung ste// chos bshad khro bo'i chetshe brjod pas// sngon gyi dam 
256b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig rjes dran te// des na zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// yang na mchin ma bzang po 'byung // ngan na spogs pa'i cho ga bya// de rjes zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya// gdon dang sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur// zhi bar ma gyur 
256b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon bgegs la// smag shad bal po se'u yis// sngags bzlas lcug mas byabs sam brabs// 'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir// gla rtsi gu gul mu zi dang // dri chen mi sha sbyang ki'i brun/

256b6(rgyud 'grel): dag gi las byas te// gnas ni gdug cing rtsub pa yi// gnod sbyin pho mo 'du ba'i sar// sde dpon chen po'i 'khrul 'khor bca'// rig pa 'dzin pas lhor bltas te// gnag cing rtsub pa'i stan la 'dug 
256b7(rgyud 'grel): gcer bu khros pa'i sems ldan pas// dur khrod ro ras chen po la// khrag dang dug gis zhal zhal bya// smyo byed tsha ba gsum gyis byug/ nim pa ga bur snag tshal// rus chen dag gi smyu gu yis// 'khrul/ 
256b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rim gyis bca' ba ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud bcas// re mig phyir bstan rtse mo nang // sde dpon lto bar 'khrul 'khor bri// khros pas mche gtsigs gnod sbyin 'jigs// sprul gnyis 
257a1(rgyud 'grel): baning 'khang 'a'adzin// dban kyang 'ga' ba ma tha// mu klud dag sa mtha' na sngags// rtsubs la mtshogs drug za// dbus su rgyas byin gzugs ces te// mgo dang dbang ba 
257a2(rgyud 'grel): yan la garnams// rtsibs mtshan dag 'a grang nang dgod// stong khar ni dang sto bar nga// rang naras go ma bzhin du za// 'khrul 'kha grags kyi bum par gzhug/ bskyed pa'i dam pa tshul bzhin bas+hom/

257a4(rgyud 'grel): rlung gi 'khor lo ste// drang dang myur bar g.yas su'abang // 'tshar la sug can po mas// zas byin lus sems sa so bral// phung po mtshan cha'i 'khor los gtsug// 'thar mtsho ma 'thabs pa'i/

257b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal te// de'i sbubs thabs bdag nyid dran phyir bre// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar/ maN+Dal bya ba ni// 
257b8(rgyud 'grel): bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lus sngob/ sna cig pa/ khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ shin tu khros pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pas len du btsug ste/ lho rub 'tshams nas sa sngon po 'am nag po len du bcug la/ dri zhim pa'i tshul

258a8(rgyud 'grel): las me'i phung po 'dra ba/ zhal nas ha ha dang hUM hUM gi sgra sgrogs pas khams gsum pa brgyal bar byed pa/ klu chen po brgyad kyis sku la rnam par brgyan pa/ sku che la yan lag rags pa/ ri rab la rnam par
258b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa ste/ zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang ba/ dbu bar snang gi khams na 'phyo ba/ 'khor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba cig bskyed do// de ci 'dra ba cig re rab rtse las spyan drangs

258b7(rgyud 'grel): las kyi lha'i zhal du thim/ thugs kha nas 'thon te/ slar bdag nyid kyi snying khar thim ste/ sngags kyi phreng bas bskor bas bzas pa po sngags kyi phreng bas bsregs shing 'dul bar bya'o// sgrub pa rtags bzang ba
258b8(rgyud 'grel): dang las la sbyar te/ rgyud las kyang 'og tu me'i 'khor lo bsam/ me 'bar glong chen dkyil du gzir// bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis// gdul bya'i steng du dbab par bya// zhes gsungs pas bsregs

259a2(rgyud 'grel): tA ra nA ga nAn/ dz+nyAn d+hats+tshin d+ha/ nA ga tsid ya ne b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ nA ga d+ha ma ni/ be si man d+ha nA ga sha rI ra ni/ be s+pho Ta ya/ nA ga na ya nA re/ tad+ya thA hUM phaT/ nA ga bi d+ha ra nA ya hU~M phaT/ nA ga udats+tsha ta na ya

259a8(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ rta'i gtor ma gtong na gtor ma bka' las phab la ni paM ka stAr bskul tshag dang bcas la btang ngo // rta bdag gshegs su gsol// bskyed pa bdag la bsdu/ gnod sbyin lagan du rje'i sgrub thabs/ 
259b1(rgyud 'grel): \u0f88\u0f90'i gtor ma'i gdam ngag/ slob dpon su bA gI shwa ri kA ra tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ tsakra u pa de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na

259b3(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur te the tshom med// drag po las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di// ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshon yin te// rtse gcig bsgom pas 'grub pa las// kun gyis 'grub par mi nus so// 'di ni zhe sdang 'khor lo ste/

259b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'i rnam shes bkug par bsam// zhugs nas sgrub pa'i las la 'jug/ de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo brtsam// stong nyid dang las e las ni// mthing kha gru gsum chos 'byung dbus// yaM las rlung gi 
259b8(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te// re la me ri lnga yi dbus// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo bskyed pa bya// bruM badz+ra tsakra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ bruM las srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// spu gri gcod pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// badz+ra rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ 
260a1(rgyud 'grel): me 'bar dpal dang bcas par bsam// tsakra phyogs mtshams 'khor lo ni// rdo rje rab yi 'khor lo bsgom// rak+Sha zhes pa sa steng bsrung ba'i// byin gyis brlab pa'i 'khor lo bskyed// hUM rnams 
260a2(rgyud 'grel): las ni bde gshegs sku// cho ga yan lag gsum gyis bskyed// thugs khar ye shes 'khor lo bsgom// ye shes sems pa'i thugs kha ru// nyi steng dpa' bo 'bru lnga dgod// mu khyud rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 
260a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor// bde gshags bka' dang dam tshig las// mi 'da' ba yi 'khor lo la// zil gyis mnan pa'i sngags rnams dgod// phyogs mtshams mtshon cha yi 'khor lo la// gnad la dbab pa'i sngags 
260a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams dgod// rdo rje srid pa'i 'khor lo la// tshar gcad pa yi sngags rnams bsam// byin brlabs bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i dbus// mi bskyod zhe sdang rdo rje ste// mthing nag sdigs 'dzub rdo rjer bcas/ 
260a5(rgyud 'grel): sems pa'i dkyil dkrung nyi zla'i gdan// 'khor lo yi ni rtsibs dag la// bcom ldan gtum po khros pa'i sku// rdo rje dang ni sdigs 'dzub bcas// zhal nas sngags kyi sgra sgrogs pas// log 'dren tshogs
260a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams 'joms par byed// de ltar 'khor lo chen po bsgom// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs te// mchod bstod sdig bshags la sogs bya// phyag rgya bzhi yi de la bstim// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis 
260a7(rgyud 'grel): brlab// rjes su gnang ba gsum ldan gyis// chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur te// de nas 'khor lo bskor 'dod na// thugs kha'i hUM las 'od 'bros pas// ye shes sems pa'i thugs dam bskul/ 
260a8(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od 'phros sngags la phog/ de las 'od 'phros 'khor lo bskul// 'khor lo 'od zer 'bar ba yis// steng 'og phyogs 'tshams 'khor lo bskor// 'thub cing rab tu bsreg par bsam// bdag nyid 
260b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni bsngags bzlas pas// sngags kyi 'khor lo rim par bskor// gzas pa po yi snying kha ru// ya yis bskyod de hUM gis bsdu// phaT kyis rnam par 'thor zhing bsreg/ srid pa rdo rje'i 'khor los btubs/ 
260b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'tshams mtshon ma'i 'khor lo yis// phog na thams cad brlag par 'gyur// tsi ta thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// shin tu gnod na khong du bskor// 'phral du gnod na rten la bskor// skabs su gnod na dgug cing 
260b3(rgyud 'grel): bskor// bskor nas brlag par gdon mi za// 'khrul 'khor 'di yi sbyor ba yis// gzhan gyis byas pa'i rigs sngags dang // byed dang bka' nyan po nya dang // 'khor lo'i ting 'dzin la sogs rnams// gnod

265a1(rgyud 'grel): de ltar brgya 'am stong byas na// klu yi nad las grol bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan sa 'am chu bor dor// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal te// zhi dang sbur bas mi thul zhing // rig sngags 'chang gi bka'

265a3(rgyud 'grel): bcings te byad bcug phur la brtod// mgyogs phur btsang dang phur pas bskor// bye tshan gze ma yungs dkar dang // tshal zangs lcags ngur smug bcas// dmar gtor dug gtor dug thun bsham// gru 
265a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum dur khrod g.yam pas gcad// dur khrod ras la nam mkha' lding // gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug gis// ba su ta yi klu rnams 'dzin// spyan mig nyi zer rdo rje'i mchu// 'khor lo'i bzhug sgroral gri'i 
265a5(rgyud 'grel): gshog/ lus rnams rdo rje'i spu yis gtams// de 'dra rgyal rigs kha bstan gzhag/ khwa sbyang nya khrag can zan gyi// mche sdeb la sogs mchu rnams bsog/ drag po'i mchod yon bsham byas la// de
265a6(rgyud 'grel): nas rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// na ra'i gos gyon gos sngon gyi// so so'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas// bsnyen sgrub spur dang gsad sngags bzlas// zhibs dug phyung gsad pa yi// rtse gcig bsgoms 
265a7(rgyud 'grel): te brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med par las la sbyar// nag po'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te// zhi ba byams pa snying rje bsgom// gzungs kyi sngags dang shAn ting bzlas// nad dang gdug rngu bzhi 
265a8(rgyud 'grel): bar bsam// srung ba gong du bstan pa bzhin// gsad pa'i sbyor ba'i drag sngags ni// rig pa 'dzin pa hU~M yig las// gyur te nag po tshocher sprin mdog/ smin 'tshams dpral bsdus ha ha bzhad// rdorje 
265b1(rgyud 'grel): tshar gcod sdigs 'dzub bcas// de 'drar bsgoms te yungs dkar la// sngags bzlas tshangs pa'i gnas su zab// shis drag po 'di yis gdab// yak+Sha nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni hU~M/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta 
265b2(rgyud 'grel): ye/ de bku ru shan dang/ thog thog thog ril thog thog dar byam sad/ cheg mo'i lus la rum ru ma/ snying la shag shag ma ma shAn ti rbad punan tita sr-irbad bu nan/ nAgs khrag pum ma ra ya phaT/ yungs dkar 
265b3(rgyud 'grel): yungs nag ske tshe dang // tshal zangs lcags bye tshan char// gnam lcags drag po'i sngags des brdeg/ gcan zan mche sder bya khwa'i mchu// mkha' lding rgyal po'i sngags bzlas brab// kI la ya dang bcas 
265b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags// dus drug phur pas bzir bar bya// 'og nas drag po'i rdzas kyis bdug/ smag shad bal po'i se'u yi// lcug mas brdeg cing rigs sngags bzlas// g.yas nas gsad cing g.yon nas 
265b5(rgyud 'grel): spur// mi bzad rdzas kyis de la byug/ gag pa ldog pa byung ba bzhin// drag po'i sngags kyis de la gdab// bdun nam rtsa gcig bdun tsho bdun// de la sogs te bsrubs gyur na// nA ga ra dzA kar kota/ 
265b6(rgyud 'grel): des zin pa yang grol 'gyur nges// phyag na rdo rje'i las bsdus 'di// paN+Di ta rnams kyis mdzad pa las// mi ma yin nams skrag cing brgyal// des na nam smin sdig pa'i rgyu// de phyir shin tu gas bar 
265b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// dpal phyag na rdo rje'i srung gsad las tshogs bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon suwa k+Shi shwar kIr tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / taHthA/ oM bi pra la~M/ pra ba ra nA ga/ mahA nA ga N+Di 
265b8(rgyud 'grel): da ya/ ya bar te/ dza ba dza la/ sasar+b+ba Ni ta ya naM/ kaD+D+h+ya kai m+me/ nAg zul byirna nas naM/ han hanas ban+da ga drASh+Ta tsi ta ya ni/ dahad ha sarbadrASh+TAn/ nAg b+ha ba nA ne/ baHbtsa ba tsam sa rba rba b+ha na nA ga nan/

266a2(rgyud 'grel): rlan d+he mi li mi li/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha nag na sAhA zhes phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so// A tsa ta tsata/ bi tsi ta bi tsata/ shata sha ta/ b+hi sha d+he/ nA ga b+hi sha te swA hA/ klu 'bros pa'i sngags so//

266b2(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba dang / sdig pa bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gsol ba gad pa cing skyabs su 'gro ba dang / lus dbul zhing dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo ba'o// de nas yi ge brgya

266b8(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba tshad med pa'o// de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa ni btang snyoms tshad med pa'o// oM mahA shA n+ya tA dz+nyA ra badz+ra sa b+ha ba ad ma ko he zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsams la/ de'i rang las e

269a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnams kyi 'od zer bdag nyid la thim pas sgrib pa sbyangs te/ thugs kha'i 'od zer 'gro drug la phog pas rang gi lhag pa'i lhar gyur nas/ sems can gyi don byas te slar bdag nyid la bstim pa dang /

269b6(rgyud 'grel): skyobar mgur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o// skyo bor gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i gzungs kyi phreng ba kho na la sprul 'khril ba ltar bzlas shing rdo rje gsum gyi dgongs pas bdag nyid kyi lus kyi nang dang

269b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas yang mchod cing bstod la gtor ma btang ba'i las bya'o// tha ma'i thun la/ gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas zhes bzod par gsol la/ khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad ces gshegs

270a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi skyon gyur pa// sgra ches skyon gyur 'byung po dag/ snod med gyur pas thos gyur na// sgra ches bar chad mthu med 'gyur// sgra chungs gyur na dngos grub med// skyen gyur lus kyi phrad pa nyams//

305b1(rgyud 'grel): bcu shes dkyil 'khor bri bar mkhas// mtshan nyid dang ldan gyur pa'i bla ma la// skal ldan slob mas gsol ba lan gsum gdab// gnod ldan gyur na bla mas gnang ba sbyin// slob ma'i blte bar hUM yig ni// 
305b2(rgyud 'grel): du ba'i mdog can 'od zer 'bar ba bsam// snying khar kaM yig nag po sdig pa'i// rang bzhin bltas te hUM gi 'od zer gyis// sna rtser bton te ltung bas sdig pa ni// mi sdug gcer bu skra grol nyams thag cing // til 
305b3(rgyud 'grel): mar gyis bsgos gnag la rim par bsam// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin las// badz+ra yak+Sha la sogs sngags kyis zos pa 'am// hUM las byung ba'i phur bus gdab par bya// saM las kun tu bzang po bskyed 
305b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni// snying khar hUM las sna tshogs rdo rje bsam// spyi bor gtugs te rtse sngags lan gsum gyis// bzlas te slob ma yongs su bsrung bar bya// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bdag nyid ni// ting 'dzin 
305b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum ldan mtshan ma thos pa'am// bzlas pa 'bum rdzogs yang na zla gcig dang // zla drug la sogs bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// de ltar bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs nas// khang stong dag gam dur khrod dang / sdum 
305b6(rgyud 'grel): med drag po'i las can dang // de bzhin tshang tshing mi bzad 'jigs// de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// yang na yid ni gang dag tu// nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// 
305b7(rgyud 'grel): mdor nas gzhi nyams dga' dang // mdangs gsal shar du gzhol bar bshad// yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// las ni legs par sbyar bar bya// tsan dan a ka ru sogs la// dri zhim chu dang ba'i 
305b8(rgyud 'grel): sogs kyis// chag chag legs par gdab par bya// phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma ni// sbyin par byas te gsol ba gdab// sa'i lha mo sku mdog ser// phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams pa ni// blos 
306a1(rgyud 'grel): bkug brjon de gsol ba gdab// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin pa yi// sa 'di dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes brjod nas nam

327b8(rgyud 'grel): gnon par byed pa'o// mche ba ni ma mo rnams kyi ste rang gi las dang nyon mongs pa 'jigs par byed pa'o// mdung thung ni smin drug gi bu kar ti ka ste gzhan gyi las 'jig par byed pa'o// klu lag ni 
328a1(rgyud 'grel): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ste/ bdag gi gdon gza' chen po rnams brlag par byed pa'o// zhags pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba ste gzhan ni gdon ma rangs pa'i 'khor lo las thar par byed pa'o// 
328a2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri ni mi'i ste 'byung po rnams 'gugs pa'o// dbyug pa ni sa'i lha mo ste/ phrin las rnam bzhi byed du 'jug pa'o// 'khor lo ni nor lha ste ma grub par byed pa'o// bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyis 
328a3(rgyud 'grel): ni grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa'o// rdo rje mA ma kis ni 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed pa'o// de ltar na lha nyi shu rtsa gcig gis phyag rgya bcings pa bshad pa yin no// dkyil 
328a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang po'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba rdzogs so// #/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la mos pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya bcing ba bshad pa ni bdag nyid cho ga drug gis ltar bskyed nas/ mdun du

328a6(rgyud 'grel): sa wa badz+ra ya swAhA/ lho phyogs su rin chen rigs kyi rnam par rgyal ba rin chen hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing la/ oM s+phu Ta mu Ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya he pu lu ni ri phu lu mi li tsu lu ku ru ku ru badz+ra ba dza da ya staH/ 
328a7(rgyud 'grel): nub phyogs su pad+ma'i rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje phur bu ni chos kyi hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ g+hArda b+hU rna g+hA na pa ya ki li ki la yaM swAhA/ byang phyogs su las kyi rigs kyi khro bo rdo rje myos pa ni las kyi hUM mdzad kyi/ 
328a8(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya bcings la/ sarba sa ta ni b+ho ta ya saM b+ha ta ya ka ta ma ta ma ta ra ta ra ta mo ta pra mo ta na ni swAn+d+ha/ shar lto 'tshams kyi phung bu chen po ni b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma saM bA ma saM b+h+ra mtshin d+ha tshin d+ha bin d+ha bin d+ha/ mahA kI li 
328b1(rgyud 'grel): kI la ya swAH/ ljon pa 'tshams kyi khrob brar bu'i sngags ni/ oM sarba bud d+ha ni ku Ta kuT ya sang kud Ta ya sa kud Ta ya b+hAn d+ha b+hAn d+ha kron kron kA li kI la ya swA hA/ nub byang 'tshams kyi phur bu 
328b2(rgyud 'grel): gtum po'i sngags ni/ oM sarba shar+b+hA g+ha Ta nan/ g+ha Ta k+ShaT/ sa g+ha Ta Ta ya/ sing g+hAd Ta yaM/ ru ru tsu ru tsaN TA li kI li kI la ya swAt+ma/ byang shar 'tshams kyi khro bo rdo rje phung bu'i sngags ni/ 
328b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba bi d+yA badz+ra badz+ra/ trA sa yad+d+ha sa ya/ badz+ra kA la~M kA li ya swaH/ de bzhi'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje phung bu'i gzhibs pa ni brar bu'i phyag rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi

328b5(rgyud 'grel): mgyogs pa'i snying po ni/ a ma Ta badz+ra badz+ra/ su tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ pra tiSh+Ti ra badz+ra mahA badz+ra/ a pra ti ta ta badz+ra/ a bo ka badz+ra/ e he badz+ra maHbadz+rA/ a ma ga badz+ra/ a ti badz+ra shaM gr-i badz+ra swAt+ma/

328b8(rgyud 'grel): las khro ba bcu gnyis sprul nas/ de dang ye shes sems dpa' tha mi dad par gyur pa la/ sngags dang phyag rgyabacings nas/ bsgrub pa po zhes phyag na rdo rje dbang bsrung ba las gsungs so// 
329a1(rgyud 'grel): yang na snga ma'i gnas de'i steng du bi ta'i khro bo lnga dang phyogs skyong bcu dang bcas pa spyan drangs la/ dbus kyi rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang sngon g.yas pa na rdo rje rtse lnga brgya gram

331b2(rgyud 'grel): sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yo ka mahA badz+ra kI la kI la ya swAhA/ a karba sA hA/ rdo rje phung bu'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba 'adz+ra pra ka ra/ ta thA ga ta g+ha ta dza na ka ra

332a8(rgyud 'grel): zlos pa ste bsnyen pa bzhi pa'o// zhi ba'i rdzas mar ram 'o ma mdun du gzhag la/ rgyas pa'i rdzas g+hi hang ngam se ta a dza na la sogs pa gzhag pa'am/ dbang la 'tshal dang tsan dan dang gur gum 
332b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gzhag pa dang / mngon spyod la khrag gam zhag ga mdug la sogs pa mdun du bzhag la dro ba 'am 'bar ba'am 'phang ba 'am du bar 'thul ba'am rdul ba la sogs pa'i rtags byung ba'i bar du

338a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// de nas sngar bstan pa'i slob ma mtshan nyid dang ldan pa lhag par gnas par 'dod na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod yon dang / mchod pa bul la/ na bza' re re'am/ spyir zung gcig 
338a2(rgyud 'grel): phul la/ bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs bdag po// rdo rje 'chang ba thugs rje'i bdag/ bdag la mnyes shing dgyes pa dang // byin gyis rlob cing dngos grub gsol// zhes gsol ba btab la rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag 
338a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas slob ma dgug pa dang / lcags sgrog gis btsang ba dang / rdo rje ser ba'i phyag rgyas bsdigs pa dang / khro bo be con dang stobs po ches dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / de nas snga ma bzhin du bdun rnam dag byas la/

347b8(rgyud 'grel): 'phyang lcags// dkyil 'khor steng du sku gzugs bzhag/ sa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs kyis gzung ba'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pas gzhag pa ni// khro bo las thams cad 
348a1(rgyud 'grel): pas ma bzung ba'o// gnyis pa sta gon gnas par bya// lha dang slob ma bum pa slob ma dang // sta gon dus kyi sbyin sreg go/ dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas rnams su// tsan dan gur gum dri yi 
348a2(rgyud 'grel): thig le bya// rang rang sngags kyis gang cig bapyad// rnams mtshad dang gnong ba dang // gsang ba sder bzangs mchod pa dbul// mchod de gsol ba gdab pa ni// bcom ldan rdo rjenam 'joms ni/

352b8(rgyud 'grel): du/ badz+ra bi dA ra NA nA ma thi d+hi pre ta ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i khrus kyi cho ga'i 'grel pa/ dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dag dang /

357b5(rgyud 'grel): las thams cad 'joms pa ni g+hA ts+tsha dang sbyar te/ doni lho phyogs kyi rgyal pa stabs ldan gyi rnam smin mi bzad pa de/ bram ze phru gu rig pa 'dzin pa dang / mdo sde dang gzugs sngags ltar bzlas pa'i rjes la/ rgyal ba'i 
357b6(rgyud 'grel): nad mi bzad pa thams cad/ sa~Mrba bi no b+hU d+hA kAd+hA nAr ya kA ru yeswAH/ bram ze chen pos/ bzlas pa'i yon tan de tsaman/ bsgrubs pa yon tan bas ma las 'das/ reg sngags rgyal po dge bar gsungs/ sa 
357b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / sgrub pa'i dus su dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga gzhung ltar byas la bzlas pa'i dus su yang snying dang rtsa sngags la sarba bya ti dang g+hA ra d+ha sbyar ro// 'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / 'jug gi don bya ba dang / 
357b8(rgyud 'grel): byab pa dang bsrung ba byas nas ti la nag po la sdig pa byas te mtshan rnon pos gtubs te/ shing sa dpal sbyin sreg byas pas nges pa kho nar sngon gyi las btsam mo// gzhan gyi las thams cad 'dzag par byed pa ni/ 
358a1(rgyud 'grel): prAr+NA pa ya dang sbyar te/ gzhan dag las 'dran sems can gyi mi gang yin pa'i ri mo bris la/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag ste/ cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ri mo bdun du blangs te 'dug 
358a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang thub pa byaste/ rong sal ba byugs nas tsher ma tshan gyi me grangs te sbyin sreg byaste/ thal brdung chen po la b+har nar/ dgra pagags brlag par byed na ne/ sarbasatwA ne la sogs pa ni gas pa blan mongam 
358a3(rgyud 'grel): yin pa'o// gdan thams cad las thar par byed pa na ba d+ha dang sbyar te/ 'od ni thar par byed pa yin gyi drag par mi byed de/ btsan danas thar pa dang 'dra zhes pa'i thachag gi/ thar par 'dod pa'o sgo kyi 'a nas/ 
358a4(rgyud 'grel): dbus su gzhag ste/ las thams cad gong ma dang 'drab las phrer pa dang bcas pa la ces dril ba la/ gser dang g.yund dang / rngond mche ba g.yas rdorje dang bcas pa lus sam mgul du btags na/ gdon la 
358a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// 'byung ba thams cad 'gugs pa ni sham dbang du tha ba dngasas// rig sngags kyilas thams cad byed du 'jug pa nis bo d+ha dang sbyar te/ grog 'amaras sam shog bul 
358a6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'dod kyi meng byung bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhagaste/ chog rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdug pa dang gdab pa dang / zab pa'i sbyar ba byas te sbyar spos dang dri sna tshogs pas byugs 
358a7(rgyud 'grel): can dan lasags pa'i shing gsung can gyi me la snyan sag byas nas/ sol ba dang da ni mar dkang dang bzlas te/ bza' ba dang thug pa byas na nges par 'grub pa// mgrub pa grub par zad pa ni pra medang 
358a8(rgyud 'grel): sbyar te/ gang grub par 'dod pa'i ri mo bris la/ cho ga gong ma nyid dang mthun no// yang na meng mgul khrag dra gzhug go// grub pa chud mi za bar byed pa ni sa b+h+ra ma dang sbyar te/ gang mngon du gyur pa'i nor rdzas 
358b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ming bris te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag la bdug pa gdab pa dang dra ba rdzogs pa dang / a sha ta'i khu bar byugs nas/ za ma tog du bcug la ras gtsang mas bkris nas phur ba dang bcas te rgyas 
358b2(rgyud 'grel): btab la/ sku gzugs sam mchod rten gyis mnan te shin du dben pa'i sar gzhag nas nges par chud miza'o// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa ni ku Ta dang sbyar te/ de la lnga ste/ ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin 
358b3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / 'bri sbyid pa dang / rkang mgyogs sbyin pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa'o// bu sbyin pa ni bu 'dod pa'i ming byang gdug gdab brab pa bya ste/ ga bur la sogs pa'i dris byugs te lung thang dang po de 
358b4(rgyud 'grel): rtse dang grwas dang bcas te/ ser po'i shing la mi btang la sbyin sreg b+haste/ sal ba 'abla mar dang sbyar te byan na bu med pa bu yod par gyur to// nor dang 'bra 'dod pa la nor dang 'bru'i ming zas la/ bdug gad ba cang 
358b5(rgyud 'grel): pa byas te phyug po'i bang mdzad dang / rgyal po'i dkar mdzad cha gang gi nar sna tshogs pa chags byas na 'grub po// drad 'gro'i ming bris te lcags la bzlas nas byin na 'grub po// tshe dang bsod nams sbyin pa ni bkra 
358b6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi zhal zas la brten te/ a yu bar ta ne pu ting ku ru ye sAr+tha dang sbyar ro// de dag thams cad la 'jug cing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni dkyil 'khor chen po dang mthun no// sems can thams cad bsrung ba na/ 
358b7(rgyud 'grel): sakra Ta ya dang sbyar te/ de la yang lnga ste/ rims bsrung ba dang / gdon bsrung ba dang / 'khor dang nor phyags bsrung ba dang / lo rtag bsrung ba dang / sr-i bsrung ba'o// de dag ni gdams ngag las shes par bya'o/ 
358b8(rgyud 'grel): sarab bsrung ba maM skye'i 'khor lo lus la bcangs te/ so sa' 'khor lo'i thog du gzugs pa dang / yang snying rtsa sngags dril te gdong bzlog bya ba'o// rengs par byed par 'dod pa'i ming bris te/ bdug gdab 
359a1(rgyud 'grel): brab pa yan chod so so'i las kyi bye brag spyir mthun pa las thal chen byugs te/ shing bsrang ba'i sna ma'i shing dag la me sbar te me tog ker gtsugs dang / rlung gi rta mo'i dang / ril ma la sbyin sreg byas 
359a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ thal ba de bye ba'i glad gur blugs te/ yungs dkor dang yungs nag du sbyar nas gar gtor ba de rengs par byed do// rmugs par byed pa ni sang gA Ta ya dang byar te/ gang rmugs par 'dod pa'i ming byang ba drug 
359a3(rgyud 'grel): gdab brab pa byas nas la cas dril la/ rkang 'og gam lce 'og tu bcug la nges pa kho nar rmugs par 'gyur ro// las kyi mtha' bcwa brgyad pa'i man ngag/ slob dpon rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// 
359a4(rgyud 'grel): sa mam pa mas ma thas sas// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra bi dA ra NA nA ma d+hA ra Ni bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chog/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 
359a5(rgyud 'grel): zhi yang gdug 'dul khro mchog/ sku 'dud de'i cho ga bshad/ rang skad cig gis lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i thugs khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ gzungs kyi sngags bsam la/ de'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub

359a7(rgyud 'grel): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / lam la gnas pa dang / lus dbul ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa bar bsngo ba byas la/ oM shu n+ya tany+dza na badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko dz+dza/ zhes pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lhag par 
359a8(rgyud 'grel): mos par bya'o// de'i rjes la gzungs kyi yi ge sgra tsam la dmigs pa dang / de yongs su gyur pa las/ gzungs kyi yig 'bru rnam par bsam pa dang / de yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

359b2(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i byang chub la bkod de/ slar 'dus nas zla ba la thim/ yongs su gar pa las/ bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje'i thugs kyi sprul pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog lngang sngon phyag g.yas pa na sna chags nga 
359b3(rgyud 'grel): nges gcig med pa bsnams pa g.yon pa dril bu dku ru bsten pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa/ de'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzungs kyi yi ge rnams

359b6(rgyud 'grel): tshig sems dpa'i gsung la dmigs te gzungs gdon no// de bzhin du rim gyis thun bzhi ru gzungs 'bum bzlas pa ni sngon du bsnyen pa'o// de nad pa la sogs pa'i don dras phyogs gtsang ma ru ba yi rnam pa lngas byugs

359b8(rgyud 'grel): rin po che sna lnga dang / 'bru lnga dang / sman lnga dang / snying po lnga dang / spos dri zhim blugs te/ zlum pos kha brgyan la/ mgrin pa ras kyis dkri'o// bruM las rin po che'i bum par bskyed de/ baM las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho/ pawa 
360a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i steng du gong bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bskyed la/ ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te mchod bstod byas la gtor ma gtang te/ gong bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nad pa sdom pa 'dzin du bcug 
360a2(rgyud 'grel): la/ bum pa'i chus khrus byas na nad pa nad las thar par 'gyur ro// dza rjenam par 'joms pa' khrus kyi chog slob dpa ni byang chub snang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rnam par 'joms pa ye shes sku// rab tu 
360a3(rgyud 'grel): btud nas mdor bsdus bshad// dben gnas 'dug la maN+Dal bca' khrus byas gos bgos mdzad pa bsham// spyan drang la sogs sngon 'gro bas/ tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te// 
360a4(rgyud 'grel): rang sems zla bar hUM bas ma bya// rdul la 'od zer 'phros pa yis// rdo rje rabadra ba dang // 'gro ba'i don mdzad tshur 'dus te// hUM las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// gnag cing 'bar ba'i me 'ad bcas// de las 'od zer

360a7(rgyud 'grel): par bya// nam mkhar sangs rgyas spyan drangs te// sprul pa'i lhams dbang bskur ro// spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bsam// spyan drangs lnga rnams gshegs par 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis//

360b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa las// phyag na rdo rje'i sku rugasal// thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus dag na// bdag nyid khro ba chen por gnas// kun gyi thugs khar nyi steng du// rnam par 'joms pa'i yi ge dgod// par spros don ni

362b5(rgyud 'grel): las bsil ba'i 'od zer gyi can gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ hUM yig 'thing shun gyi mdog lta bu bsam par bya'o// de las rnam par 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo 
362b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mdun du dmigs la/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod de/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa bya'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gdug pa tshang gcod khro bo'i sku/ 
362b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chen po 'jigs chen po// rdo rjes 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// thog med 'khor bar log pa yi// rnam rtog dbang gyur sgo gsum gyis// sdig pa bgyis la bdag 'gyod cing // mgon po'i spyan sngar rab tu bshags// 
362b8(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// so so'i skye bo byang chub sems// kun gyi dge la dga' ba yis// bdag ni rjes su yid rang bgyid// sems can khams ni ma lus pa// sangs rgyas bde la dgod pa'i phyir// 
363a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi dge 'dun ltos med pas// byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi// 'gro ba'i skyabs chen gcig pu ba// sangs rgyas theg pa mchog gi chos// tshogs mchog phyir mi ldog pa la// bdag ni
363a2(rgyud 'grel): skabs su nye bar mchi// srid pa'i rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyis// nyams zag mgon med gyur pa rnams// bla med bde la gzhag pa'i phyir// sems mchog yang dag bskyed par bgyi// lam gang gis ni der 'gro ba// 
363a3(rgyud 'grel): sngogs kyi theg pa'i lam 'di la// deng nas byang chub snying po'i bar// bdag ni tshul bzhin gnas par bgyi// zhes brjod la/ de nas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / kun la btang snyoms bsgom 
363a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de'i rjes la brtan pa dang gal bar snang ba'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i don can du rig par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sa rba rnams b+hA ba shud+ha hi zhes pa'i sngags kyi byin gyis brlab pa/ 
363a5(rgyud 'grel): stong par gnas pa'i paM yig dang // raM las pad+ma nya ma la// byung ba las rgya gram gyi// rdo rje chen po rnam par bsgom// de gnas hU~M las 'od 'phros pas// rabs gzhi gur yang bsgom// de nas bu las gzhal 
363a6(rgyud 'grel): yas khang // kun nas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// rtsibs bcu 'khor lo'i lte ba la// rgya gram rdo rje dang bcas bsgom// der yang zla ba nyi ma dang // hUM byung rdo rje tshe las 'od// spras shing bsdus la khro bache// 
363a7(rgyud 'grel): nga ma rdzogs par bgyid// dbus gnas rdorjes ste byas su// tha ba rje rnams can pa// mar stan ston pa'i mdaga'ad ba// rdo rjes bu bye bcas badzin// shang thugs rje'i dbus su// 
363a8(rgyud 'grel): phur buH// ud+ya srin po'i mdag mtshungs pa// phyag g.yas dzan phrar bu 'dzin// rtswa la phyogs su tha che// rdurdza can snang bral mnag/ g.yas na dru can swA// rdo rdza bar dbus la gnas pa'o// 
363b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnga rje'i dbus su// rdo rje thob rgya thaH// nam mkha'i mdog can phyag g.yas na// rdo rje zab 'byung ba'o// byang gnas dzas rdzab // gtum pa zung ba'i mdag su bu// rbaH rgya tham phyag g.yas 'dzin// 
363b2(rgyud 'grel): sa gnas par bsgras// ma ma pas rnams/ gan/ ma 'dub dang / wAn / 
363b3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa pad+ma dang // rgya sa ma rdo rje 'phyang ba 'dzin// shar nas g.yas skor rim pas bsgom// 'dod pa'i rgyal pa dbyig pa sngo// mi g.yo stobs chen sku mdog gnag/ g.yas rnams rim bzhin lcags kyu dang // 
363b4(rgyud 'grel): dbyig pa ral gri rtse gsum 'dzin// byang shar nas ni nub byang mthar// di yang g.yas bskor rim las bsgom// mkhar gnas rdo rje d+hu mdzad dang // sa 'og gnod mdzes rdo rjeche// mdag nag g.yas na rdo rje dzan 
363b5(rgyud 'grel): khro bo 'di dag thams cad kyang // phyag g.yon sdig 'dzub zhags par ldan// kun kyang g.yon brgya dgom pa yis// rna ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// shar skang rdo rje lcags kyu dkar// lhong gnas rdo rje zhags 
363b6(rgyud 'grel): pa seng // nub tu rdo rje lcags klog dmar// rdo rje dril ldang byang skor te// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu 'dzin cing g.yon brkyang pas// nyi ma'i steng na gnas pa'o// thams cad mche gtsigs/ 
363b7(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum zhal// dmar ser dbu skra gyen rjes dang // stag gi lpags pas smad bkris shing // sprul dang rin chen rgyun mdzes pa'o// rang snying zla bar sa bon dang // gnas gsum rdo rje gsum bsgoms te/ 
363b8(rgyud 'grel): so bon 'od kyi sbyor ba yis// ye shes bkug mchod gnyis med bya// snying khar sngags kyi phreng bkod te// 'khor lor gnas pa thams cad dang // mgrin gcig skad gsang mthon po yis// sngags 
364a1(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dag yang dag bzlas par bya// na ma na d+hanA ya/ rnam rabatra bAn ya/ man yak+Sha sanA pa ta ya/ oM har ta ra baH/ mag+na ma thA badz+ra/ d+han d+han bang/ dag ha badz+ra/ ban pa \u0f7f ba / 
364a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+har yan ra ya badz+ra/ d+hAdra Na tA rA Na badz+ra/ can chen dbadz+ra/ b+ha blan dbang hUM phaT/ nA ma shwe Na Da badz+ra wa d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ han tan/ a mr-i ti ts+tsha phaT/ 'dis ni 
364a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje khro bo rnams kyi thugs bskul nas/ sgrub la bgegs med byed cing dngos grub ster ba'o// ji srid mi skyo'i bar du mngon par bzlas pa'i mthar/ ye shes 'khor lo phyung nas mdun gzhag mchod pa dang / yi ge brgya 
364a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar ni rdo rje'i sngags brjod de/ rang gnas gshegs la 'khor lo snying khar bsdu bar bya/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs kyi sgrub thabs/ bram ze maNe badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // pa Na Di ta chen po 
364a5(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo tsa ba ra bzhig shes gnyen gyis bskur ba'o// rnas sa rnam pa ma sa gyu // rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra bi dA ra Na stoH/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms la bstod pa/ 
364a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yon tan dang nyid las// thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad sprul pa// gdug pa 'dul phyir 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// bcom ldan 
364a7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral yang // gdul bya'i dbang gis khrol khro ba dang // 'dod chags can la chags can ltar ston pa// byang chub mchog gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// 
364a8(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yis// 'gro ba kun dang ji ltar mthun pa yi// gsang sngags rol pa rab tu ston mdzad pa// bsam yas sprul pa mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sdang dang gdug pa tshar 
364b1(rgyud 'grel): bcad phyir// sdigs pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i sku// nyon mongs dug chen rtsad nas gcod mdzad pa'i// sprul gdug rgyan gyis brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dbus na/ 
364b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo stang stabs brkyang bskum tshul bzhugs pa// spyan gyi sdang mig nyi zla 'bar ba yis// bgegs dpung sreg par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// dus mtha'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar ba'i sku// klog stong 'gru'ang

364b5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i cho ga/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// yid du 'ong ba'i sa yi char// kun du spyod pa gtsang ldan pas// gser ram dngul lam kham gzhan gyi// bum pa mtshan nyid

364b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shing gis kha brgyan te// sa dang snyi bar bsres pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'dab brgyad pa dbus su// drang ba'i stan la yang dag gzhag/ dra zhim tshwa yis bkang ba'i skyed// rdo rje ma tog phreng bar ldan// rang ldan 
364b8(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan la gzhol bas// stong pa'i sngags kyis rnam sbyangs te// bru las rin chen gnal yas khang // babyung 'o ma'i rgya mtshor ldan// be pad a las dkyil 'khor// der gnas dz+dza yig spros bsdus ma/ 
365a1(rgyud 'grel): khro bo khro bo'i 'khor lo bskyed// ye shes spyan drangs mchod pa dang // bstod dang gnyis su med par bya// dbang bskur slar yang mchod bstod nas// rang nyid sngags kyi phreng bkod de// bzlas dang 
365a2(rgyud 'grel): bum par spro bya ba// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad la sogs// ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'i mthar// mchod bstod 'dod don gsol ba dang // lha rnams ye shes bdud rtsi yis/ 
365a3(rgyud 'grel): rab bkrus btsang mar gyur pa dang // nad med bgegs rnams 'joms pa dang // dpal du byed cing bkra shis pa// phun sum tshogs min 'joms par byed// rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i bum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// 
365a4(rgyud 'grel): nam rgya pan gas pa// rgya gar skad du/ shan ti ho ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga/ dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zug rngu'i nyes pa dang bral zhing / mi shis mtshan ma

365a6(rgyud 'grel): ma dkar po'i rdzas kyis byug/ dkar zhing dri zhim 'o ma can// reg na zug rngu dang bral ba yi// bla mdog me tog 'byung ba'i shing // khung dang rjes mthun dbyibs su brtsig/ mchod dang bsreg pa'i yo byad rnams 
365a7(rgyud 'grel): las dang rjes mthun nyer bsags te// me spar me dbus raM las lnga// mdog dkar bgrang phreng dbyig gu dang // mi 'jigs spyi blugs 'dzin par bskyed// ye shes me bkug gnyis med bstim/ 
365a8(rgyud 'grel): mchod dang bstod dang bsregs pa'i mthar// slar yang mchod bstod mnyes pa yi// me lha 'bar ba'i me dbus su// rang lhag lha bskyed ye shes bstim// der yang mchod dang bstod pa dang / 
365b1(rgyud 'grel): bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis banyes pa dang // mchod pa stod 'dod don gsol ba dang // yig brgya pas yongs bskang nas// gshegs bsdu slar yang mag+ha ya// mtshad bsreg rdzas kyis tshim byas la// 'dod

365b5(rgyud 'grel): yas mchod pa'i srin dang ldan// rang snyings bon 'od zer gyis// khro bo khro bo'i 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal mkha' spyod dang // sa spyod sa 'og spyad pa yi/

365b7(rgyud 'grel): gtong ma'i tshig rdzogs so// / rgya ga skad du/ badz+ra bi dz+ra ra karbA tsa drung sA d+ha na ba nA~M/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i las bzhi sgrub pa'i chog/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gar+dz+dza 
365b8(rgyud 'grel): med ye shes rdo rje can// ba rungs 'dul la phyag 'tshal nas// 'byung ba bzhi la brten pa'i las// tshar gcad rjes su bzung ba bshad// sa phyogs gang du gnod pa'i las// sgrub par 'os pa'i der gnas te/ 
366a1(rgyud 'grel): ma nosan nasas blangs la// thab khung me dbyibs nag pos byug/ garag dang 'khyog dang dring dang // srin gyis rnam par zos pa dang // rag na zug rngu srud pa'i shing // lung dang rjes mthun dbyabs su bci

367a8(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pas lha rnams nye bar byed// sbyin sreg 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster// de bas gang bsgrubs 'bras yod par// 'dod pas sbyin sreg las la 'bad// zhibs nad dang gdon bgegs zhi// rgyas pas 
367b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs longs spyod spel// dbang gis gzhan bdag dbang du byed// drag pos gdug pa tshar gcod pa'o// bgegs med dngos grub 'byung ba yi// gnas su zhi sogs brtsam pa dang // gang na ma rungs bgegs gnas
367b2(rgyud 'grel): pa// der ni drag po bye ba nyid// dkar ba'i sa las khru gang chad// zlum po thur du khru phyed pa// zhi ba'i las la yang dag bsngags// sa se sa lamagru bzhi'i dbyibs// khru do zabs su de yi phyed// rgyas pa'i thab

367b4(rgyud 'grel): yang ldan// mdog dkar ser dang dam ba ni// rim bzhin gi rgyas dbang la'o// shing gang dalas bzlog pa ste// kha dog gnag 'khyog drang ba// reg na zug rngubaskyed pa ni// drag shul spyad la rab bsngags pa'o//
